Yuda, otari wa Kariota, amugira ati: Mukama wangye, ekyo nikiija kuba kita okutweyoreka, oteeyorekire ensi?
Yesu amugarukamu ati: Weena orikunkunda, aryakuratira ekigambo kyangye, na Tata aryamukunda; twije ahu ari, tutuure nawe.
Otankunda takwata biragiro byangye; kandi ekigambo eki ngamba tikiba kyangye habwangye, kureka kiba ekya Taata owantumire.
Ebi naabibagambira nkiri hamwe naimwe;
kwonka Omuhwezi, Mutima Orikwera, ou Taata arituma omu iziina ryangye, niwe aribeegyesa byona ebi naabagambiire.
Nimbatsigira obusingye; obusingye bwangye naabubaha, ntarikububaha nk'oku ensi ebuha. Emitima yaanyu erekye kushoberwa nari kutiina.
Mwahurira ningira nti: Ningyenda, kandi ndyagaruka. Kuri nimunkunda mukaashemereirwe, ahabw'okuba ninza ahari Taata, kandi Taata ogwo nankira.
Ekyo naakibagambira kitakabaireho, ngu ku kiriba kyabaireho, mwikirize.
Tinkigamba bingi naimwe, ahabw'okuba mukama w'ensi egi naija. Taanyineho bushoboorozi;
kwonka nyowe nkora nk'oku Taata yandagiire, haza ensi ebone kumanya ku mmukunda. Nimwimukye, turugye aha.
Niinye muzaabibu gw'amazima, na Taata niwe muhingi waagwo.
Eitaagi ryona eriri omuriinye eritarikwana, aritemaho; kandi eitaagi eririkwana, arisharira, ngu ryane ebijuma bingi okukiraho.
Mbwenu imwe mwaherize kushemezibwa ahabw'ebigambo ebi naabagambiire.
Mugume omuriinye, naanye ngume omuriimwe. Nk'oku eitaagi ritabaasa kwana ryonka, ritagumire ha muti, naimwe nikwo mutarikubaasa, mwaba mutagumire muriinye.
Niinye muzaabibu, imwe muri amataagi. Weena oguma omuriinye, naanye nkaguma omuriwe, ayana ebijuma bingi; manya nyowe ahi ntari, timwine ki murikubaasa kukora.
Weena otaguma muriinye, anagwa nk'eitaagi eritemirwe aha muti, kandi ayoma. Amataagi nk'ago gashanguruzibwa, ganagwa omu muriro, gasya.
Ku murikuguma omuriinye, n'ebigambo byangye byaguma omuriimwe, mushabe eki murikwenda kyona, haza muryakiheebwa.
Ekihimbisisa Taata, niimwe okwana ebijuma bingi, mukahamya ku muri abatendekwa bangye.
Nk'oku Taata yankunzire, naanye nikwo naabakunzire; mugume omuri rukundo yangye.
Ku murikuratira ebiragiro byangye, muryaguma omuri rukundo yangye, nkaanye oku naakuratiire ebiragiro bya Taata, nkaguma omuri rukundo ye.
Ebyo naabibagambira, ngu okushemererwa kwangye kube omuriimwe, kandi n'okwanyu kwijurire kimwe.
Eki nikyo kiragiro kyangye: mukundane nk'oku naabakunzire.
Tihariho ogira rukundo erikukira ey'omuntu kuhayo amagara ge ahabwa banywani be.
Imwe muri banywani bangye mwaba nimukora ebi ndikubaragiira.
Tinkibeeta bahuuku, ahabw'okuba omuhuuku tamanya ki mukama we akora; nimbeeta banywani bangye, ahabw'okuba nkabamanyisa byona ebi Taata yangambiire.
Tiimwe mwantooraine, kureka niinye naabatooraine; nkabataho ngu mugyende mwane ebijuma, kandi ngu ebyo bijuma bigumeho, Taata abone kubaha kyona eki murishaba omu iziina ryangye.
Eki ndikubaragiira n'eki: mugume mukundane.
Ensi ku eribanga, mumanye ku niinye yaabandize kwanga etakabangire.
Kuri muri ab'ensi, ensi ekaabakunzire ahabw'okuba abaayo; kwonka imwe ahabw'okutaba baayo, n'ahabw'okuba naabatooraine nkagibaihamu, nikyo egyo nsi erikubangira.
Mwijukye ebi naabagambiire nti: Omuhuuku takira mukama we. Ku baraabe bampiiganiise, naimwe baryabahiiganisa; ku baraabe baakwatsire ebi naabagambiire, n'ebyanyu baryabikwata.
Ebyo byona baryabibakora nibabantura, ahabw'okuba tibarikumanya owantumire.
Kuri ntaraizire nkabagambira, tibaakugizire rubanja; kwonka hati tibaine ky'okwekwatsa ahabw'ekibi kyabo.
Weena onyanga, biri ayangire Taata.
Kuri ntarabakoreiremu ebitakakorwaga muntu weena, tibaakugizire rubanja; kwonka mbwenu babireebire, haza baanyanga hamwe na Taata.
Ekyo kikabaho, ngu ekyahandiikirwe omu iteeka ryabo ekirikugira ngu: Bakaanyangira busha, kihikiirizibwe.
Omuhwezi ou ndibooherereza kuruga ahari Taata, niwe Mutima ow'amazima oruga ahariwe, ku ariija, aryahamya ebyangye;
naimwe muryaba baakareebi bangye, ahabw'okuba okwiha aha kutandika mutuura naanye.
Ebyo naabibagambira ngu mutakaatentebuka.
Baryababinga omu mateeraniro; kandi obunaku buhikye, obu weena oribaita ariteekateeka, ngu yaakora eki Ruhanga amuragiire.
Ebyo baryabikora, ahabw'okuba tibakamanyaga Taata nobu yaakuba nyowe.
Mbwenu ebyo byona naabibagambira, ngu obunaku bwabyo ku burihika, mumanye ku naabibagambiire. Ebyo tindabibagambiire mu kutandika, ahabw'okuba nkaba nkibaine.
Kwonka mbwenu ninza ahari Ogwo owantumire, kandi tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe orikumbuuza ati: Nooza hi?
Mbwenu ahabw'okubagambira, emitima yaanyu yaijura obusaasi.
Nobu kiraabe kiri kityo, kwonka ka mbagambire amazima; okugyenda kwangye niimwe kuraagasire; manya ku ndaabe ntagyenzire, Omuhwezi ogwo tariija hariimwe; kwonka ku ndaagyende, ndyamubooherereza.
Nawe ku ariija aryashinja abantu b'omu nsi aha bikwatiraine n'ekibi, n'okuhikiirira, kandi n'orubanja.
Aha bikwatiraine n'ekibi, ahabw'okuba tibaraanyikiriize;
aha kuhikiirira, ahabw'okuba ninza ahari Taata, kandi timurindeeba bundi;
aha kucwa orubanja, ahabw'okuba mukama w'ensi egi yaaherize kusingwa orubanja.
Nkiine bingi eby'okubagambira, kwonka hati timurikubaasa kubyemera.
Mutima ow'amazima ku ariija, aryabahabura, mumanye amazima goona; ahabw'okuba tarigamba habwe wenka, kureka ebi arihurira, nibyo arigamba, kandi aryabamanyisa n'ebiriija kubaho.
Aryampimbisisa, ahabw'okuba aryaiha aha byangye, abibagambire.
Kyona eki Taata aine n'ekyangye; nikyo naabagirira nti: Byona ebi aribagambira, aryabiiha omu byangye.
Hatsigaireyo omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba; kandi bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe.

Bamwe omu batendekwa be baabuuzana bati: Ekyo eki arikutugambira ni ki? Naagira ati: Hatsigaire omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba; kandi ati: Bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe; kandi ati: Ninza owa Taata.
Baagaruka baagira bati: Naamanyisa ki okugira ati: Hatsigaire omwanya mukye? Ka tutarikwetegyereza ki arikumanyisa.
Yesu amanya ku barikwenda kumubuuza; atyo abagira ati: Nimubuuzana amakuru g'eki naagamba nti: Hatsigaireyo omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba, kandi bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe!
Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Imwe muryarira, mucure, kwonka ensi yo eryashemererwa; muryagira obusaasi, kwonka obusaasi bwanyu buryarugamu okushemererwa.
Omukazi, ku aba naarumwa, agira obusaasi, ahabw'okuba obunaku bwe bwahika; kwonka ku aheza kuzaara, obwo busaasi bumweba ahabw'okushemerererwa omuntu owaazaarwa omu nsi.
Naimwe hati mwine obusaasi, kwonka ndyabareeba obundi, emitima yaanyu eshemererwe, haza okwo kushemererwa kwanyu tihaine orikubaaka.
Aha kiro ekyo timurigira ki mwambuuza. Buzimazima nimbagambira nti: Kyona eki murishaba Taata omu iziina ryangye, aryakibaha.
Okuhitsya hati timukashabaga kintu kyona omu iziina ryangye; mushabe, muryaheebwa, haza okushemererwa kwanyu kubone kuhikira kimwe.
Ebyo byona mbaire nimbibagambira omu nfumu; kwonka obunaku nibwija kuhika, obu ntakibagambira mu nfumu, kureka okubagambira bwerure ebikwatiraine na Taata.
Ekyo kiro ku kirihika, muryashaba omu iziina ryangye, kandi tindikugira nti ndyabashabira ahari Taata.
Manya eki Taata abakundira, n'ahabw'okuba naimwe mukankunda, kandi mwaikiriza ku naarugira ahari Ruhanga.
Nkaruga ahari Taata, naija omu nsi; mbwenu ninduga omu nsi, ninza owa Taata.
Abatendekwa be baamugira bati: Mbwenu kwo noogamba butunu, tokicwa nfumu!
Hati twayetegyereza ku orikumanya byona, kandi ku omuntu weena atarikwetenga kukubuuza; n'ahabw'ekyo nitwikiriza ku waarugire ahari Ruhanga.
Yesu yaabagarukamu ati: Mbwenu buzima kwo mwaikiriza?
Reeba, obunaku nibwija kuhika, kandi kwo bwahikire, obu muraataataanisibwe, buri omwe akatoora ogwe, mukantsigaho nyenka; kwonka shi tindi nyenka, ahabw'okuba Taata ari hamwe naanye.
Ebyo naabibagambira, ngu mugire obusingye omuriinye. Omu nsi muryareeba enaku; kwonka mugume, nyowe ensi ngisingwire.
Yesu, ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yainamura amaisho, yaareeba ahaiguru, yaagira ati: Taata, obunaku bwahika; ohimbisise Omwana waawe; nawe abone kukuhimbisisa.
Manya okamuha obushoboorozi aha bantu boona, ngu abone kuha abu waamukwatsize amagara agatahwaho.
Ago magara agatahwaho nikwo kukumanya iwe Ruhanga wenka ow'amazima, na Yesu Kristo ou waatumire.
Nyowe nkuhimbisiise omu nsi, naaheza omurimo ogu wampaire kukora.
Mbwenu Taata, obu nibwo bunaku naiwe kumpimbisisa omu maisho gaawe n'ekitiinwa eki naashangirwe nyine naiwe, ensi etakahangirwe.
Abantu abu wankwatsize noobaiha omu nsi, nkabamanyisa iziina ryawe; bakaba bari abaawe, waabankwatsa, kandi baakuratira ekigambo kyawe.
Mbwenu hati nibamanya ku byona ebi wampaire byarugire ahariiwe;
ahabw'okuba byona ebi wangambiire nkabibahitsyaho, baabiikiriza, baamanyira kimwe ku naarugire ahariiwe, kandi baikiriza ku niiwe wantumire.
Mbwenu nimbashabira; tindikushabira b'ensi, kureka abo abu wankwatsize, ahabw'okuba n'abaawe.
Abangye boona n'abaawe, n'abaawe boona n'abangye, kandi nimpimbisirizibwa omuribo.
Nyowe tinkiri mu nsi, kwonka bo bagirimu, kandi niinyija ahu ori. Taata Orikwera, obarindise amaani g'eiziina ryawe eri wampaire, babe bamwe nkaitwe.
Obu naabaire nkibaine, nkabarindisa amaani g'eiziina ryawe eri wampaire; naabarinda, tihaaburaho n'omwe, kureka ogwo owaabaire ari ow'okubura, ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bibone kuhikiirizibwa.
Mbwenu niinyija ahu ori; ebi nimbigamba nkiri omu nsi, ngu okushemererwa kwangye kuhikiiririzibwe omuribo.
Nkabahitsyaho ekigambo kyawe; ensi yaabanga ahabw'okuba ti b'ensi, nkaanye oku ntari waayo.
Tindikushaba ngu obaihe omu nsi, kureka abarinde Omubi.
Ti b'ensi nkaanye oku ntari waayo.
Obeezese amazima; ekigambo kyawe nigo mazima.
Nk'oku wantumire omu nsi, naanye nikwo ndikugibatumamu.
Mbwenu niinyehayo ahabwabo, ngu nabo babone kwezibwa amazima.
Tindikushabira aba bonka, ninshabira n'abariinyikiriza ahabw'ekigambo kyabo;
boona babe bamwe, nkaiwe Taata oku ori omuriinye, naanye omuriiwe, nabo babe nikwo baaba omuriitwe, haza ensi ebone kwikiriza ku niiwe wantumire.
Ekitiinwa eki wampaire nkibahaire, ngu babe bamwe nk'oku turi bamwe,
nyowe omuribo, naiwe omuriinye babone kubeera kimwe bamwe, ensi emanye ku niiwe wantumire, kandi ku obakunzire nk'oku wankunzire.
Taata, niinyenda abu wankwatsize bagume naanye ahi ndi, babone kureeba ekitiinwa kyangye eki wampaire, ahabw'okuba okankunda ensi etakahangirwe.
Taata omwinganisa, ensi tekakumanyaga, kwonka nyowe nkumanya; kandi n'aba nibamanya ku niiwe wantumire.
Nkabamanyisa eiziina ryawe, kandi ndyaguma ndimanyise, okukunda oku wankunzire kubone kuba omuribo, naanye mbe omuribo.
Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaagyenda n'abatendekwa be, yaayambuka akagyera ka Kedirooni; okwo hakaba hariyo omusiri, yaaguzamu n'abatendekwa be.
Yuda owaamureebize akaba naamanya ogwo mwanya, ahabw'okuba kaingi Yesu akaba ateeranirayo n'abatendekwa be.
Mpaho yaija omuri ogwo mwanya ayebembeire ekimbuuro ky'abaserukare hamwe n'abarinzi abaayohereziibwe abahongyerezi abakuru n'Abafarisaayo, bakwaitse amatabaza n'emuri n'eby'okurwanisa.
Yesu, ahabw'okumanya byona ebirikwenda kumubaho, arugayo ababuuza ati: Nimusherura oha?
Bamugarukamu bati: Yesu owa Nazareeti. Abagira ati: Manya niinye. Obwo Yuda owaamureebize akaba ayemereire nabo.
Yesu ku abagira ati: Niinye; bagarura ebigyere enyima, bagwa ahansi.
Agaruka ababuuza ati: Nimusherura oha? Bati: Yesu owa Nazareeti.
Yesu abagira ati: Manya naabagira nti: Niinye. Ku muraabe niinye murikusherura, murekye aba bagyende.
Ekyo akakigamba kuhikiiriza eki yaagambire, naagira ati: Abu wankwatsize, tindaburize n'omwe.
Simooni Petero, owaabaire aine rurara, agisyorayo, atema omuheereza w'omuhongyerezi omukuru, amucwaho okutu kwa buryo. Ogwo muheereza akaba naayetwa Maliko.
Yesu agira Petero ati: Garura rurara yaawe omu kyobate kyayo; noogira ngu tindi w'okunywa ekikopo ki Taata yampaire?
Omutwe gw'abaserukare n'omukuru waabo, hamwe n'abarinzi Abayudaaya, baakwata Yesu, baamuboha.
Baabanza kumutwara owa Anasi; ahabw'okuba akaba ari ishezaara wa Kayaafa, owaabaire ari omuhongyerezi omukuru omuri ogwo mwaka.
Kayaafa ogwo niwe yaabaire ahabwire Abayudaaya ati: Ni kirungi omuntu omwe okufeera abantu boona.
Simooni Petero hamwe n'omutendekwa ondi baakurata Yesu. Kandi ogwo mutendekwa, ahabw'okumanywa omuhongyerezi omukuru, ataaha na Yesu omu kibuga ky'omuhongyerezi omukuru.
Kwonka Petero we aguma ayemereire aheeru y'eirembo. Omutendekwa, owaabaire naamanywa omuhongyerezi omukuru, nikwo kushohora, akagambira omwishiki omukumiirizi, akataasya Petero omunda.
Ogwo mwishiki omukumiirizi nikwo kubuuza Petero ati: Naiwe ori ow'omu batendekwa b'ogwo mushaija? Onu ati: Tindi w'omuribo.
Obwo hakaba hariho embeho, abaheereza n'abarinzi bahembire omuriro gw'amakara, beemereire niboota; Petero nawe nikwo kwemerera akoota nabo.
Omuhongyerezi omukuru abuuza Yesu aha by'abatendekwa be, n'eby'okwegyesa kwe.
Yesu amugarukamu ati: Nkaba ngambira abantu boona butunu; nyegyeseza omu iteeraniro n'omuri Nyaruju, ahu Abayudaaya boona bateeraniire; tinkagambaga kintu kyona omu mubonano.
Mbwenu nyowe nombuuriza ki? Buuza abarahuriire ebi naayegyeise; nibo barikumanya ebi naagambire.
Ku yaagambire ebyo, omwe aha barinzi abaabaire beemereire aho, yaamuteera oruhi, yaamugira ati: Haza ogarukamu otyo omuhongyerezi omukuru?
Yesu amugarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe naagamba kubi, nyomesereza eki naashobya; kwonka ku kiraabe kitariho, wanteerera ki?
Bwanyima Anasi amwohereza abohirwe, ahari Kayaafa, omuhongyerezi omukuru.
Simooni Petero, ku yaabaire ayemereire naayota, baamubuuza bati: Naiwe ori ow'omu batendekwa be? Ayehakana naagira ati: Tindi w'omuribo.
Omwe aha baheereza b'omuhongyerezi omukuru, oine obuzaare n'omushaija ou Petero yaatemireho okutu, agira ati: Tinaakureeba ori nawe omu musiri?
Petero agaruka ayehakana; ahonaaho enkoko egamba.

Mpaho baiha Yesu owa Kayaafa, bamutwara omu kikaari ky'omutegyeki omukuru, obwo nibutaagurikana. Kwonka bo tibaataaha muri ekyo kikaari, ngu kitakaabahagaza, bakabura kurya Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho.
Pilaato nikwo kushohora, akabashanga aheeru, akababuuza ati: Omushaija ogu nimumutabaariza ki?
Bamugarukamu bati: Kuri atari nkozi y'ebibi titwakumukureeteire.
Pilaato ati: Nimwirooko nu, mumutware, mumucwere orubanja nk'oku eiteeka ryanyu riri. Abayudaaya bamugarukamu bati: Itwe titurikwikirizibwa kwita muntu.
Ekyo kikahikiiriza ebi Yesu yaagambire naamanyisa oku arifa.
Pilaato atyo agaruka omu kikaari, ayeta Yesu, amubuuza ati: Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Yesu agarukamu ati: Ekyo waakibuuza ahabwawe, nainga hariho abandi abakungambiire?
Pilaato ati: Nyowe shi ndi Omuyudaaya? Ab'eihanga ryawe hamwe n'abahongyerezi abakuru, ka nibo baakundeetera. Okozire ki?

Yesu amugarukamu ati: Manya obugabe bwangye ti bw'ensi egi. Obugabe bwangye kuri buri obw'ensi egi, engabo zangye zikaarwaine, ndeka kurekurirwa Abayudaaya; kwonka obugabe bwangye kunu tiyo bukomooka.

Pilaato agira ati: Nikwo kugira nu, ngu ori omugabe? Yesu agarukamu ati: Waakigamba ku ndi omugabe, eki naazaariirwe kandi ekyandeetsire omu nsi n'okuhamya amazima. Ow'amazima weena ahurira eiraka ryangye,
Pilaato ati: Amazima n'enki? Ku agamba ekyo, agaruka ashohora, ashanga Abayudaaya, abagira ati: Nyowe tindikureeba kirikusingisa omuntu ogu orubanja.
Kwonka nk'oku omucwe gwanyu guri, nshangwa mbarekurira embohe emwe aha kiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho; mbwenu nimwenda mbarekurire Omugabe w'Abayudaaya?
Ku bahurira ekyo, bayomba nibagira bati: T'ogu, kureka Baraba. Baraba ogwo akaba ari omwambuzi.
Bwanyima Pilaato akaragiira ku batwara Yesu bakamwasha.
Ekyo ku kyahwaire, abaserukare baaruka ekirunga ky'amahwa, baakimuta aha mutwe, baamujweka bushuuti ya bujwa.
Baaguma nibaija ahu ari, nibagira bati: Singa, Mugabe w'Abayudaaya! Batyo bamuteera empi.
Mpaho Pilaato agaruka ashohora, abagira ati: Reeba, naaza kumubareetera, mumanye ku ntaareeba kirikumusingisa orubanja.
Yesu atyo ashohora ajwaire ekirunga ky'amahwa na bushuuti ya bujwa. Pilaato abagira ati: Omuntu ngugu!

Abahogyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abarinzi, ku bamureeba, bayomba bati: Mubambe aha musharaba! Mubambe aha musharaba! Pilaato ati: Mube niimwe mwamutwara, mumubambe; nyowe nindeeba hatariho kirikumusingisa orubanja.
Abayudaaya bati: Twine eiteeka, kandi ahabw'eiteeka n'ow'okufa, ahabw'okuba akeegira Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Pilaato ku ahurira baagamba ebyo, ayeyongyera kutiina;
atyo agaruka omu kikaari, abuuza Yesu ati: Beitu oruga hi? Kwonka Yesu tagira ki amugarukamu.
Pilaato nikwo kumubuuza ati: Torikwenda kugira eki wangambira? Torikumanya ku nyine obushoboorozi kukurekura nari kukubamba aha musharaba?
Yesu agarukamu ati: Tokungizireho bushoboorozi, kuri butarakuhairwe Ow'omu iguru; n'ahabw'ekyo owaakundekurira niwe aine orubanja orurikukira orwawe.
Ekyo kyareetera Pilaato kusherura oburyo bw'okumurekura; kwonka Abayudaaya baayomba bati: Ku oraamurekure, biri tori munywani wa Kaisaari; weena oyegira omugabe, aba agomeire Kaisaari.
Pilaato ku ahurira ebyo bigambo, aragiira ku bashohoza Yesu, ashutama aha kitebe ekicwerwaho emanja, omu mwanya gurikwetwa Omwariro, omu Ruheburaayo, Gabata.
Obwo rikaba riri eizooba ry'Okweteguurira Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho, aha shaaha nka mukaaga, Pilaato agira Abayudaaya ati: Reeba Omugabe waanyu!
Bayomba bati: Mwite! Mwite! Mubambe aha musharaba! Pilaato ati: Nimwenda ku mbamba Omugabe waanyu aha musharaba? Abahongyerezi abakuru baamugarukamu bati: Itwe titwine ondi mugabe, kureka Kaisaari.
Pilaato atyo arugaho amubarekurira kubambwa aha musharaba. Batyo batwara Yesu;
ashohora ayekoreire omusharaba gwe kuza omu mwanya ogurikwetwa ogw'Empanga y'Omutwe, omu Ruheburaayo, Gologota,
ahi baamubambiire aha musharaba n'abandi babiri, omwe aha rubaju rumwe, ondi aha rundi, na Yesu ahagati.
Pilaato ahandiika ekirango, akita aha musharaba; kirikugira kiti: YESU OWA NAZAREETI, OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA.
Ekyo kirango kyashomwa Abayudaaya baingi, ahabw'okuba omwanya ogu Yesu yaabambirwemu gukaba gutari hare n'orurembo; kandi kikaba kihandiikirwe omu Ruheburaayo n'omu Rulatini n'omu Ruguriiki.
Abahongyerezi abakuru b'Abayudaaya nikwo kugira Pilaato bati: Tokuhandiikire oti: Omugabe w'Abayudaaya, kureka oti: Akagira ati: Ndi Omugabe w'Abayudaaya.
Pilaato abagarukamu ati: Eki naahandiikire, naakihandiikire.

Abaserukare, ku baaherize kubamba Yesu, baatwara ebijwaro bye, baabibaganisa omu miteeko ena, buri omwe yaatwara gumwe. Ekanzu ye ekaba etabaziirwe, kureka erukirwe yoona okwiha omu maraka okuhitsya aha bigyere.

Batyo bagambirana bonka bati: tutakaagitaagura; haakiri tugiteerere enteenyu kureeba oraabe mukama waayo. Ekyo kikabaho kuhikiiriza ekyahandiikirwe ekirikugira ngu: Bakabagana ebijwaro byangye, n'emyenda yangye baagiteerera enteenyu.
N'abo baserukare nikwo baatwarize batyo. Haihi n'omusharaba gwa Yesu hakaba heemereireho nyina na nyinento, na Mariya muka Keloopa, na Mariya Magadaleena.
Yesu ku yaareebire nyina, n'omutendekwa ou yaabaire akunda amwemereire aha rubaju, yaagira nyina ati: Mukaikuru, reeba omwana waawe!
Kandi yaagira omutendekwa ati: Reeba nyoko! Okwiha obwo ogwo mutendekwa yaamutwara owe.
Bwanyima Yesu, ku yaamanyire ngu byona byahwa, kandi ahabw'okuhikiiriza Ebyahandiikirwe, yaagira ati: Nyine eiriho.
Aho hakaba hariho enjoga eijwire viino y'encenku; batyo bajabika ekyangu omuri egyo ncenku, bakita aha kati k'enyaweera, bakimuta aha munwa.
Yesu ku aheza kunywa egyo ncenku, agira ati: Kyahwa. Atyo ainika omutwe, ahayo amagara ge.

Ahabw'okushangwa eizooba eryo ryabaire riri ery'Okweteguura, n'ahabw'okutenda ngu emitumbi egume aha musharaba ahari Sabato manya-- Sabato egyo ekaba eri nkuru-- Abayudaaya baashaba Pilaato, ngu babahende amaguru, n'emitumbi bagiiheho.
N'ahabw'ekyo abaserukare baija, baahenda amaguru g'omuntu w'okubanza owaabambirwe nawe, baataho ag'owa kabiri.
Ku baahikire ahari Yesu, baashanga yaafiire, tibaamuhenda maguru;
kwonka omwe aha baserukare yaamucumita eicumu omu rubaju, ahonaaho haarugamu eshagama n'amaizi.
Owaakireebire akakihamya, haza okuhamya kwe n'okw'amazima, kandi naamanya ku eki arikugamba kiri eky'amazima, ngu naimwe mubone kwikiriza.
Manya ebyo bikabaho, ngu ekyahandiikirwe kibone kuhikiirizibwa, ekirikugira ngu: Tiharibaho igufa rye na rimwe eririhendwa.
N'ahandi ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti: Baryahanga amaisho ogwo ou baacumitsire.

Ebyo ku byahwaire, Yosefu owa Arimataaya, owaabaire ari omutendekwa wa Yesu, kwonka bwesherekye ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya, yaashaba Pilaato ku amwikiriza kutwara omutumbi gwa Yesu; Pilaato yaikiriza. Batyo baija, baagutwara.
Nikodemo owaizire ahari Yesu nyekiro omurundi ogwabandize, nawe yaija areetsire ekijwangye ky'entsinda n'enkaka, birikuhitsya oburemeezi bwa kiloguramu nka makumi mukaaga.
Baatwara omutumbi gwa Yesu, baaguzinga omu mitanda ya kitaani erimu eby'emigaju, nk'oku omugyenzo gw'okuziika kw'Abayudaaya guri.
Aha mwanya gu yaabambiirwemu, hakaba hariho omusiri ogurimu ekituuro kisya ekitakaziikwamuga muntu.
Nk'oku ryabaire riri eizooba ry'Abayudaaya ery'Okweteguura, n'ekyo kituuro kiri haihi, baaba nikyo baatamu Yesu.
Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki, Mariya Magadaleena akaija kare aha kituuro nibutaagurikana; yaashanga eibaare riihirwe aha kituuro.
Yaija nairuka, yaahika Simooni Petero n'omutendekwa ori ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, yaabagira ati: Baihire Mukama omu kituuro, haza titurikumanya hi bamutaire.
Petero n'ogwo mutendekwa nikwo kuza aha kituuro.
Batyo bombi bairuka, kwonka omutendekwa ori atsiga Petero, amutanga aha kituuro;
aringuriza, areeba emyenda ya kitaani eri aho, kwonka tataahamu.
Bwanyima Simooni Petero aija amukuratiire, ataaha omu kituuro; areeba emyenda ya kitaani eri aho,
n'omutanda ogwabaire gumushembire guri aha kwagwo hangahari.
Bwanyima omutendekwa ori, owaabandize aha kituuro, nawe ataahamu, areeba, aikiriza.
Kwonka okuhitsya obwo bakaba batakamanyire ekyahandiikirwe ekyabaire nikigira ngu n'ow'okuzooka omu bafiire.
Batyo abo batendekwa bagaruka omuka.
Mariya ku yaabaire ari aheeru y'ekituuro naarira, yainama, yaakiringurizamu;
yaareeba baamaraika babiri bajwaire ebirikwera, bashutami ahu omutumbi gwa Yesu gubaire guri; omwe aha mutwe, ondi aha bigyere.
Baamugira bati: Mukazi 'we, noorizibwa ki? Abagarukamu ati: Manya batwaire Mukama wangye, kandi tindikumanya hi bamutaire.
Ku yaagambire ekyo, yaahinduka, yaareeba Yesu ayemereire aho; kwonka tiyaamumanya ku ari we.

Yesu amugira ati: Mukazi 'we, noorizibwa ki? Noosherura oha? Mariya ku ateekateeka ngu n'omuhingi w'ogwo musiri, amugira ati: Mukama wangye, ku oraabe niiwe omutwaire, ngambira ahu omutaire, ngyende mmwiheyo.
Yesu amugira ati: Mariya! Onu ahinduka, amugira omu Ruheburaayo ati: Rabooni! amakuru ngu Mwegyesa.

Yesu amugira ati: Otankwataho, ahabw'okuba tinkatembire mu iguru owa Taata, kwonka irooko, ogambire beene Taata, oti: Yaaza kutemba omu iguru, ahari Ishe kandi Shoimwe, ahari Ruhanga we kandi Ruhanga waanyu.
Mariya Magadaleena atyo agyenda, agambira abatendekwa ku yaareeba Mukama, kandi ku yaamugambira ebyo bigambo.

Omwabazyo gw'eryo izooba ku gwakiikire, aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki, abatendekwa ku baabaire beekingiraine ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya, Yesu yaija, yaabeemerera ahagati, yaabagira ati: Nimukagire obusingye!
Ku aheza kubagira atyo, abooreka engaro ze n'orubaju rwe. Abatendekwa, ku bareeba Mukama, bashemererwa munonga.
Agaruka abagira ati: Nimukagire obusingye! Nk'oku Taata yantumire, naanye nikwo ndikubatuma.
Ku yaaherize kubagambira ebyo, yaabahuuhaho omwitsyo, yaabagira ati: Nimutungye Mutima Orikwera.
Abu murikusaasira ebibi, nibabisaasirwa; abu mutarikubisaasira nibibagumaho.
Tomasi orikwetwa Mpasha, omwe aha batendekwa eikumi na babiri, akaba atari hamwe nabo obu Yesu yaija.

Abandi batendekwa ku baamugizire bati: Twareeba Mukama! Yaabagarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe ntareebire nkojo z'emishumaari omu biganja bye, nkakoza orukumu rwangye omuri ezo nkojo, kandi ku ndaabe ntamukozire mu rubaju n'engaro yangye, tindikwikiriza.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro munaana, abatendekwa nabwo bakaba bari omu nju, kandi na Tomasi ari hamwe nabo, Yesu yaija enyigi zikingire, yaabeemerera ahagati, yaabagira ati: Nimukagire obusingye!
Bwanyima yaagira Tomasi ati: Koza aha orukumu rwawe, oreebe ebiganja byangye. Reeta engaro yaawe, ogite omu rubaju rwangye; orekye kuba entaikiriza kureka orikwikiriza.
Tomasi amugarukamu ati: Ai Mukama wangye kandi Ruhanga wangye!
Yesu amugira ati: Waikiriza ahabw'okuba wandeeba. Baine omugisha abaikiriza bataine ki bareebire.
Hariho obundi bumanyiso bwingi obu Yesu yaakozire, abatendekwa bakabureeba, obutarahandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo.
Kwonka obu bukahandiikwa ngu mwikirize ku Yesu ari Kristo Omwana wa Ruhanga, kandi ku muraikirize, mutungye amagara omuriwe.
Ebyo ku byahwaire, Yesu yaagaruka yaayeyoreka abatendekwa be aha nyanja ya Tiberiya; kandi ekyo kikabaho kiti:
Simooni Petero, na Tomasi oyetwa Mpasha, Natanaeli owa Kaana eya Galilaaya, na beene Zebedaayo, n'abandi batendekwa be babiri, bakaba bari hamwe.
Simooni Petero yaabagira ati: Ninza kujuba. Bamugarukamu bati: Naitwe ka tugyende naiwe. Batyo bagyenda, baza omu bwato, kwonka ekyo kiro tibagira ki baakwatsa.
Ku bwabaire nibusheesha, Yesu yaaboneka ayemereire aha nkungu; kwonka abatendekwa be tibaamumanya ku ari we.
Atyo ababuuza ati: Boojo 'mwe, mwine eki mwakwatsire? bamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha.
Abagira ati: Mutambikye akatimba aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'obwato, nimwija kugira eki mwakwatsa. Batyo bakatambika, kandi ahabw'ebyenyanja kuba bingi, baremwa kukakiriza kukata omu bwato.
Omutendekwa ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, agira Petero ati: Manya ni Mukama. Simooni Petero, ku ahurira ngu ni Mukama, ayezirika omwenda, ahabw'okuba akaba ajwaire busha, atyo ayejuguta omu maizi.
Abatendekwa abandi bo baizira omu bwato, nibakurura ako katimba kaijwire ebyenyanja, ahabw'okuba bakaba batari hare n'enkungu, entambwe nka igana.
Ku baahikire bati aha nkungu, baashangaho omuriro gw'amakara gutarikirweho ebyenyanja, n'emigaati eri aho.
Yesu abagira ati: Nimureete aha byenyanja ebi mwakwatsa.

Simooni Petero yaagaruka omu bwato, yaanyurura akatimba, yaakahitsya aha nkungu kaijwire ebyenyanja bihango igana na makumi ataano na bishatu: kandi nobu byabaire biri bingi bityo, kwonka akatimba tikaracwekire.
Yesu abagira ati: Nimwije murye ekyakasheeshe. Haza tihaabaho n'omwe omu batendekwa owaayehangire kumubuuza ati: Beitu ori oha? Bakamanyira kimwe ku ari Mukama.
Yesu atyo aija, akwata omugaati, agubaha, n'ebyenyanja atyo.
Ogwo gukaba omurundi gwa kashatu Yesu kweyoreka abatendekwa be, yaaheza kuzooka omu bafiire.

Ku baaherize kurya eky'akasheeshe, Yesu yaabuuza Simooni Petero ati: Simooni mwene Yohaana, nonkunda okukira aba? Amugarukamu ati: Eego, Mukama wangye; noomanya ku ndikukukunda. Yesu amugira ati: Riisa abaana b'entaama bangye.
Ayongyera amubuuza omurundi gwa kabiri ati: Simooni mwene Yohaana, nonkunda? Onu amugarukamu ati: Eego, Mukama wangye; noomanya ku ndikukukunda. Yesu amugira ati: Reeberera entaama zangye.

Bwanyima amubuuza omurundi gwa kashatu ati: Simooni mwene Yohaana, nonkunda? Petero kimusaasa ahabw'okumubuuza omurundi gwa kashatu ati Nonkunda? Amugira ati: Mukama wangye, noomanya byona; noomanya ku ndikukukunda. Yesu amugira ati: Riisa entaama zangye.
Buzimazima ninkugambira nti: Obu waabaire ori omutsigazi, okaba oyezirika, oza ei orikwenda; kwonka ku oriba omugurusi, oryagorora emikono, ondi akuzirikye, akutware ei otarikwenda.
Ebyo akabigamba naayoreka emifeere ei Petero arifamu kuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinwa. Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaamugira ati: Nkuratira.
Petero ahinduka, areeba omutendekwa, ou Yesu yaabaire akunda, abakuratiire, niwe ogwo owaamwegamiire omu kifuba nibarya, akamubuuza ati: Mukama, nooha oraakureebye?
Petero, ku amureeba, abuuza Yesu ati: Mukama wangye, mbwenu shi ogu aryaba ata?
Yesu amugarukamu ati: Ku ndaabe niinyenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya obu ndiija, iwe ekyo noofa ki nakyo? Ekyawe n'okunkuratira.

Bwanyima orukuru rwabuga omuri beene waabo, ku ogwo mutendekwa atarifa. Haza Yesu ataragizire ngu Yohaana tarifa, kureka ati: Ku ndaabe niinyenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya obu ndiija, iwe ekyo noofa ki nakyo?
Ogwo mutendekwa niwe arikuhamya ebyo byona, kandi niwe yaabihandiikire; reero nitumanya ngu ebi arikuhamya n'eby'amazima.
Hariho n'ebindi bingi ebi Yesu yaakozire; kuri noogira ngu byona bikahandiikwa, ningira ngu ensi yoona tekubaasize kuhikwamu bitabo byona ebyakuhandiikirwe.
Iwe Teofilo, omu kitabo kyangye ekyabadize, nkahandiika byona ebi Yesu yaakozire, n'ebi yaayegyeise okwiha aha kutandika,
okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaatwariirweho omu iguru, obwo aherize kuragiirira omuri Mutima Orikwera entumwa ze ezi yaabaire yaatooraine.
Ku yaaherize kufa, yaabeeyoreka emirundi mingi omu miringo erikuhamya ku ahuriire, kandi yaamara ebiro makumi ana naababonekyera, naabagambira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Ku yaabaire ari hamwe nabo aha byokurya, yaabeehanangiriza okutaruga muri Yerusalemu, kureka okutegyererezayo eki Ishe yaaraganiise. Yaabagira ati: Nikyo ekyo eki mwahuriire ningambaho nti:
Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi, kwonka imwe, omu biro bitari bingi okwiha hati, muryabatizibwa na Mutima Orikwera.
Abatendekwa ku baabaire bateeraniire hamwe, baabuuza Yesu bati: Mukama waitu, obu nibwo bunaku obu oraagarurireho Isiraeli obugabe?
Yaabagarukamu ati: Ti kyanyu kumanya obunaku, nari ebiro ebi Tata yaataisizeho obushoboorozi bwe.
Kwonka imwe, Mutima Orikwera ku aribaijaho, muryaheebwa amaani, kandi muryaba baakareebi bangye omuri Yerusalemu n'omuri Buyudaaya yoona, na Samariya n'okuhitsya ahu ensi egarukira.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaatwarwa ahaiguru nibamureeba, ekicu kyarugaho kyamubakingira.
Ku baabaire bakihangire eiguru amaisho naagyenda, ahonaaho haaboneka abashaija babiri bajwaire ebirikwera, beemereire haihi nabo.
Baabagira bati: Imwe Banyagalilaaya 'mwe, ekibeemereize aha nimureeba ahaiguru ni ki? Yesu ogwo owaabaihwaho akatwarwa omu iguru, nikwo arigaruka atyo nk'oku mwamureeba naazayo.
Batyo abatendekwa baagaruka Yerusalemu, nibaruga omu rushozi orurikwetwa orw'Emioliva, oruri haihi na Yerusalemu, nk'orugyendo orwabaire rugyendwa ahari Sabato.

Ku baahikire omuri orwo rurembo, baaza omuri kaanyinaabiri ei baabaire batwiremu; obwo bari: Petero na Yohaana, Yakobo na Andereya, Filipo na Tomasi, Baritolomaayo na Matayo, Yakobo mwene Alufaayo na Simooni enkunzi y'eihanga, na Yuda mwene Yakobo.
Abo boona bakaguma nibashaba bataireho munonga omutima kandi bakwataniise, hamwe n'abakazi bamwe na Mariya nyina wa Yesu na barumuna ba Yesu.
Omu biro ebyo Petero akeemerera ahagati ya beene waabo, abaabaire bari nka igana na makumi abiri omuri okwo kweteerana, yaabagira ati:
Beene waitu, ebyahandiikirwe bishemereire kuhikiirizibwa, ebi Mutima Orikwera yaagambiise Daudi, naaranga ebiriba ahari Yuda owaayehaireyo kwebembera abaakwatsire Yesu.
Manya Yuda akaba naabarirwa omuriitwe, kandi akwataniise naitwe omu buheereza bwaitu obu.
Nk'oku murikumanya, empiiha zi baamuguririire ahabw'ekicumuro kye, akaziguramu omusiri. Yuda ogwo akagwa bucuzi, yaabaruka, amara gaayohoka;
kyamanywa ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona. Nikyo ogwo musiri gwayeeteirwe Akeludama omu rurimi rwabo, amakuru ngu, Omusiri gw'Eshagama.
Manya omu kitabo kya Zaaburi kihandiikirwe ngu: Eka ye ehindukye eitongo, hatarigira omuntu owaagituuramu. Kandi ngu: Omurimo gwe gutwarwe ondi.
N'ahabw'ekyo tushemereire kutoorana omuntu, owaabaire atuura naitwe obunaku bwona obu Mukama waitu Yesu yaamazire naagyenda naitwe;

omuntu owaabaire ari hamwe naitwe, okwiha obu Yohaana yaabaire naabatiza, okuhitsya obu Yesu yaatwihwaho akatwarwa omu iguru. Omuntu nk'ogwo ashemereire kukora hamwe naitwe, ari kareebi w'okuzooka kwa Yesu.
Ku baaherize kureeta amaziina abiri g'ab'okutooranwa, Yosefu orikwetwa Barisaba, ou eiziina rye rya kabiri ryabaire riri Yusito, na Matiya,
baashaba bati: Ai Mukama, iwe omanya emitima y'abantu boona, otworekye ahari aba bombi, ou waatoorana kutwara obuheereza obu,
n'omwoga gw'obutumwa ogu Yuda yaatsigireho, akaza omu mwanya ogumushemeire.
Mpaho baabateerera enteenyu, yaakwata Matiya; yaayongyerwa aha ntumwa ikumi n'emwe.
Ekiro kya Pentekooti ku kyahikire, boona baashangwa bateeraniire omu mwanya gumwe.
Ahonaaho baahurira okuhoorera nk'okw'omuyaga gw'amaani nikuruga omu iguru. Kwaijura enju yoona ei baabaire bashutamimu,
kandi baareeba ekirikushusha endimi z'omuriro; ezo ndimi zaayebaganisamu, zaaza ahari buri omwe omuribo.
Boona baijura Mutima Orikwera, baatandika kugamba endimi ezindi nk'oku Mutima yaabahaire kuzigamba.
Obwo omuri Yerusalemu hakaba harimu Abayudaaya abeeziriki omu diini, abaabaire barugire omu mahanga goona g'omu nsi.
Ahabw'okuhoorera okwo, boona baateeranira hamwe bashobeirwe, ahabw'okuba buri omwe omuribo akahurira abo bantu nibagamba omu rurimi rw'owaabo.
Baatangaara bagwire omu kahuriko nibagira bati: Beitu aba bantu boona abarikugamba bati ti Abagalilaaya?
Mbwenu kyaruga hi buri omwe omuriitwe kuhurira nibagamba omu rurimi rwaitu rw'enzaarwa?
Haza turi Abapariti, Abameedi, Abeelamu; abatwire Mesopotamiya, Buyudaaya na Kapadokiya; Abaponto n'Abaasiya,
Abafurugiya n'Abapanfuliya; Abanyamisiri n'ab'ebicweka bya Libiya ebyehinguririize Kureene; otaireho n'abagyenyi abarugire Rooma, Abayudaaya, n'abataahiibwe omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya,
Abakureete n'Abaharabu; twena nitubahurira nibeegyesa omu rurimi rwaitu ebikuru ebi Ruhanga yaakozire.
Boona baatangaara bashobeirwe oku baraakishoboorore, nibabuuzana amakuru gaakyo.
Abandi baabashekyeerera, nibagira bati: Beetiihire viino y'omutahe.

Bwanyima Petero akeemerera na bari ikumi n'omwe, yaagambira ekimbuuro ky'abantu n'eiraka rihango ati: Imwe bantu ba Buyudaaya 'mwe, naimwe abatwire Yerusalemu, murekye kucuramirirwa, kureka mutegye okutu eki naaza kubagambira.
Abantu aba tibasinzire nk'oku murikuteekateeka; bakaasinzire bata, egi eri eshaaha ya kashatu ya nyomushana?
Manya eki nikyo kyarangirwe omurangi Yoeli, ati:

Ruhanga akagira ati: Omu biro by'aha muheru, ndyashuka Mutima wangye aha bantu boona. Batabani baanyu, na bahara baanyu baryaranga, abatsigazi baanyu baryabonekyerwa, n'abagurusi baanyu baroote ebirooto.
Kandi abahuuku bangye n'abazaana bangye omu biro ebyo nabo ndyabashukaho Mutima wangye, barangye.
Ndyayoreka eby'okutangaaza ahaiguru omu iguru n'obumanyiso ahansi omu nsi.
Eizooba riryahinduka omwirima, n'okwezi kube eshagama, ekiro kya Mukama ekikuru kandi eky'ekitiinisa kitakahikire.
Kandi obwo, weena orihoogyera eiziina rya Mukama, aryajunwa.

Bantu ba Isiraeli 'mwe, nimuhurire eki naaza kugamba: Yesu owa Nazareeti akaba ari omuntu ou Ruhanga yaabahamiize n'eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso, ebi yaamukoreise akiri omuriimwe, nk'oku mwena murikukimanya.

Yesu ogwo owaahairweyo ahariimwe, nk'enaama ya Ruhanga ei yaacumire oku yaabaire eri, n'oku yaakimanyire kitakabaireho, mukamukwata, mwamurekurira abantu abatategyekwa iteeka ryaitu, baamubamba. Mukamwita,
kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafiire, yaamwiha omu buhuruzi bwa rufu, ahabw'okuba kikaba kitarikubaasika we kuguma omu maino gaayo.
Na Daudi nikwo yaamugambireho ati: Nyakubaho niwe mpanga amaisho obutoosha, tihariho kibaasa kuntengyeetsa yaaba anyine.
Nikyo omutima gwangye gwesingiriza, orurimi rwangye rukatyongooza, n'omubiri gwangye gukabukaara,
ahabw'okuba toritsiga magara gangye okuzimu, nari okureka nkunzi yaawe kujunda.
Okaanyoreka omuhanda gw'amagara, oryampa okunanuka kwingi, ori hamwe naanye.
Beene waitu, tihariho orikuhakana, ngu tatenkuriitwe Daudi tarafiire, akaziikwa; reeba, n'ekituuro kye kiri aha ahi tutwire.
Kwonka nk'oku yaabaire ari omurangi, akamanya ku Ruhanga yaamurahiriire endahiro, ngu omwe aha baijukuru aryamuhungurira, aze aha kitebe ky'obugabe.
Eki yaareebire kare ekyo, akakigambaho, nikwo kuzooka kwa Kristo. Niwe ogwo otaratsigirwe kuzimu, kandi ou omubiri gwe gutararekirwe kujunda.
Ruhanga akazoora Yesu ogwo omu bafiire, naitwe twena turi baakareebi baakyo.
N'ahabw'kyo, Yesu ku yaaherize kutunguurwa akaza aha mukono gwa buryo gwa Ruhanga, n'okuheebwa Mutima Orikwera ou Ishe yaamuraganiise, niwe yaashuka ekyo eki murikureeba n'eki murikuhurira.
Manya Daudi we takatembaga mu iguru: kwonka ebi niwe yaabigambire ati: Nyakubaho akagambira Mukama wangye, ati: Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo,
okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe, endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe.
N'ahabw'ekyo ab'enju ya Isiraeli boona bamanyire kimwe ku Yesu ogwo ou mwabambire, Ruhanga yaamuhindwire Mukama kandi Kristo.
Ku baahuriire ekyo, baayomeserezibwa omu mutima, baagira Petero n'entumwa ezindi bati: Beene waitu, tugire tuta?
Petero yaabagarukamu ati: Mwegarukyemu, buri omwe omuriimwe abatizibwe omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo, mubone kusaasirwa ebibi byanyu; kandi nimwija kuheebwa ekiconco kya Mutima Orikwera.
Ahabw'okuba okuraganisibwa okwo n'okwanyu n'abaana baanyu n'abandi boona abari hare, boona abu Mukama Ruhanga waitu aryeyetera.
Petero yaamara omwanya muraingwa naabashoboororera bingi, kandi yaabeehanangiriza ati: Mwerokore, murugye omu b'obusingye obu obuhabire.
Mpaho abaikiriize ebigambo bye baabatizibwa. Eryo izooba abantu nk'enkumi ishatu baayongyerwa aha mubaro gwabo.
Abo bakaguma nibeezirikira ebi entumwa zirikubeegyesa, nibakwatanisa nazo, nibacwamu nazo omugaati kandi nibashaba nazo.
Eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bwingi ebyabaire nibikorwa entumwa, byareetera omuntu weena kutiina.
Abaikiriize abo boona bakaguma bari hamwe, nibakwatanisa omu bi batungire byona.
Bakaba batunda ebintu byabo n'ebi baine; ebyarugamu babibagana, nibareeba aha bukyene bwa buri omwe.
Buri izooba bakaba baza kumwe omuri Nyaruju, kandi bateeranira hamwe omu maka gaabo kucwamu omugaati; barya ebyokurya byabo bashemereirwe, baine omutima murungi,
nibahimbisa Ruhanga kandi nibasiimwa abantu boona. Buri izooba Mukama yaaguma naabongyeraho abarikujunwa.
Eizooba rimwe Petero na Yohaana ku baabaire nibaza omuri Nyaruju ya Mukama kushaba, aha shaaha ya mwenda ya nyomushana,

baareeba abaheekire omuntu nibamurabyaho. Ogwo muntu akaba azairwe ari ekirema, kandi buri izooba bakaba bamuta aha irembo rya Nyaruju, eririkwetwa Eirembo Erirungi, ngu abone kusheega abarikutaahamu.
Ogwo mushaija, ku yaareebire Petero na Yohaana nibaza kutaaha omuri Nyaruju, yaabashaba.
Petero na Yohaana bombi baamutsimba eriisho, baamugira bati: Tuhangye amaisho.
Ahonaaho yaabahanga amaisho aine amatsiko g'okutunga eki baraamuhe.
Kwonka Petero yaamugira ati: Nyowe tiinyine feeza nari ezaabu, kureka eki nyine nikyo ndaakuhe; omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti, gyenda.
Petero atyo amukwata omukono gwa buryo, amwimutsya. Ahonaaho ebigyere bye n'obukongoijo bwe bihama,
abandaituka, ayemerera, atandika kugyenda; ataaha nabo omuri Nyaruju naagyenda, naayemurika, naahimbisa Ruhanga.
Abantu boona bamureeba naagyenda kandi naahimbisa Ruhanga.
Ku baamanyire ngu niwe mushaija ori, owaabaire ashutama naasheegyera aha Irembo Erirungi erya Nyaruju, boona baagwa omu katangaaro, batarikubaasa kushoboorora ekyamubaho.
Omushaija ogwo ku yaabaire akiramatiire ahari Petero na Yohaana omu kisasi ekirikwetwa ekya Solomooni, abantu boona baabaizira nibairuka, bari omu katangaaro kahango.

Petero ku yaabareebire, yaabagambira ati: Imwe Baisiraeli 'mwe, ahabw'enki eki nikibatangaaza? Nari shi, nimutushamaaririra ki, okashusha oti niitwe twamugyendesa ahabw'amaani gaitu, nari ahabw'obushongore bwaitu ahari Ruhanga?
Ruhanga wa Aburahamu, Isaaka na Yakobo, Ruhanga wa baatataitwe, niwe yaahimbisisa omuheereza we Yesu, ou mwahaireyo mukamwehakanira omu maisho ga Pilaato, owaabaire yaacwiremu kumurekura.
Niimwe mwatabaariize Orikwera kandi Ohikiriire; hoona niimwe mwashabire omwitsi kurekurwa,
mukaita okomookwaho amagara. Kwonka Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire, kandi niitwe baakareebi baakyo.

Mwbenu eiziina rye n'okuriikiriza nibyo byagarura amaani omuri ogu mushaija, ou murikureeba ari aha, kandi ou murikumanya. Buzimazima okwikiriza Yesu nikwo kwagaruramu ogu mushaija amagara, nk'oku mwena murikureeba.
Mbwenu, beene waitu, nimmanya imwe n'abeebembezi baanyu ekyo ku mwakikoreise obushema;
ahabw'okuba okwo nikwo Ruhanga yaahikiiriize eki yaagambiise kare abarangi boona, ngu Kristo we aryabonabonesibwa.
Mbwenu mwegarukyemu, mukubuukire Ruhanga, ebibi byanyu biihweho. Obwo nibwo Mukama araabahe obunaku bw'okuruhuukiramu,
akabooherereza Kristo ou yaabateekateekyeire.
Niwe Yesu origuma omu iguru okuhitsya okugarurwa busya kwa byona, oku Ruhanga yaarangiise abarangi be abarikwera.
Manya Musa akagira ati: Mukama Ruhanga aryabaimukiza omurangi nkaanye, naamwiha omuri beene waanyu. Mushemereire kuhurira kyona eki arikubagambira.
Omuntu weena otarihurira murangi ogwo, aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye.
N'eky'amazima, abarangi boona abaarangire okwiha ahari Samueli n'okweyongyerayo, bakagamba aha biro ebi.
Imwe muri abaana b'abarangi, kandi abahunguzi b'endagaano ei Ruhanga yaaragaine na baatataitwe, obu yaagira Aburahamu ati: Omu ruzaaro rwawe, nimwo enganda zoona ez'omu nsi ziriheerwa omugisha.
Niimwe Ruhanga yaabandize kwimukiza omuheereza we, akamutuma kubaha emigisha, naiha buri omwe omuriimwe omu mitwarize yaanyu emibi.
Petero na Yohaana ku baabaire nibakigamba n'abantu, baayecura abahongyerezi baine omukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju hamwe n'Abasadukaayo.
Abo bakagwisibwa kubi okuhurira entumwa ezo zombi nizeegyesa abantu, kandi nizibarangirira ku okuzooka kw'abafiire kubonekyeire omuri Yesu.
Batyo baabakwata, baabarindira omu kihome okuhitsya omu kasheeshe, ahabw'okuba bukaba bwabaire omwabazyo.
Kwonka baingi omu baahuriire obutumwa bwabo, bakaikiriza; omubaro gwona ogw'abaikiriza gwayeyongyera, gwahika nk'enkumi itaano.
Aha izooba eryakuratsireho, abategyeki, abakuru b'enganda, n'abahangu b'eiteeka bakateeranira omuri Yerusalemu,
hamwe na Anasi omuhongyerezi omukuru, Kayaafa, Yohaana, Alekisandero, na boona ab'omuryango gw'abahongyerezi abakuru.
Baayemereza ezo ntumwa omu maisho gaabo, baatandika kubabuuza bati: Imwe bashaija 'mwe, ni bushoboorozi ki obubakoreise eki, kandi mukikozire omu iziina ry'oha?
Petero aijwire Mutima Orikwera nikwo kubagambira ati: Imwe bategyeki b'abantu n'abakuru b'enganda 'mwe,
eri izooba ku muraabe nimutubuuza ekitukoreise eky'embabazi aha kirema n'oku kikiziibwe,

mbwenu, imwe mwena hamwe n'abantu ba Isiraeli boona, mumanye eki: eiziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti, ou mwabambire aha musharaba, Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire, eiziina rye eryo niryo rikirize ogu muntu oyemereire omu maisho gaanyu.
Yesu ogwo niwe ibaare eri imwe abombeki mwayangire, rikahinduka obuhamizo bw'enju.
Kandi tihariho ndiijo u twakutungiramu okujunwa, ahabw'okuba omu maziina goona ageetwa abantu omu nsi, tihariho rindi iziina eri turi ab'okujunirwamu.
Ab'eishengyero ku baareebire obumanzi bwa Petero na Yohaana, haza nibabamanya ku bari abantu b'obutoosha abateegyesiibwe, baatangaara, kandi baabamanya ku baabaire batuura na Yesu.
Kwonka ku baareebire omuntu okiziibwe abeemereire aha rubaju, baaburwa eki baraabatabaarize.
Nikwo kubaragiira kwemerera aheeru y'eishengyero, bo bakaguma nibahanuura bonka na bonka,

nibabuuzana bati: Mbwenu aba bantu tubagire tuta? Ahabw'okuba akamanyiso akarikutangaaza kakozirwe abo bantu omu maisho g'ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona, ensi yoona neereeba, kandi titurikubaasa kukeehakana.
Kwonka ahabw'okwenda kubazibira kwongyera kubuzya ekyo kintu omu bantu, ka tubateise, barekyere aho kugambira omuntu weena omuri eryo iziina.
Batyo baabeeta, baabeehanangiriza kutagaruka kugamba bundi, nari kwegyesa omu iziina rya Yesu.
Kwonka Petero na Yohaana baabagarukamu bati: Naimwe mukireebe ku kiraabe kihikire omu maisho ga Ruhanga, okubahurira imwe okukira okuhurira Ruhanga.
Titurikubaasa kutagamba ebi twareebire n'ebi twahuriire.
Eishengyero ryagaruka ryabeehanangiriza, bwanyima ryabarekura. Manya tibarareebire buryo bw'okubahaisa ekifubiro, ahabw'okuba abantu boona bakaba nibahimbisa Ruhanga ahabw'ekibaireho.
Ahabw'okuba ogwo muntu owaakoreirweho aka kamanyiso k'okukizibwa, akaba arengize emyaka makumi ana y'obukuru.
Petero na Yohaana ku baaherize bati kurekurwa, baaza omu b'ekigombe kyabo, baabateekyerereza byona ebi abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga babagambiire.
Ku baabihuriire, boona hamwe baimukiza Ruhanga eiraka nibamushaba bati: Nyakusinga, niiwe waahangire eiguru n'ensi n'amayanja na byona ebirimu.
Niiwe waagambiire omuri Mutima Orikwera, okagambisa tataitwe Daudi omuheereza waawe, oti: Beitu n'enki ekireeteire amahanga kwimukiirira, n'abantu kuza omu naama zitaine muhoho?
Abagabe b'ensi nibatenga orugamba, n'abategyeki nibacuma enaama y'okurwanisa Nyakubaho n'omusiigwa we.
N'ekya buzima, omuri oru rurembo Herode na Pontio Pilaato bakakwatanisa n'Abanyamahanga n'abantu ba Isiraeli, kurwanisa omuheereza waawe Ohikiriire Yesu ou waasiigire,
obwo nibahikiiriza eki waamaririire ira omu maani gaawe n'omu bwengye bwawe ngu kibeho.
Mbwenu Mukama, reeba okukangisa kwabo, ohwere abaheereza baawe, bagambe ekigambo kyawe n'obumanzi bwingi.
Gorora omukono gwawe okize, kandi oikirize obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bikorwe omu iziina ry'omuheereza waawe Ohikiriire Yesu.
Ku baaherize kushaba, omwanya ogu baabaire bateeraniiremu gwatengyeeta; boona baijura Mutima Orikwera, baatandika kugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obumanzi.
Ekigombe kyona eky'abaikiriza kikaguma kikwataniise n'omutima gumwe. Tihariho owaabaire agira obunyakantu aha bi atungire, ahabw'okuba byona ebi baabaire batungire bikaba biri ebyabo boona hamwe.
Entumwa zaagumizamu n'amaani maingi nizigamba eby'okuzooka omu bafiire kwa Mukama Yesu, kandi zoona zaaguma nizisiimwa munonga.
Tihariho n'omwe omuribo owaabaire agira eki akyenire. Manya abaabaire baine ebibanja nari amaju, bakaba babitunda, batwara empiiha ezaabirugamu,
bazimurikira entumwa; reero zibaganisibwa, ziheebwa buri omwe nk'okwetenga kwe oku kwabaire kuri.
Hakaba hariho Omuleevi, enzaarwa ya Kupuro orikwetwa Yosefu, ou entumwa zaakubize Barinaba (amakuru gaaryo ngu Kiteeramuhimbo).
Akaba aine ekibanja, yaakitunda, yaareeta empiiha zaakyo yaazimurikira entumwa.
Mbwenu hakaba hariho omushaija orikwetwa Ananiya. We n'omukazi we Safiira baikirizana kutunda aha bintu byabo.
Kwonka Ananiya ogwo yaatsigaza ekicweka ky'empiiha ezaarugiremu, omukazi we naakimanya; yaareeta ezaatsigaireho, yaazimurikira entumwa.
Petero nikwo kumugira ati: Ananiya, Sitaane akwitsire ata omutima kubeiha Mutima Orikwera, okatsigaza ekicweka ky'empiiha z'ekibanja?

Obu obaire okikiine, kibaire kitari ekyawe? Kandi ku oherize kukitunda, empiiha zibaire zitari ezaawe kuzikoresa eki orikwenda? Ekiteekateeko eki kikurugiire hi? Tiwaabeiha bantu, kureka waabeiha Ruhanga.
Ananiya ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo, yaayetuura ahansi, yaakinuka. Ekyo kyatiinisa munonga boona abaakihuriire.
Abatsigazi baimuka, bazinga omutumbi gwe omu mwenda, baagushohoza, baaguziika.
Ku haahingwireho eshaaha nka ishatu, omukazi we yaija atarikumanya kyabaho.
Petero amwomesereza, naamugira ati: Ngambira, ogu nigwo mubaro gw'empiiha zi mwaiha omu kibanja? Onu amugarukamu ati: Eego, nigwo ogwo.
Petero nikwo kumugira ati: Ahabw'enki iwe na baro mwikirizaine kugyeza Mutima wa Mukama? Ekibakoreise ekyo ni ki? Ohuriire egyo mitsindo? Abo n'abaaruga kuziika baro; mbwenu naiwe baaza kukushohoza.
Ahonaaho ogwo mukazi yaayetuura aha bigyere bya Petero, yaakinuka. Abatsigazi abo ku baataahiremu, baashanga yaafiire; baamushohoza aheeru, nawe baamuziika aha rubaju rwa iba.
Ekyo kyatiinisa munonga ekigombe ky'abaikiriza n'abandi boona abaakihuriire.
Obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bingi bikaba bikorwa entumwa omu bantu. Abaikiriza boona bakaba bateeranira omu kisasi kya Solomooni n'omutima gumwe.
Hakaba hatabaho n'omwe otari w'abaabo owaabaire ayehanga kuteerana nabo, nobu abantu baabaire babasiima munonga.
Kandi omubaro gw'abashaija n'abakazi abaikiriize Mukama gukaguma nigukanya;
n'okutwara baatwara abarwaire baabo, baabarambika omu nguuto aha bitanda n'omu butanda, ngu abamwe aharibo bakaahikwaho ekinyimanyimi kya Petero, yaaba naahingura.
Kandi abantu bakaba bahimintika, nibaruga omu birorero ebihereereire Yerusalemu, bareetsire abarwaire baabo n'abarikwitwa kubi ebyago, haza boona bakira.
Bwanyima omuhongyerezi omukuru hamwe n'ab'omu kigombe ky'Abasadukaayo abu yaabaire aine, baimuka ahabw'eihari,
baakwata entumwa, baazita omu kihome ekya boona.
Kwonka nyekiro maraika wa Nyakubaho yaigura enyigi z'ekyo kihome; kandi ku yaabaire naabashohoza, yaabagira ati:
Mugyende, mwemerere omuri Nyaruju, mugambire abantu ebigambo byona eby'amagara masya.

Batyo baakora nk'oku baagambiirwe, baaza omuri Nyaruju nibwaba, baatandika kwegyesa. Omuhongyerezi omukuru ku yaizire, we n'abarikumukwatsa baayeta eishengyero erikuru ryona erya Isiraeli; baatuma aha barinzi b'ekihome kubareetera ezo ntumwa.
Kwonka abakungu abaatumirwe ku baahikire omu kihome, baashanga batarimu, batyo baagarukayo, baabiteekyerereza abaabatumire bati:
Twashanga ekihome kikingiire kimwe, n'abarinzi bari aha miryango; kwonka ku twakomoorora orwigi, twashanga hatarimu muntu n'omwe.
Omukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju hamwe n'abahongyerezi abakuru ku baahuriire egyo nkuru, baatangaara batarikumanya oku abo bantu baabaire n'ekiraarugyemu.
Bwanyima haija omuntu, yaabareetera amakuru, naagira ati: Abashaija bu mutaire omu kihome, obwa hati beemereire omuri Nyaruju nibeegyesa abantu.
Ogwo mukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju nikwo kugyenda n'abashaija be akareeta ezo ntumwa. Kwonka baatiina kubakwatisa amaani, ngu abantu batakaabateera amabaare.
Ku baabareetsire omu maisho g'eishengyero, omuhongyerezi omukuru yaababuuza,

ati: Titurabeehanangiriize kutashubira kwegyesa omu iziina ry'ogwo muntu? Mbwenu eki, mukozire ki? Yerusalemu mugibugize enyegyesa yaanyu kandi nimureebeka mumaririire kuba niitwe mwataho orubanja rw'okufa kw'ori muntu.
Petero n'ezindi ntumwa nabo baamugarukamu bati: Manya itwe tushemereire kworobera Ruhanga okukira okworobera abantu.
Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe niwe yaazoire Yesu ogwo, ou mwaitsire mumuhanikire aha muti.
Mbwenu Ruhanga akamutunguura, yaamuta aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo kuba Omwebembezi kandi Omujuni, ngu abone kuhaisa Abaisiraeli okweteisa n'okusaasirwa ebibi.
Itwe turi baakareebi b'ebyo byona hamwe na Mutima Orikwera ou Ruhanga yaahaire abarikumworobera.
Ku baahuriire ebyo, ekiniga kyabacwa amaraka, baayenda kubaita.
Kwonka omwe aha b'eishengyero, Omufarisaayo orikwetwa Gamalieli, omwegyesa w'eiteeka kandi orikusiimwa abantu boona, akeemerera, yaashaba ku baba bashohoize abo bashaija aheeru.
Bwanyima yaagambira ab'eishengyero ati: Imwe bashaija ba Isiraeli 'mwe, mwerinde oku muraatwaze aba bantu.

Omu biro byahingwire, hakaba hariho Teuda owaabaire mubi rurangaanwa, akeehindura mukuru, abantu nka magana ana baamukuratira. Kwonka ku yaitsirwe, abaabaire nibamukuratira baataataana, ebyabo byagarukira aho.
Kandi hoona, omu biro by'orubaro, hakaba hariho Yuda Omunyagalilaaya, owaayetungiire abantu baingi b'okumukwatsa. Kwonka nawe akaitwa, abakuratsi be boona baataataana.
Mbwenu obwengye bu ndikubaha, n'okubareka bakagyenda. Enaama yaabo egi n'omurimo gwabo ku biraabe birugire omu bantu, nibiija kuhwaho byonka.
Kwonka ku biraabe birugire ahari Ruhanga, timurikwija kubaasa kubizibira, kureka nimwija kweshanga nimurwanisa Ruhanga.
Obwengye bu yaabahaire baabusiima, baagaruka baayeta ezo ntumwa, baaragiira kubaasha, baabeehanangiriza kutagarukira kugamba omu iziina rya Yesu, bwanyima baabarekura.
Batyo baaruga omu maisho g'eishengyero, nibeesiima ahabw'okuhiirwa bakahemurwa nibaturwa eryo iziina.
Baaguma nibeegyesa kandi nibarangirira buri izooba omuri Nyaruju n'omu maju g'abantu eby'Amakuru Marungi ga Yesu Kristo.

Omu bunaku obwo, omubaro gw'abaikiriza ku gwagyenzire nigukanya, Abayudaaya abarikugamba Oruguriiki baayetomboitera Abayudaaya abrikugamba Oruheburaayo omu by'okugabura okwa buri izooba, ahabw'okuba abafaakazi baabo bakaba batarikwetwaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo eikumi na babiri baayeta abaikiriza boona kuteerana, baabagambira bati: Tikihikire itwe okureka kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga, tukahugira aha kugabura ebyokurya.
Mbwenu, imwe beene waitu, mwetooranemu abantu mushanju abarikusiimwa, abaijwire Mutima n'obwengye, tubakwatse omurimo ogu.
Reero itwe nitwija kwemarira aha kushaba n'okwegyesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.

Abaateeraine boona baasiima ekyo kigambo, baatoorana Sitefano, omuntu oine okwikiriza kwingi kandi oijwire Mutima Orikwera, na Filipo, Porookoro, Nikanoori, Timooni, Parimena, na Nikola owa Antiokiya, owaahindukire akataaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya.
Baabareeta omu maisho g'entumwa, zaabashabira, zaabataho engaro.
Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongyera kubuga; omubaro gw'abaikiriza gwakanya munonga omuri Yerusalemu, n'abahongyerezi baingi munonga baikiriza kukuratira enyikiriza egyo.
Sitefano, ou Ruhanga yaahaire emigisha mingi n'amaani, akatandika kukora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bikuru omu bantu.
Reero abantu baija baahakanisa Sitefano ogwo; abamwe nibaruga omu iteeraniro eririkwetwa ery'Abaarekwirwe n'ab'ery'Abakureene n'ab'ery'Abaalekisanderiya n'abandi abaarugire Kilikiya na Asiya.
Kwonka tibarabaasize kumusinga, ahabw'okuba akaba aine obwengye kandi na Mutima amuhaire eby'okugamba.
Batyo baaguriirira ab'okumubeiherera bati: Tukahurira naagamba eby'okurogota ahari Musa n'ahari Ruhanga.
Ku baaherize kuteerana abantu hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga n'abahangu b'eiteeka, baamugwaho kigurukano, baamukwata, baamutwara omu maisho g'eishengyero.
Okwo niyo baareeteire baamushinja b'ebishuba, abaagizire bati: Ogu mushaija tayosha kugamba kubi aha mwanya ogurikwera n'aha iteeka ryaitu.
Tukamuhurira naagira ngu Yesu owa Nazareeti naija kucwekyereza omwanya ogu, n'okuhindura emigyenzo ei Musa yaatutsigiire.
Boona ab'omu ishengyero baahanga Sitefano amaisho, kandi ahamaisho ge haashusha nk'ahamaisho ga maraika.
Omuhongyerezi omukuru akabuuza Sitefano ati: N'eky'amazima, nikwo kiri?
Onu yaagarukamu ati: Beene waitu na baataata, nimuhurire! Ruhanga ow'ekitiinwa akabonekyera tataitwe Aburahamu, akiri Mesopotamiya, atakatwire Harani,
yaamugira ati: Ruga omu nsi yaanyu, n'omu b'oruganda rwanyu, oze mu nsi ei ndikworeka.
Atyo yaaruga Kalidaaya, yaatuura Harani. Bwanyima ishe ku yaafiire, Ruhanga yaamwihayo, yaamureeta omu nsi egi ei mutwiremu obwa hati.
Ruhanga taramuhaire nangwa n'ah'okuta ekigyere omuri egi nsi, ahu arikweta ahakwe ahabwe; kwonka akamuraganisa kugimuha, na bwanyima ebe ey'abaijukuru, nobu araabe yaabaire ari encwekye.
Ebigambo ebi Ruhanga yaamugambiire naagamba nawe, nibigira ngu, abaijukuru baryazaahibwa omu rindi ihanga, ei baribeera abahuuku, bakamarayo emyaka magana ana nibahatwa.
Kandi ati: Kwonka eihanga eiribahindura abahuuku ndyaricwera orubanja, bwanyima barugyeyo, bandamize omu mwanya ogu.

Atyo Ruhanga yaakora na Aburahamu endagaano eyaahamiibwe omugyezo gw'okusharwa. Omutabani Isaaka ku yaazairwe, Aburahamu yaamushara aha kiro kya munaana. Isaaka nawe nikwo yaashazire Yakobo, na Yakobo akashara atyo baatataitwe ikumi na babiri.
Baatataitwe abo bakagirira Yosefu eihari, baamuguza abaamutwaire Misiri kuba omuhuuku. Kwonka Ruhanga yaaguma nawe,

yaamurabya omu busaasi bwe bwona, yaamuha obwengye obwamureeteire kushongoka ahari Faraaho omugabe wa Misiri. Faraaho akahindura Yosefu ogwo omutegyeki mukuru wa Misiri, yaamuha n'okureeberera ekikaari kye kyona.
Bwanyima enjara ekateera Misiri yoona na Kanaani, yaazireetera omugango mwingi; baatataitwe baabura ekyokurya.
Yakobo, ku yaahuriire ngu Misiri hariyo engano z'okushaka, yaayoherezayo baatataitwe omurundi gw'okubanza.
Bwanyima aha murundi gwa kabiri, Yosefu yaayetondera bakuru be, kandi obuzaare bwe bwamanywa Faraaho.
Mpaho Yosefu nikwo kutuma kureeta Yakobo ishe n'ab'oruganda rwe boona, abantu makumi mushanju na bataano;
atyo Yakobo yaashuuma Misiri. We na baatataitwe ku baaherize kugwayo,
emitumbi yaabo yaatwarwa Shekemu, yaaziikwa omu kituuro eki Aburahamu yaabaire aguzire ahari batabani ba Hamori omuri Shekemu.
Obu obunaku bw'okuhikiiriza eki Ruhanga yaabaire araganiise Aburahamu bwabaire buri haihi kuhika, eihanga ryaitu rikaba ryakanyire munonga omuri Misiri,
okuhitsya obu omugabe musya, owaabaire atarikumanya Yosefu, yaagiire aha ngoma omuri Misiri.
Akeehindukiriza ab'eihanga ryaitu, akaita kubi baatataitwe, naabagyemesereza kunaga abeereere baabo, ngu batakaagumaho.
Obwo nibwo Musa yaazaarwa, ari omwana murungi orikusiimwa Ruhanga. Akamara ameezi ashatu naarererwa omwa ishe;
kandi ku baaherize kumunaga, muhara wa Faraaho yaamutwara, yaamworora nk'omwana we.
Musa yaayegyesibwa atyo eby'obwengye bw'Abanyamisiri byona, yaaba omushaija w'amaani omu bi arikugamba n'omu bi arikukora.
Musa ku yaahikize emyaka makumi ana y'obukuru, yaagira ekiteekateeko ky'okuza kureeba abantu b'eihanga rye Abaisiraeli.
Ku yaareebire omwe omuribo naatwazibwa kubi, yaamurwanaho, yaamuhoorera, yaita Omunyamisiri.
Akateekateeka ngu beene ishe nibaija kumanya ku niwe Ruhanga atumire kubaiha omu buhuuku, kwonka bo tibaakimanya.
Eizooba eryakuratsireho, ku yaashangire bamwe omuribo nibarwana, yaateeraho kubagarukanisa, yaabagira ati: Bagyenzi bangye, ka muri eishe-emwe, ahabw'enki nimushaagizana?
Kwonka omushaija owaabaire naashaagiza mugyenzi we, yaamwesha naagira ati: N'oha owaakutaireho kuba omutegyeki kandi omuramuzi waitu?
Nooyenda kuunyita nk'oku oitsire Omunyamisiri nyomwabazyo?
Musa ku yaakihuriire, yaahunga, yaaza kutuura omu nsi ya Midiyani, ei yaazaariire abatabani babiri.
Ku haahingwireho emyaka makumi ana, maraika yaabonekyera Musa omu ndimi z'omuriro, ogwabaire nigwakira omu rushaka omu ihamba, haihi n'Orushozi Sinai.
Musa ku akireeba, kimutangaaza. Ku airira haihi kukyetegyereza, ahurira eiraka rya Nyakubaho nirimugira riti:
Niinye Ruhanga wa baashwenkuru, Ruhanga wa Aburahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo. Musa atetema, atiina kureebayo obundi.
Nyakubaho amugira ati: Juura enkaito zaawe, ahabw'okuba omwanya ogu oyemereiremu n'ogurikwera.
Buzimazima ndeebire oku abantu bangye barikwitwa kubi omuri Misiri, mpuriire entsinda yaabo; hati naija kubaiha omu buhuuku. Mbwenu ija, nkutume Misiri.

Musa ori, ou baayangire obu baagira bati: N'oha owaakutaireho kuba omutegyeki kandi omuramuzi waitu, mbwenu niwe Ruhanga yaatuma kuba omwebembezi kandi omucunguzi, naahwerwa maraika owaamubonekyeire omu rushaka.
Niwe Musa owaaherize kukora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso omuri Misiri, akabaihayo naabarabya omu Nyanja Erikutukura n'omu ihamba, okumara emyaka makumi ana.
Kandi Musa ogwo niwe yaagambiire Abaisiraeli ati: Ruhanga aryabaimukiza omurangi nkaanye, arugye omuri beene waanyu.

Niwe ogwo owaabaire aine Abaisiraeli obu baateranira omu ihamba, hamwe na maraika owaamugambiriire aha Rushozi Sinai, kandi akagamba na baatataitwe. Niwe ogwo owaakwatsiibwe ebigambo by'amagara kubituha.
Ogwo niwe baatataitwe baayangire kworobera, bakamwesha; omu mitima yaabo bakagaruka Misiri,
nibagira Arooni bati: Tukorere baaruhanga, batwebembere, ahabw'okuba titurikumanya oku Musa, owaatwihire omuri Misiri, abaire.
Batyo baaheesha ekimasha, baahongyera ekyo kishushani ebitambo, bashemerererwa ekyo kintu ki baayekoreire.

Ruhanga nikwo kubatsigaho, akabareka, bakaramya amahe g'eby'omu iguru, nk'oku ebyahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'abarangi birikugira ngu: Imwe b'enju ya Isiraeli 'mwe, nimugira ngu omu ihamba eri mwamaziremu emyaka makumi ana, niinye mwahongyeire ebihongwa, mukantambira n'ebitambo?
Ngaaha, manya ebi mwaheekire aha mabega, n'eihema rya Moleki hamwe n'enyonyoozi y'emandwa Refani, ebyo bishushani ebi mwakozire kuramya. N'ahabw'ekyo ndyabazaasya, mbahinguze Babulooni.

Baatataitwe obu baabaire bakiri omu ihamba, bakaba baine Eihema ry'Obutaaho bwa Ruhanga eryabaire rikozirwe nk'oku Ruhanga yaaragiire Musa, naamugambira kurikora naareebera aha rugyero oru yaamworekire.

Eryo ihema baatataitwe bakaguma nibaritsigirana, okuhitsya obu Yoshua yaarihikize omu nsi ei twakubwire, tuginyagire amahanga agu Ruhanga yaabingiremu nitukihikamu. Ryaguma omwo okuhitsya omu busingye bwa Daudi,
owaashongokire ahari Ruhanga, akamushaba kumwikiriza kumwombekyera Nyaruju ya Ruhanga wa Yakobo;
Solomooni nobu araabe niwe yaayombekire egyo nju.
Kwonka Rukiraboona we tatuura mu nju eyombekirwe emikono y'abantu, nk'oku Mukama yaagambiire omu murangi ati:
Eiguru n'ekitebe kyangye ky'obugabe, n'ensi n'endibatiro yangye. Mbwenu ni nju ki ei mwakuunyombekyera? Ni mwanya ki ogu mwakumbonereza kuhuumuriramu?
Ebyo byona tiinye naabikozire n'omukono gwangye?
Imwe ntahurira 'mwe, ab'emitima egangaire n'amatu gaigaire nk'ag'Abanyamahanga, obutoosha mwangira Mutima Orikwera nka baatataitwe oku baabaire bagira.
Harabaireho omurangi n'omwe ou baatataitwe batarahiiganiise? Omu biro byahingwire bakaita entumwa za Ruhanga ezaarangire eby'okwija kw'Orikwera we Ohikiriire, ou imwe mwareebize mukaita,
imwe, abaahairwe eiteeka murireeteirwe baamaraika, haza mukanga kuryorobera.
Ab'eishengyero ku baahuriire ebyo, ekiniga kyabacwa amaraka, baanenera Sitefano amaino.
Na Sitefano ogwo aijwire Mutima Orikwera yaaranzya omu iguru, yaareeba Ruhanga ow'ekitiinwa, na Yesu amwemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo.
Yaagira ati: Nindeeba eiguru rishuuruukire, n'Omwana w'omuntu ayemereire aha rubaju rwa Ruhanga orwa buryo.
Boona ku baahuriire ekyo, baayogoorekana, baayekwata aha matu, baamweshukaho,
baamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo, baamuteera amabaare. Baamushinja be baanaga emyenda yaabo aha bigyere by'omutsigazi orikwetwa Saulo.
Ku baabaire nibateera Sitefano amabaare, yaahooga ati: Ai Mukama Yesu, yakiira amagara gangye.
Atyo yaatsimba amaju, yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Ai Mukama, otabatura ekibi eki. Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo, yaakaba. Na Saulo yaasiima okwitwa kwe.
Eryo izooba ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Yerusalemu baatandika kuhiiganisibwa munonga. Boona, okwihaho entumwa, baataataanira omu byanga bya Buyudaaya na Samariya.
Kwonka abantu abarikutiina Ruhanga baaziika Sitefano ogwo, baamucurira munonga.
Saulo nawe yaakora kyona eki arikubaasa kuhwerekyereza abaikiriza, yaataaha omuri buri nju, yaakwata abashaija n'abakazi, yaaboohereza omu kihome.
Abo baikiriza abaataataine bakagyendagyenda nibabuzya Amakuru Marungi.
Omwe omuribo ni Filipo, owaagiire omu kirorero ky'omuri Samariya, akabagambira ebya Kristo.
Ekimbuuro ky'abantu, ku baahuriire ebi Filipo arikugamba, baareeba n'obumanyiso obu arikukora, baikiriza n'omutima gumwe ebi arikwegyesa.
Kandi baingi abaabaire batembirwe ebyago byabarugaho nibyamuza, na baingi abaabaire bazingazingirwe n'abarema baakizibwa.
Haabaho okushemererwa kwingi omuri ekyo kirorero.
Kwonka omuri ekyo kirorero hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Simooni, owaabaire naakora emigyereko, naatangaaza Abanyasamariya. Akaba naayeyeta omuntu mukuru,
kandi boona okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru baamwemamu, nibagira bati: Ogu niwe maani ga Ruhanga agarikwetwa Rugambwa.
Ekyo bakakikora ahabw'okuba akaba amazire nabo omwanya muraingwa naabakorera egyo migyereko.
Kwonka ku baikiriize Amakuru Marungi, agu Filipo yaabagambiire aha by'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'aha by'eiziina rya Yesu Kristo, abashaija n'abakazi baabatizibwa.
Simooni nawe yaikiriza. Ku yaaherize kubatizibwa, yaaguma na Filipo naareeba obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebikuru ebi Filipo yaabaire naakora, kandi nibimutangaaza.
Omuri Yerusalemu entumwa ku zaahuriire ngu ab'omu Samariya baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga, zaabatumaho Petero na Yohaana.
Nabo ku baahikireyo, baashabira Abanyasamariya kuheebwa Mutima Orikwera,
ahabw'okuba hakaba hatariho n'omwe omuribo ou yaabaire yaizireho, kureka bakaba babatiziibwe, omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu kwonka.
Batyo Petero na Yohaana baabataho engaro, baaheebwa Mutima Orikwera.
Simooni ku yaareebire baaheebwa Mutima ahabw'entumwa kubataho engaro, yaaha Petero na Yohaana empiiha,
naagira ati: Naanye mumpe obushoboorozi nk'obwo, weena ou ndaateho engaro aheebwe Mutima Orikwera.
Petero yaamugarukamu ati: Haza ogira ngu ekiconco kya Ruhanga nikigurwa empiiha? Kakyengyere n'ezo mpiiha zaawe!
Ekyo tokiinemu mugabo kandi tori w'okukibagana, ahabw'okuba omutima gwawe tiguri gye omu maisho ga Ruhanga.
Yeteise ekyo kibi kyawe, oshabe Mukama akusaasire ahabw'okuteekateeka otyo.
Manya nindeeba ku oitsirwe eihari, kandi ku obohirwe enjegyere z'ekibi.
Simooni nikwo kubagarukamu ati: Naimwe munshabire ahari Mukama, ebyo ebi mwagamba hatagira ekyambaho.
Ku baaherize kugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okukihamya, baagaruka Yerusalemu nibarangirira ab'omu byaro bya Samariya Amakuru Marungi.
Maraika wa Nyakubaho yaagambira Filipo ati: Imuka, oze ogw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo, otoore omuhanda gw'eihamba, ogurikuruga Yerusalemu nigurunduka Gaaza.

Atyo yaimuka yaagyenda. Mbwenu hakaba hariho Omunyaetiopiya omushaahu, owaabaire agiire Yerusalemu kuramya, ari omutegyeki omu kikaari kya Kandaake, Omugabekazi wa Etiopiya, kandi ari omubiiki we omukuru.
Obwo akaba ari omu rugyendo rwe naagaruka owaabo. Ku yaabaire ashutami omu kigaari kye, yaashoma ekitabo kya Isaaya omurangi,
Mutima yaagambira Filipo ati: Irooko ohikye ekigaari kiriya.
Filipo ku yaakihikire, yaamuhurira naashoma ekitabo kya Isaaya omurangi; yaamubuuza ati: Beitu ebi orikushoma noobyetegyereza?
Onu yaamugarukamu ati: Nimbaasa nta kubyetegyereza, ntaine orikubinshoboororera? Atyo ayeta Filipo kuza omu kigaari, ashutama nawe.

Mbwenu ekicweka ky'omu Byahandiikirwe eki yaabaire naashoma, kikaba nikigira kiti: Akaba nk'entaama erikutwarwa omu ibaagiro; yaaba nk'akataama akatateeza kari omu maisho g'orikukashara ebyoya. Nawe nikwo ataraashamize kanwa ke.
Akabundikwa, yaabura ow'okumurwanaho. N'oha orishoboorora ab'oruzaaro rwe, amagara ge omu nsi ku garaabe gaacwirweho!
Omushaahu nikwo kuhindukira Filipo akamugira ati: Ngambira, omurangi naayegambaho, nari naagamba aha ndiijo muntu?
Filipo yaatandikira aha kicweka ekyo eky'omu Byahandiikirwe, okuhitsya obu yaamushoboororeire eby'Amakuru Marungi ga Yesu.
Ku baagumiizemu, baarugaho baahika aha maizi. Ogwo mushaahu yaagira ati: Amaizi ka gari aha, ekirikunzibira kubatizibwa ni ki?
[Ndi Filipo, ati: Ku oraabe noikiriza n'omutima gwawe gwona nikibaasika. Agarukamu ati: Niinyikiriza ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga.]
Atyo aragiira ab'ekigaari kwemerera. Bwanyima Filipo n'omushaahu baragara omu maizi, Filipo amubatiza.
Ku baagatuuhuukiremu, Filipo yaatwarwa Mutima wa Mukama; omushaija ogwo omushaahu tiyaamucwa ryera bundi; yaagumizamu omuhanda ashemereirwe munonga.
Filipo ku yaagiire kugira ati, yaayeshanga yaahikire Azooto; yaagumizamu orugyendo rwe naarangirira abantu Amakuru Marungi omuri buri kirorero, yaarugaho yaahika Kaisaariya.
Omu biro ebyo Saulo akaba naahayira abatendekwa ba Mukama kubaita. Yaaza ow'omuhongyerezi omukuru,

yaamushaba amabaruha g'okutwarira ab'omu mateeraniro g'omuri Damasiko, ngu gamuhe obushoboorozi bw'okukwata n'okutwara Yerusalemu abarikukuratira Omuhanda gwa Mukama boona, yaaba bashaija nari abakazi, abu araashangyeyo.
Ku yaabaire naaza Damasiko, ari haihi kuhika omuri ekyo kirorero, ahonaaho haija ekimurinkano, ekirikuruga omu iguru, kyamwehinguririza.
Yaagwa ahansi, yaahurira eiraka eririkugira riti: Saulo, Saulo, nompiiganisiza ki?
Nawe yaabuuza ati: Niiwe oha, Mukama wangye? Eiraka ryamugarukamu riti: Niinye Yesu ou orikuhiiganisa.
Mbwenu imuka, oze omu kirorero, niyo oraagambirirwe eki oraakore.
Abashaija abaabaire nibagyenda nawe baayemerera babuzirwe eky'okugamba, ahabw'okuba bakahurira eiraka, kwonka tibaareeba muntu n'omwe.
Saulo yaimuka ahansi, haza ku yaabuurwire amaisho, tiyaahweza n'akakye; abantu nikwo kumukwatira ekihimbo, bakamutwara Damasiko.
Akamara ebiro bishatu atarikuhweza, kandi atarikurya nobu kwakuba okunywa.
Mbwenu hakaba hariho omutendekwa orikwetwa Ananiya, owaabaire atwire Damasiko. Omutendekwa ogwo akabonekyerwa, yaahurira Mukama naamweta ati: Ananiya. Onu ati: Ndi aha, Mukama wangye.
Mukama yaamugira ati: Imuka, oze mu muhanda ogurikwetwa Ogugororokire, obuurize omu b'oruganda rwa Yuda, omuntu orikwetwa Saulo, orugire Taruso. Omuri aga magingo naashaba,
kandi yaabonekyeirwe ku omuntu orikwetwa Ananiya arikwija kutaahamu, akamutaho engaro kumuhumuura.
Ananiya amugarukamu ati: Mukama wangye, abantu baingi ka bangambiire eby'ogwo mushaija, n'oku abaire naakora kubi munonga abarikwera baawe omuri Yerusalemu.
Na mbwenu aizire aha aine obushoboorozi obu ahairwe abahongyerezi abakuru, kuboha omuntu weena orikuhoogyera eiziina ryawe.
Mukama yaamugarukamu ati: Nobu kiraabe kiri kityo, hoona ozeyo, ahabw'okuba omushaija ogwo niwe nyetooraniire ahabwa eiziina ryangye omu Banyamahanga, omu bagabe baabo n'omu bantu ba Isiraeli.
Manya niinyija kumworeka oku ari ow'okubonabona ahabwangye.
Mpaho Ananiya atyo agyenda, ataaha omu nju, ata engaro ahari Saulo, naagira ati: Munyaruganda Saulo, naatumwa Mukama Yesu okureebekyeire noija kunu, ngu ohumuukye, oijure Mutima Orikwera.
Ahonaaho Saulo oshusha oti akabubi kaamukokooka aha maisho, mpaho ahumuuka, aimuka, abatizibwa.
Ku aheza kurya, agarukwamu amaani. Saulo ku yaamazire ebiro bikye n'abatendekwa omuri Damasiko,
yaatandika kwegyesa omu mateeraniro, ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga.

Boona abaamuhuriire baatangaara nibagira bati: Beitu ogu t'omushaija obaire naahiiganisiza omuri Yerusalemu abarikuhoogyera eryo iziina? Kandi ekimureetsire, t'okubakwata akabatwarira abahongyerezi abakuru bakomirwe?
Saulo akongyera kutunga amaani, yaaremeseza kimwe Abayudaaya aba Damasiko, naahamya ku Yesu ari Kristo.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro bingi, Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okumwita;
haza egyo naama yaamanywa Saulo. Ahabw'okwenda kumwita, baaguma bamugwereire aha marembo nyomushana na nyekiro.
Kwonka abakuratsi be baamutwara nyekiro, baamurengyeza aha kisiika nibamushuumiza omu kigagara.
Saulo ku yaahikire Yerusalemu, yaateeraho kwehitsya abatendekwa, kwonka boona baamutiina, ahabw'okutaikiriza ngu nawe buzimazima n'omutendekwa.

Barinaba nikwo kumutwarira entumwa, akabashoboororera oku Mukama yaabonekyeire Saulo ogwo, akagamba nawe ari omu rugyendo, kandi n'oku Saulo yaarangiriire n'obumanzi omu iziina rya Yesu omuri Damasiko.
Okwiha obwo, Saulo yaatandika kugyenda nabo omuri Yerusalemu yoona
naarangirira omu iziina rya Mukama atarikutiina. Mbwenu ku yaaherize kugamba n'Abayudaaya abarikugamba Oruguriiki n'okuhakana nabo, baamuhiiga kumwita.
Abanyaruganda ku baakimanyire, baamutwara Kaisaariya, bwanyima baamwohereza Taruso.

Ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Buyudaaya yoona, Galilaaya na Samariya baatsigara baine obusingye, nibatiina Ruhanga omu mitwarize yaabo; reero ahabw'okuheebwa Mutima Orikwera, baakanya kandi baahama.
Petero akagyenda naataayaayira abarikwera boona, yaahika n'omu batwire Luda.
Okwo niyo yaashangire omushaija orikwetwa Aineya, owaabaire amazire emyaka munaana azingazingirwe, atarikuruga ha kitanda.
Petero yaamugira ati: Aineya, Yesu Kristo yaakukiza; imuka oyeyarire. Ahonaaho yaimuka.
Boona abaabaire batwire Luda na Sharooni baamureeba, baahinduka, baaba aba Mukama.
Omuri Yopa hakaba hariyo omutendekwakazi orikwetwa Tabita, omu Ruguriiki niwe Dorika, owaabaire ateeganda kukora ebirungi n'okuhwera abanaku.
Omu biro ebyo akarwara, yaafa. Baamwozya, baamuta omu kishengye eky'omuri kaanyinaabiri.
Manya Luda teri hare na Yopa. N'ahabw'ekyo abatendekwa ku baahuriire ngu Petero niyo ari, baamutumaho abashaija babiri, nibamugira bati: Ija ahonaaho otuhikyeho.

Petero nikwo kugyenda nabo. Ku yaahikireyo, baamutwara omuri kaanyinaabiri egyo, ei abafaakazi baamuturukire oku n'oku nibarira, nibamworeka ebiteeteyi n'ebindi bijwaro ebi Dorika yaabaziire akiri hamwe nabo.

Petero yaababinga boona omu kishengye, yaatsimba amaju, yaashaba Ruhanga. Ku yaaherize, yaahindukira ogwo mukazi ofiire, yaamugira ati: Tabita, yemerera. Onu yaabuuruura amaisho, yaagata ahari Petero, yaashutama.
Petero yaamukwata omukono, yamwemereza, bwanyima yaayeeta abaikiriza n'abafaakazi, yaamubooreka ahuriire.
Aba Yopa boona baahurira egyo nkuru; baingi baikiriza Mukama.
Petero yaamara ebiro omuri Yopa, naaraara omw'omuhazi w'empu orikwetwa Simooni.
Omuri Kaisaariya hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Korinelio, omukuru w'omutwe gw'omu ihe ry'Abarooma ogurikwetwa ogw'Abaitaliya.
Korinelio ogwo akaba ari omunyadiini, we n'ab'eka ye nibatiina Ruhanga. Akaba agabira Abayudaaya abooro aha bintu bye, kandi ashaba Ruhanga obutoosha.
Eizooba rimwe nk'aha shaaha ya mwenda akabonekyerwa, yaareeba butunu maraika wa Ruhanga naataaha omu nju ye, naamweta ati: Korinelio!
Onu yaamuhanga amaisho aitsirwe obwoba, yaamwetaba ati: N'enki, Mukama wangye? Maraika yaamugarukamu ati: Ruhanga asiimire okushaba kwawe n'okugaba kwawe, naiwe yaakwijuka.
Mbwenu tuma abantu Yopa, beeteyo omushaija orikwetwa Simooni Petero,
orikuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, ou enju ye eri aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Maraika owaagambire ebyo ku yaagyenzire, Korinelio yaayeta babiri aha baheereza be, hamwe n'omuserukare omunyadiini ow'omu baserukare be abarikumurinda.
Yaabagambira ekyabaho, bwanyima yaabatuma Yopa.
Eizooba eryakuratsireho, ku baabaire nibakigyenda, batsigaizeyo orugyendo rukye kuhika ekirorero, aha shaaha nk'eya mukaaga, Petero yaatemba aha mutwe gw'enju kushaba.
Ago magingo yaagira enjara, yaayenda kurya. Ku baabaire nibakiboneza ebyokurya, yaabonekyerwa nk'orikuroota,
yaareeba eiguru rishuuruukire, kandi ekintu ekirikushusha omwenda muhango nikushuuma kuhika ahansi, nikirengyerera aha nshonda zaakyo ina,
kirimu emiringo yoona ey'enyamaishwa n'ey'enyonyi z'omu mwanya n'ebirikugyendesa enda.
Mpaho ahurira eiraka nirimugira riti: Petero, imuka, obiite, obirye.
Petero agarukamu ati: Mbirimba, Mukama wangye! Nyowe tinkaryaga kintu kyona ekirikuzira nari ekihagaro.
Kwonka eiraka rigaruka rimugira riti: Eki Ruhanga yaayerize, otarikyeeta ekirikuzira.
Ekyo kyayekuratana kityo kashatu. Bwanyima ogwo mwenda gwona gwanyururwa, gwagarukayo omu iguru ahonaaho.
Petero ku yaabaire akishobeirwe amakuru g'eki yaareeba, abashaija abaabaire batumirwe Korinelio baayegaranjura aho. Bakaba baahabwize ahu enju ya Simooni eri; batyo baija, baayemerera aha rwigi,
nibabuuza bati: Aha hariho omugyenyi orikwetwa Simooni Petero?
Obwo Petero ku yaabaire naakyebuuza kumanya amakuru g'ebi yaayorekwa, Mutima yaamugira ati: Reeba, hariho abashaija bashatu abarikukusherura.
Rahuka oshuume, kandi otabangaanisa kugyenda nabo, ahabw'okuba niinye naabatuma kwija aha.
Petero atyo ashuuma, abagira ati: Niinye ou murikusherura; beitu ekyabareeta ni ki?

Nabo bamugarukamu bati: Korinelio omukuru w'abaserukare, omuntu ohikiriire, orikutiina Ruhanga kandi orikusiimwa Abayudaaya boona, ahabwirwe maraika orikwera kukweta n'okukutwara owe, ngu ahurire ebi oraagambe.
Petero atyo abataasya omu nju, abaha oburaaro. Ku bwaseesire, yaimuka, yaagyenda nabo ashendekyereziibwe bamwe aha banyaruganda ba Yopa.
Kaisaariya bakagihika aha izooba eryakuratsireho. Baashanga Korinelio abategyereize, ayetsire abanyabuzaare n'abanyamukago kubaho.
Petero ku yaabaire naakihika ahari egyo nju, Korinelio yaashohora kumutangirira, yaatsimba amaju aha bigyere bye, yaajuumara kumuramya.
Kwonka Petero amwimutsya, amugira ati: Imuka, naanye ndi omuntu nyabuntu.
Baagyenda nibagaaniira, baataaha omu nju, baashangamu baingi abaabaire bateeraniiremu.

Petero yaabagira ati: Nimumanya ku kirikuzira Abayudaaya kweturaaniza n'abantu b'erindi ihanga n'okubataayaayira. Kwonka Ruhanga akinshoboororeire gye, ku ntashemereire kweta omuntu weena ekirikuzira nari ekihagaro.
Nikyo ntangiire kwija baanyeeta. Mbwenu nu, niinyenda kumanya eki muunyeeteire.

Korinelio amugarukamu ati: Ebiro bina ebihingwire, nk'eshaaha mwenda z'omu mwabazyo, mbaire ndi omu nju yangye ninshaba; ku ngiire kugira nti, naareeba omu maisho gangye omushaija ojwaire ebirikumwamwatikana,
yangira ati: Korinelio, Ruhanga ahuriire okushaba kwawe, kandi yaijuka okugaba kwawe.
Mbwenu tuma Yopa, oyeteyo Simooni Petero, orikuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, aha rubaju rw'enyanja.
Naanye nikwo kukutumaho ahonaaho, kandi waakora gye kwija. N'ahabw'ekyo twena twateeranira aha omu maisho ga Ruhanga kuhurira ebi Mukama akuragiire kutugambira.
Petero nikwo kubagambira ati: Mbwenu naamanya Ruhanga ku atashoroora mu bantu,
kureka omuntu weena owa ibara ihanga omutiina akakora ebihikire, niwe asiima.
Ruhanga akooherereza Abaisiraeli ekigambo kye, kubamanyisa Amakuru Marungi g'obusingye, naakirabya omuri Yesu Kristo, Mukama w'abantu boona.
Ningira ngu nimumanya ebyabaireho omuri Buyudaaya ebya Yesu owa Nazareeti, nk'oku yaatandikiire omuri Galilaaya, Yohaana yaaherize kurangirira eby'okubatizibwa.

Ruhanga akamusiigisa Mutima Orikwera, hamwe n'amaani. Mbwenu ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akaba ari hamwe nawe, Yesu ogwo akaba agyenda hoona naakora ebirungi, kandi naakiza boona abaabaire nibaitwa kubi Sitaane.
Reero nyowe n'abu nyine, turi baakareebi b'ebyo byona ebi Yesu yaakoreire omuri Buyudaaya n'omuri Yerusalemu, n'oku baamwitsire bamuhanikire aha muti.
Kwonka aha kiro kya kashatu Ruhanga akamuzoora, yaamubaasisa kureebwa,
ti bantu boona, kureka baakareebi abu Ruhanga yaatooraine kare. Manya niitwe baakareebi abaariire nawe, tukanywa nawe aherize kuzooka omu bafiire.
Bwanyima akaturagiira ku turangirira abantu be n'okubahamiza ku Ruhanga yaamutaireho kuba omuramuzi w'abahuriire n'abafiire.
Abarangi boona niwe barikuhamya, nibagira ngu weena orikumwikiriza aryasaasirwa ebibi ahabw'eiziina rye.
Petero ku yaabaire naakigamba ebyo, Mutima Orikwera yaashuuma ahari boona abaabaire bamutegire okutu.
Abaikiriza abashazirwe abaabaire baizire na Petero, boona baatangaara kureeba Abanyamahanga nabo nibashukwaho ekiconco kya Mutima Orikwera.
Manya bakabahurira nibagamba endimi z'endugamahanga kandi nibahimbisa Ruhanga. Petero nawe nikwo kugira ati:
Ebyo hariho orikubaasa kwima aba bantu amaizi g'okubabatiza, baaherize kutunga Mutima Orikwera nkaitwe?
Atyo aragiira ku babatizibwa omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo. Bwanyima bamushaba kuguma nabo ebiro bikye.
Entumwa hamwe n'abanyaruganda ab'omuri Buyudaaya bakahurira ngu Abanyamahanga nabo baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Petero ku yainamukire Yerusalemu, ab'ekigombe ky'abashazirwe baamuhaahuuza,
nibagira bati: Tuhuriire ngu obaire nootaayaayira abatashazirwe kandi noorya nabo; nikwo?
Petero yaabagarukamu naabashoboororera buri kimwe nk'oku byakurataine.

Yaatandika ati: Eizooba rimwe ku naabaire ndi omu rurembo rwa Yopa ninshaba, naabonekyerwa ekirikushusha omwenda muhango, nikishuuma kuhika ahansi kikwatsirwe enshonda zaakyo ina. Omwenda ogwo gukahika ahansi haihi naanye.
Ku naagwetegyereize, naareeba gurimu emiringo yoona ey'enyamaishwa ezirikugyendesa amaguru n'ezirikugyendesa enda n'ezirikugurukira omu kaabunga.
Bwanyima naahurira eiraka eririkungira riti; Petero, imuka, oite, orye.
Kwonka naagarukamu nti: Mbirimba, Mukama wangye! Tihakabahoga kirikuzira nari ekihagaro ekiragiire omu kanwa kangye.
Eryo eiraka ryagamba obwa kabiri niryema omu iguru, riti: Eki Ruhanga yaayerize otarikyeeta ekirikuzira.
Ekyo kyayekuratana kityo kashatu. Bwanyima ogwo mwenda gwanyururwa, gwagarukayo omu iguru.
Omuri ago magingo, abashaija bashatu baahika aha nju ei naabaire nindaaramu, batumirwe nibaruga Kaisariya kuunyakiira,
na Mutima yangambira kugyenda nabo ntarikubangaanisa. Abanyaruganda aba mukaaga nabo baagyenda naanye, twataaha omw'ogwo mushaija.
Yaatugambira ku areebire maraika ayemereire omu nju ye, akamugira ati: Tuma omuri Yopa, oyeeteyo omuntu orikwetwa Simooni Petero,
akwiniire obutumwa oburikwija kukujuna n'eka yaawe yoona.
Ku naabaire ninkitandika nti kugamba, Mutima Orikwera yaabaijaho nk'oku yaatwizireho bwabiso,
kandi naijuka ku Mukama yaagizire ati: Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi, kwonka imwe muryabatizibwa na Mutima Orikwera.
Obwo naamanya ekiconco eki Ruhanga abahaire, ku nikyo kimwe n'eki yaatuhaire obu twaikiriza Mukama Yesu Kristo. Mbwenu nyowe nkaba ndi oha owaakuzibiire Ruhanga?
Ku yaabagambiire ebyo, baatuuza. Baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati: Buzimazima Ruhanga ahaire n'Abanyamahanga okwegarukamu okurikutungisa amagara.
Abaikiriza abaataataine nibahunga okuhiiganisibwa okwabaire ahari Sitefano, bakagyenda, baahika Foinikiya na Kupuro na Antiokiya, obwo nibarangirira Abayudaaya bonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Kwonka bamwe omu baarugire Kupuro na Kureene, bakaza Antiokiya, baatandikirayo kwegyesa Abaguriiki, nibabagambira Amakuru Marungi ga Mukama Yesu.
Mukama yaabakwatsa; abantu baingi abaikiriize baakubuukira Mukama.
Ekigombe ky'Abakristo eky'omuri Yerusalemu, ku kyahuriire ebyo, kyatuma Barinaba kuza Antiokiya.
Ku yaahikireyo, yaareeba oku Ruhanga ahaire abo bantu emigisha, yaashemererwa. Yaabeehanangiriza boona kuguma bari abeesigwa kandi ab'amazima ahari Mukama n'omutima gwabo gwona.
Barinaba ogwo akaba ari omushaija murungi, oijwire Mutima Orikwera n'okwikiriza. Abandi bantu baingi baayehongyera Mukama.
Bwanyima Barinaba yaaza Taruso kusherura Saulo.
