Ku yaamuboine yaamureeta Antiokiya. Bombi baamarayo omwaka gwona bari hamwe n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza baayo, nibeegyesa abantu baingi. Antiokiya, niyo abaikiriza baabandiize kwetwa Abakristo.
Ku baabaire bakiri okwo, abarangi bamwe baashuuma Antiokiya nibaruga Yerusalemu.
Omwe aharibo orikwetwa Agabo, akarangisibwa Mutima ku harikwija kubaho enjara omu nsi yoona. Haza ekyo kyabaho omu busingye bwa Kalaudio.
Abaikiriza nikwo kucwamu kutwekyera abanyaruganda abari Buyudaaya eby'okubakwatsa, buri omwe yaahayo eki arikubaasa.
Ekyo baakikora, baabitweka Barinaba na Saulo kubikwatsa abakuru b'omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza.
Omu biro ebyo Omugabe Herode akatandika kuhiiganisa bamwe omu b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo.
Yaitsa Yakobo mukuru wa Yohaana rurara.
Ku yaareebire ekyo Abayudaaya baakisiima, yaaragiira kukwata na Petero. Ekyo kikabaho omu biro by'Obugyenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe.

Atyo akwata Petero, amuta omu kihome, kandi ataho emiteeko ena y'abaserukare bana bana kumurinda nibaihaihana. Obwo Herode akaba naayenda kumureeta omu maisho g'abantu kutonganisibwa, Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho bwahwaho.
Obunaku bwona obu Petero yaamazire ari omu kihome, ekigombe ky'Abakristo kikaguma nikimushabira ahari Ruhanga kitaireho omutima.

Ekiro ki Herode yaabaire araariire kumucweraho orubanja, Petero ogwo akaba agwejegyereire ahagati y'abaserukare babiri, bamuboheise enjegyere ibiri, kandi obwo n'abarinzi barindiire aha irembo ry'ekihome.
Ahonaaho maraika wa Nyakubaho yaamubonekyera; akashengye koona kaayaka. Yaateerateera Petero omu rubaju, yaamusisiimura naagira ati: Rahuka kwimuka! Enjegyere zaamuruga aha mikono, zaaragara.
Maraika atyo amugira ati: Yezirikye orukoba rwawe, ojware enkaito. N'onu akora atyo. Maraika agaruka amugira ati: Jwara omunagiro gwawe, onkurate.
Mpaho Petero ashohora, amukurata, kwonka atarikumanya ki maraika arikukora, yaaba kiri kyo; ateekateeka ngu shana yaabonekyerwa.

Baagyenda nibaraba aha barinzi b'okubanza n'aba kabiri, baahika aha irembo ry'ebyoma eririkushohorera ow'orurembo. Ryayeigura ryonka, baashohora, baagumizamu omuhanda okuhitsya obu maraika yaamurugireho.
Obwo nibwo Petero yaagarukirwemu obwengye, akagira ati: Mbwenu naamanyira kimwe ku Mukama atumire maraika we, akanjuna Herode na byona ebi Abayudaaya babaire nibagira ngu nibiija kumbaho.
Ku yaaherize kukyetegyereza, yaagumizamu, yaaza omwa Mariya nyina Yohaana-Mariko, ei abantu baingi baabaire bateeraniire nibashaba.
Yaakongoota aha rwigi rw'eirembo, omwishiki omuheereza orikwetwa Rooda yaija kureeba.
Ku amanya eiraka riri erya Petero, okushemererwa kwenda kumwita; omu mwanya gw'okwigura orwigi, airuka naagaruka omu nju kugambira abarimu ku Petero ayemereire aha irembo.
Bamugira bati: Ohugire omutima. Kwonka we ayangisiriza ati: N'eky'amazima. Bwanyima bagira bati: Ogwo nu ni maraika we!
Petero ku yaabaire naakiiguza, batyo baigura orwigi, baamureeba, baatangaara munonga.
Yaabahunamisisa omukono kandi yaabateekyerereza oku Mukama yaamwiha omu kihome. Yaayongyeraho n'eki ati: Mugambire mutyo Yakobo n'abanyaruganda. Atyo abatsigaho, aza ahandi.
Ku bwaseesire haabaho akaimukiiriro kahango omu baserukare ahabw'okutamanya oku Petero abaire.
Herode yaateeraho kumuronda, kwonka yaaremwa; yaatonganisa abarinzi, yaaragiira kubaita. Bwanyima Herode ogwo yaaruga Buyudaaya, yaashuuma Kaisaariya, yaagumayo.

Herode akaba agwereirwe kubi Abatuuro n'Abasidoni. Ab'endembo ezo zombi baamwijaho baaherize kwenywanisa na Bulasito, omukuru w'abambari be, owaababaasiise kumushaba obusingye. Manya ensi yaabo akaba etungirwe ebyokurya ebi baabaire bashaka omu nsi y'ogwo mugabe.
Aha kiro ekyatairweho, Herode akajwara ebijwaro bye by'obugabe, yaasingama aha kitebe, yaagira ebi yaagambira abantu be.
Abantu nikwo kumushunga nibagira bati: Orikugamba ni Ruhanga, ti muntu!
Omuri ako kaanya maraika wa Nyakubaho amuteera, amugwisaho naamutura okutaha Ruhanga ekitiinwa, n'onu ariibwa enyogori, afa.
Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikongyera kuhama n'okubuga, baingi baakiikiriza.
Barinaba na Saulo ku baaherize omurimo gwabo, baagarukayo, nibaruga Yerusalemu baine Yohaana-Mariko.

Omu kigombe ky'Abakristo ekya Antiokiya, hakaba harimu abarangi n'abeegyesa; Barinaba, Simeoni orikwetwa Nyakairaguju, taho Lukio owa Kureene, na Manaeni owaayoroirwe hamwe n'ow'eishaza Herode, na Saulo.
Eizooba rimwe ku baabaire nibashaba Ruhanga kandi nibeesiibyakwo, Mutima Orikwera yaagira ati: Niinyenda munshoroorere Barinaba na Saulo, bakore omurimo ogu mbeeteire.
Batyo ku baaherize kwesiibyakwo n'okushaba, baabataho engaro, baaboohereza.
Bwanyima Saulo na Barinaba ku baaherize kutumwa Mutima Orikwera, baashuuma Seleukiya, ei baarugire nibatoora ogw'enyanja, bakaza aha kirwa Kupuro.
Ku baahikire Salami, baarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama omu mateeraniro g'Abayudaaya; obwo baine Yohaana-Mariko naabakwatsa.
Ku baaherize kucwekanisa ekirwa, baahika Paafo, baabuganayo Omuyudaaya omukozi w'emigyereko, kandi omurangi w'ebishuba orikwetwa Bari-Yesu.

Bari-Yesu ogwo akaba ari munywani w'omutegyeki omukuru Serigio-Paulo ow'ekyo kirwa, owaabaire ari omushaija ohwerize munonga. Ogwo mutegyeki mukuru akeeta Barinaba na Saulo, yaabashaba ku bamugambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Kwonka Eluma, amakuru ngu, omukozi w'emigyereko, yaateeraho kubazibira, ngu ogwo mutegyeki omukuru atakaikiriza, akahinduka.
Mpaho Saulo, orikwetwa Paulo, aijwire Mutima Orikwera, yaamutsimba eriisho,
yaamugira ati: Iwe mwana wa Sitaane 'we, iwe muzigu w'ekyeetwa ekihikiriire, iwe oijwire obugobya n'obubi, ahabw'enki otarikurekyera aho kukiikamya emihanda ya Mukama egororokire?
Mbwenu reeba, omukono gwa Mukama gwaza kukuteera, ohume, omare ebiro otarikureeba izooba. Omuri ako kacu Eluma ashwekwa oruho n'omwirima, abandagira naasherura ow'okumukwatira ekihimbo.
Ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ku yaareebire ekyakorwa, yaikiriza naatangaarira ebi baayegyeise ahari Mukama.
Paulo na bagyenzi be bakatoora ogw'enyanja, baaruga Paafo baaza Periga ey'omuri Panfuliya, ei Yohaana-Mariko yaataaniire nabo, akagaruka Yerusalemu.
Abandi baagumizamu okuruga Periga okuhitsya obu baahikire Antiokiya ey'omuri Pisidiya. Ku baabaire bakiri okwo, ahari Sabato baaza omu iteeraniro, baashutama.
Eby'eiteeka n'eby'abarangi ku byaherize kushomwa, abakuru b'eiteeraniro baabatumaho bati: Beene waitu, ku muraabe mwine eki murikwenda kugambira abateeraniire aha kubagumya, mukigambe.
Paulo nikwo kwemerera, akabaretsya n'omukono, akatandika kugamba ati: Imwe Baisiraeli 'mwe, naimwe abatiina Ruhanga, nimuntegye okutu:
Ruhanga w'eihanga ryaitu Isiraeli akatoorana baatataitwe, yaatunguura abantu baitu obu baabaire batwire omu nsi ya Misiri. Bwanyima ahabw'amaani ge yaabaihayo;
yaabareeberera bari omu ihamba emyaka nka makumi ana.
Ku yaaherize kucwekyereza amahanga mushanju ag'omuri Kanaani, yaabaha egyo nsi, yaaba eyaabo, baamarayo emyaka nka magana ana na makumi ataano.
Ebyo ku byahwaire, yaabaha abaramuzi, baagumizamu okuhitsya aha murangi Samueli.
Bwanyima baashaba kuheebwa omugabe; Ruhanga yaabaha Saulo mwene Kiishi ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, yaabategyekyera emyaka makumi ana.
Ogwo ku yaamwihire aha ngoma, yaayemeka Daudi kuba omugabe waabo, ou yaagambireho ati: Nyeboneire Daudi mwene Yese, omuntu ori nk'oku omutima gwangye gurikwenda, orikora byona ebi nyenda.
Ruhanga, okuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise, akaimukiza Isiraeli omwe ahari baijukuru ba Daudi, niwe Yesu Omujuni.
Ogwo obu yaabaire atakaizire. Yohaana akarangirira Abaisiraeli boona okwegarukamu n'okubatizibwa.
Yohaana ku yaabaire naamariiriza omurimo gwe gw'omuri egi nsi, yaagira ati: Tindi ogwo ou murikuteekateeka ngu ndi we; we andi enyima ankuratiire, kandi tinshemereire kumukomoorora enkaito.
Imwe beene waitu ab'oruzaaro rwa Aburahamu, naimwe mwena abatiina Ruhanga, obutumwa obu obw'okujunwa, niimwe bwaiziire.
Eki abantu ba Yerusalemu n'abategyeki baabo baakozire ahabw'okutamanya Yesu, nobu kwakuba okushoboorokyerwa ebyagambirwe abarangi ebishomwa buri Sabato, bakabihikiiriza nibamucwera orubanja.
Nobu baraabe batarareebire ekishemereire kumwitisa, hoona bakashaba Pilaato kumwita.
Ku baaherize kuhikiiriza byona ebyamuhandiikirweho, baamuhanura aha musharaba, baamuziika omu kituuro.
Kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafiire;
yaamara ebiro bingi naabonekyera abaarugire nawe Galilaaya bakaza Yerusalemu; kandi nibo abo hati abarikumujurira omu bantu.
Twaija aha kubagambira Amakuru Marungi ag'ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatataitwe,
akabihikiiriza ahariitwe baijukuru baabo naazoora Yesu omu bafiire, nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omuri zaaburi eya kabiri kiti: Ori Omwana wangye; eri izooba naakuzaara.
Ekirikuhamya ngu Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire, tarigaruka kujunda, nikyo ekyo eki yaagambire kare ati: Ndyabaha emigisha ehamire kandi erikwera ei naaraganiise Daudi.
Akagambira n'omu kyevugo ekindi ati: Toriikiriza Orikwera waawe kujunda.
Mbwenu Daudi omu biro bye ku yaaherize kukora emirimo ei Ruhanga yaamuteekateekyeire yaafa, yaaziikwa na baishe, yaajunda.
Kwonka ogwo ou Ruhanga yaazoire omu bafiire tarajunzire.
Beene waitu, mumanye ku okusaasirwa ebibi kurikurangirirwa ahabwa Yesu ogwo.
Kandi weena orikwikiriza Yesu, naihwaho orubanja rw'ebibi byona, ebi eiteeka rya Musa ritarabaasize kumwihaho.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde mutakaahikwaho ebi abarangi baarangire nibagira bati:
Imwe bashungi 'mwe, nimureebe, mutangaare kandi muhwerekyerere! Manya omu biro byanyu ninkora eki mutakwikiriize, nobu mwakukigambiirwe.
Paulo na Barinaba ku baabaire nibaruga omuri eryo iteeraniro, abaamwo baabashaba ebi baabarangirira kugaruka kubibagambira ahari Sabato erikwija.

Oruteerane ku rwayaabuukire, Abayudaaya baingi hamwe n'abaataahiibwe omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya abarikutiina Ruhanga, baakuratira Paulo na Barinaba; kandi omu kugaaniira kwabo, Paulo na Barinaba baabeehanangiriza kuguma bahamiire omuri rukundo ya Ruhanga.
Sabato eyaakuratsireho, haihi ab'orurembo rwona bakateerana kuhurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Abayudaaya ku baareebire ebimbuuro by'abantu, baitwa eihari, baatandika kujuma n'okuhakanisa ebi Paulo yaagambire byona.

Bwanyima Paulo na Barinaba baabagambira n'obumanzi bati: Niimwe tubandiizeho kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga, kwonka mbwenu ahabw'okuba mwakyanga, kandi nimugira ngu timushemereire kutunga amagara agatahwaho, twaza kugarura omu Banyamahanga.
Manya ekyo nikyo Mukama yaaturagiire kukora obu yaagira ati: Naakutaho kuba orumuri omu Banyamahanga, okujuna kwangye kubone kuhika omu nsi yoona.
Abanyamahanga ku baakihuriire, baashemererwa munonga, baahimbisa ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kandi boona abu yaateekateekyeire amagara agatahwaho, baikiriza.
Ekigambo kya Mukama kyabuga kityo omu nsi egyo yoona.
Kwonka Abayudaaya baimukiiriza abakazi ab'ekitiinwa abarikutiina Ruhanga, hamwe n'abantu abakuru ab'omuri orwo rurembo, batyo baahiiganisa Paulo na Barinaba, baababinga omu kyanga kyabo.
Ezo ntumwa nazo nikwo kubakunkumurira omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byazo, zikaza Ikonio.
Kwonka abatendekwa baayo baijura okushemererwa na Mutima Orikwera.
N'omuri Ikonio nikwo kyabaire. Paulo na Barinaba ku baagiire omu iteeraniro ry'Abayudaaya, baagamba ebigambo birikuhika aha njoka, byareetera Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki baingi munonga kwikiriza.
Kwonka Abayudaaya abamwe baayanga kwikiriza, baata omu Banyamahanga omutima mubi kwanga abaikiriza.
Paulo na Barinaba baamarayo omwanya nibarangirira ebya Mukama batarikutiina, na Mukama ebi baagambire aha kiconco kye eky'embabazi yaabihamisa obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza.
Abantu b'omu rurembo bakeebaganisamu; abamwe baagwera orubaju rw'Abayudaaya, abandi orw'Entumwa.
Ekyarugiremu Abanyamahanga n'Abayudaaya bakwataniise n'ab'obushoboorozi, baacuma enaama y'okubarwanisa n'okubateera amabaare.
Entumwa ku zaakihuriire, zaahungira Lusitura na Deribe, ebirorero by'omuri Lukaoniya n'omu byanga ebihereeraine nabyo,
ei zaagambiire Amakuru Marungi.
Omuri Lusitura hakaba hariyo omuntu owaabaire atarikubaasa kugyenda ahabw'okuzaarwa n'ebigyere biramaire.
Ogwo muntu akahurira Paulo naagamba. Paulo ku yaamureebire naayesiga ngu naabaasa kukizibwa,
yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Imuka oyemerere n'ebigyere byawe. Ogwo murema yaabandatuka, yaatandika kugyenda.
Ekimbuuro ky'abantu ku baareebire eki Paulo yaakora, baayomba omu rurimi rwabo rw'Orulukaoniya bati: Aba bantu ni baaruhanga abatwiziremu beehindwire abantu!
Barinaba baamukubya Zeusi, kandi Paulo owaabaire ari omugambi mukuru, baamweta Herume.
Abahongyerezi ba Zeusi, ou endaaro ye yaabaire eri omu maisho g'orurembo, ahabw'okwenda ngu abantu boona batambe nabo ekitambo, baareeta aha marembo enimi zijwekirwe ebishaba by'ebirabyo.
Barinaba na Paulo, ku baahuriire ebyabaho, baatagura ebijwaro byabo, baayeshuka omu bantu nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati:

Bashaija 'mwe, n'enki ekirikubakoresa ebyo? Naitwe turi abantu nyabuntu nkaimwe. Tubareeteire Amakuru Marungi, ngu murekye ebitaine mugasho, mwehongyere Ruhanga ohuriire, owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja na byona ebirimu.
Omu busingye bw'aba ira, akaikiriza buri ihanga kwekorera ebyaryo nk'oku ririkwenda;

kwonka shi imwe, tiyaabareka kugumira aho mutaine kirikumubahamiza omu birungi ebi abakorera; abagwisiza enjura kuruga omu iguru, abeereza emyaka yaanyu omu bunaku bwayo, abaha ebyokurya hamwe n'okushemererwa.
Nobu baagambire ebyo, bakabura hakye kuremwa kuzibira abo bantu kubatambira ekitambo.
Bwanyima hakaija Abayudaaya bamwe nibaruga Antiokiya na Ikonio; baayosya abantu kurwanisa entumwa. Baateera Paulo amabaare, baamukurura, baamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo nibateekateeka ngu yaafa.
Abaikiriza ku baamwehinguririize, yaimuka, yaagaruka omu rurembo. Aha izooba eryakuratsireho, we na Barinaba baaza Deribe.
Ku baaherize kugamba ebigambo by'Amakuru Marungi omuri ekyo kirorero, baatungamu omubaro muhango gw'abakuratsi, baagaruka Antiokiya nibaraba Lusitura na Ikonio.
Baagumya abaikiriza baayo nibabeehanangiriza kuhamira omu kwikiriza bati: Twena turi ab'okuhikwaho eby'oburemeezi bingi, tutakataahire mu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Ku baaherize kutooranira buri kigombe ky'Abakristo abakuru baakyo, obwo nibashaba kandi nibeesiibyakwo, baabakwatsa Mukama ou baikiriize.
Paulo na Barinaba bakaraba Pisidiya, baahika Panfuliya.
Ku baaherize kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga omuri Periga, baashuuma Ataliya.
Omu kurugayo, baatoora ogw'enyanja nibaza Antiokiya, ei bwabiso baabaire babakwatsiize embabazi za Ruhanga ahabw'omurimo ogu baakozire obwo.
Ku baahikireyo bati, baateerana ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo, baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaabakoreise, kandi n'oku yaiguriireho Abanyamahanga omuhanda gw'okwikiriza.
Batyo baaguma n'abakuratsi okumara ebiro.
Bwanyima abantu bamwe bakaruga Buyudaaya, baayegyesa abanyaruganda, bati: Ku muraabe mutashazirwe nk'oku eiteeka rya Musa ririkuragiira, timurikubaasa kujunwa.

Ekyo kyabareetera empaka. Paulo na Barinaba ku baaherize kumara omwanya muraingwa nibahakana n'abo bantu, kyahamibwa ngu Paulo ogwo na Barinaba n'abandi ab'omu kigombe ky'Abakristo, bainamukye Yerusalemu kuhanuura ahari ekyo kigambo hamwe n'entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga.

Ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo boona baabaraga. Ku baabaire nibaraba Foinikiya na Samariya, baagambira abaayo oku Abanyamahanga bahindukire bakaba Abakristo; egyo nkuru yaagwisa gye munonga abanyaruganda boona.
Ku baahikire Yerusalemu, baayakiirwa ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo hamwe n'entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga; nabo baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga abakoreise.
Kwonka bamwe omu Bafarisaayo abaabaire baikiriize, baahakana nibagira bati: Abanyamahanga bashemereire kusharwa n'okwegyesibwa kukuratira eiteeka rya Musa.
Entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga baateerana kwetegyereza ekyo kigambo.

Ku baaherize kumara omwanya muraingwa nibahanuura, Petero yaayemerera, yaabagambira ati: Beene Tata, mwena nimumanya gye ku omu biro byahingwire, Ruhanga yaabantoorainemu, ngu ndangirire Abanyamahanga Amakuru Marungi babone kwikiriza.
Buzimazima Ruhanga omanya ebiri omu mutima gwa buri muntu, akabahamiza ku arikubasiima, yaabaha Mutima Orikwera, nk'oku yaamutuhaire.
Ruhanga taroorekire mutaano gwaitu nabo, akeeza emitima yaabo ahabw'okwikiriza.
Tikikaagwisa kubi Ruhanga imwe hati ku mwakwekoreza abo baikiriza omutwaro ogu itwe nari baatatenkuriitwe batarabaasize kwekorera?
Manya itwe twikiriza ngu tujunwa ahabw'embabazi za Mukama Yesu nkabo.
Ekyo kikahunamya boona abaabaire bateeraniireho, baatega okutu Barinaba na Paulo nibashoboorora eby'obumanyiso byona n'eby'okutangaaza ebi Ruhanga yaabakoreise omu Banyamahanga.
Abo ku baaherize kugamba, Yakobo nawe yaagamba ati: Beene tata, muntegye okutu.
Simeoni yaaheza kubagambira oku Ruhanga yaateekateekire kwetooranira abantu kuba abe ab'envuma, naabaiha omu Banyamahanga.
Ekyo buzimazima nikiikirizana n'ebi abarangi baagambire, ahabw'okuba Ebyahandiikirwe nibigira biti:
Ebyo ku birihwa, ndyagaruka nyombekye busya enju ya Daudi eyaagwire, ngyombekye busya ahi yaasheenyukire, ngigarureho.
Haza obwo abandi bantu n'Abanyamahanga boona abarikwetererwa eiziina ryangye, nibwo barisherura Mukama.
Mukama owaatumanyiise ebyo okwiha iranaira, nikwo arikugamba.
Yakobo agumizamu ati: Ka ngire nti: Omu mwanya gw'okureetera oburemeezi Abanyamahanga abahindukire, bakaba aba Ruhanga,
tubahandiikire nitubagambira kwetantara ekintu kyona ekihagaziibwe ebishushani, ebikwatiraine n'obushambani, n'enyama y'enyamaishwa zihotoirwe, n'orwamba.
Ahabw'okuba okwiha ira ebyahandiikirwe Musa bigira ababyegyesa omu buri kirorero, kandi bishomerwa omu mateeraniro buri Sabato.

Bwanyima entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga bakahamya kutoorana abajwekyerwa b'okutuma Antiokiya hamwe na Paulo na Barinaba. Ekigombe kyona eky'Abakristo kyakisiima; baatoorana Yuda orikwetwa Barisaba na Silaasi, abantu abakuru omu banyaruganda,
baabakwatsa ebaruha erikugira eti: Itwe beene waanyu, entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga, nitubaramutsya, imwe abanyaruganda, Abanyamahanga ab'omuri Antiokiya na Siriya na Kilikiya.
Nituhurira ngu hariho bamwe abaarugire omuriitwe, abaabarabaniisemu, bakababuza obusingye ahabw'ebi barikwenda ngu mukore: haza tutarabaragiire.
N'ahabw'ekyo tukaikirizana tuteeraine, kutoorana abajwekyerwa, tukababooherereza hamwe na Barinaba na Paulo, abu turikusiima munonga,
abaahaireyo amagara gaabo ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
Mbwenu twabatumaho Yuda na Silaasi, abaraabagambire nibahamya ebi tuhandiikire omu baruha egi.
Kisiimirwe Mutima Orikwera, naitwe okutabeekoreza gundi mutwaro, ogurikukira ebi ebirikwetengyerwa kimwe.
Mushemereire kwetantara ebitambiirwe ebishushani orwamba, enyama y'enyamaishwa ezihotoirwe, n'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani. Ku muraayerinde ebyo, nimuba mukozire gye. Mugumeho!
Abaatumirwe bakaimutsya orugyendo baaza Antiokiya, ei bateeraniire ab'ekigombe boona, bakabakwatsa ebaruha.
Ku baagishomire, baashemerererwa munonga ebirikubagumya ebyabaire bigirimu.
Yuda na Silaasi ahabw'okuba abarangi, bakagambira abo banyaruganda ebigambo bingi by'okubagumya n'okubagaruramu amaani.
Abo bombi bakateerayo ebiro, bwanyima abanyaruganda baabaraga nibabendeza obusingye, batyo baagarukayo aha baabatumire.
[Kwonka Silaasi we yaasiima kutsigarayo.]
Kandi Paulo na Barinaba baaguma Antiokiya hamwe n'abandi baingi nibeegyesa kandi nibarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, Paulo yaagira Barinaba ati: Ka tugarukyeyo, tutaayaayire ebirorero byona ebi twarangiriiremu ekigambo kya Mukama, tureebe abanyaruganda oku bari.
Barinaba yaayenda ngu bagyende na Yohaana-Mariko,
kwonka Paulo tiyaasiima kugyenda n'ogwo muntu owaabatsigireho Panfuliya, akanga kukwatanisa nabo omu murimo gwabo.
Ku baaherize kugira empaka z'okucwana, baataana. Barinaba yaatoora ogw'enyanja na Mariko, baaza Kupuro.
Paulo we, ku yaabaire atakaimukize, yaatoorana Silaasi kugyenda nawe; abanyaruganda baamukwatsa Ruhanga kumurindisa embabazi ze.
Yaaraba Siriya na Kilikiya, naahamya ebigombe by'Abakristo baayo.
Paulo ku yaarugireyo, yaaza Deribe na Lusitura. Okwo hakaba hariyo omwikiriza orikwetwa Timoteeho, ou nyina yaabaire ari Omuyudaayakazi kandi aikiriize, kwonka ishe ari Omuguriiki.
Kandi Timoteeho ogwo abanyaruganda aba Lusitura na Ikonio bakaba bamugambaho gye.
Mbwenu Paulo ku yaayenzire ngu bagyendane, yaamushara. Ekyo yaakikora ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya b'omu byanga ebyo boona bakaba nibamanya ishe ku ari Omuguriiki.
Ahi baabaire bahika nibaraba omu birorero, bahamiza abantu ebyahinguziibwe entumwa n'abakuru omuri Yerusalemu, kandi babeehanangiriza kuguma nibabikuratira.
Ekyo kyareetera ebigombe by'Abakristo kwongyera kuhamira omu kwikiriza n'okukanya buri izooba.
Paulo na Silaasi bakaraba omu nsi ya Furugiya na Galatiya, obwo Mutima Orikwera abagambiire kutarangirira kigambo kya Ruhanga omuri Asiya.
Ku baahikire aha nyatano ya Musiya, baayenda kugicwekanisa kuza Bituniya. Mutima wa Yesu ku yaabazibiire,
baaraba omuri Musiya, baashuuma, baaza Turoa.
Nyekiro Paulo yaabonekyerwa, naareeba Omunyamakedoniya ayemereire naamweshengyereza ati: Yambuka, oije Makedoniya, otuhwere.
Ku yaaherize kubonekyerwa, titurahwamire, twatebeekanisa eby'orugyendo rw'okwambuka kuza Makedoniya, obwo nituhamya ku Ruhanga atwetsire kubatwarira Amakuru Marungi.
Ku twatoire ogw'enyanja nituruga Turoa, twagumizamu twaza Samoturakiya. Eizooba eryakuratsireho, twaza Neapoli;
twarugayo twahika Filipi, orurembo rukuru rwa Makedoniya, oru Abarooma baakubwire. Ku haahingwireho ebiro bikye turi omuri orwo rurembo,
ahari Sabato twashohora nituraba omu irembo, twaza aha rubaju rw'omugyera, ahi twateekateekire ngu niho bashabira. Twashutama, twagaaniira n'abakazi abaabaire bateeraniireho.

Omuri abo bakazi hakaba harimu orikwetwa Ludiya, omukazi oramya Ruhanga, owaarugire omu kirorero kya Tiyatira, omutunzi w'emyenda ya bujwa. Akatutega okutu, Mukama yaashashaanura omutima gwe, yaikiriza ebi Paulo yaagambire.
We n'eka ye, ku baaherize kubatizibwa, yaatweshengyereza naagira ati: Ku muraabe nimumanya ngu ndi omwikiriza wa Mukama nyakabara, mwije mundaarire. Yaatugyemesereza.
Ku twabaire nituza omu mwanya gw'okushabiramu, twabugana omuzaana owaabaire aragura, akareetera bakama be emikimbo ei abantu baabaire bamutaashura.
Yaatandika kukuratira Paulo naitwe, naayamuza ati: Aba bantu n'abaheereza ba Ruhanga Rukiraboona, baizire kubarangirira omuhanda gw'okujunwa.

Akaguma naagira atyo buri izooba, okuhitsya obu izooba rimwe Paulo yaasambisiirwe, akahinduka, akagira ekyo kyago ati: Ninkuragiira omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo, ruga ahari ogwo mwishiki. Ekyago kyamurugaho omuri ako kaanya.
Bakama be ku baareebire hatakiriho matsiko g'okumutungamu ezindi mpiiha, baakwata Paulo na Silaasi, baabakurubana, baabatwarira ab'obushoboorozi omu kajagiro.
Okwo niyo baabatabaaririize omu maisho g'abaramuzi, nibagira bati: Abantu aba n'Abayudaaya, nibarabanisamu ekirorero kyaitu.
Nibeegyesa emicwe erikuzibirwa eiteeka ryaitu, ei itwe Abarooma tutarikwikiriza, kandi etari mu mitwarize yaitu.
Ekimbuuro ky'abantu baakwatanisa nabo kubarwanisa, abaramuzi baaragiira ku babajuura, bakabateera ebyasha.
Ku baaherize kubaasha, baabata omu kihome, baaragiira omukuru waakyo kubarinda obutaita riisho.
Nawe ahabw'okukuratira ebi yaaragiirwa, yaabata omu kihome eky'endugu; amaguru gaabo yaagata omu nkomo.
Ekyo kiro omu itumbi, Paulo na Silaasi ku baabaire nibashaba kandi nibeeshongora eby'okuhimbisa Ruhanga, obwo ezindi mbohe zibategire amatu,
ahonaaho haabaho omutsitsa mwingi, ogwatengyetsize ekihome n'obuhamizo bwakyo. Enyigi zoona zaiguka, n'enjegyere ezaabaire zikomire embohe zoona zaaragara.
Omukuru w'ekihome ku yaasisiimukire, yaashanga enyigi zirangaire, yaasyorayo rurara kweita, naateekateeka ngu embohe zaatoroka.
Kwonka Paulo yaayamuza n'eiraka rihango ati: Oteekora kubi, twena turi aha.
Mukuru w'ekihome yaatuma kureeta amatabaaza, yaayetuura omu nju, yaagwa omu maguru ga Paulo na Silaasi naatetema,
yaabashohoza aheeru, yaabagira ati: Bakama bangye nshemereire kukora ki, nkabona kujunwa?
Baamugira bati: Ikiriza Mukama Yesu, nibwo oraajunwe n'eka yaawe.
Kandi baamugambira ekigambo kya Mukama hamwe na boona abaabaire bari omu ka ye.
Omuri eryo itumbi yaabatwara kuboozya obuhuta, yaabatirizibwayo n'ab'eka ye boona.
Kandi yaabatwara owe, yaabaha ebyokurya; yaashemererwa hamwe n'ab'eka ye boona, ahabw'okuhinduka bakaikiriza Ruhanga.
Ku bwaseesire, abaramuzi Abarooma baaragiira abakuru b'ekihome bati: Murekure abo bashaija.
Omukuru w'ekihome yaabigambira Paulo, ati: Abaramuzi baaragiira ku tubarekura; mbwenu mwegyendere n'obusingye.

Paulo yaabagarukamu ati: Oti enki? Itwe enzaarwa za Rooma batuteereire omu maisho g'abantu batakabandize kututonganisa, baataho n'okututa omu kihome, mbwenu nibagira ngu nibaija kuturekura bwesherekye? Ngaaha! Babe nibo baija bakatushohoza.
Ebyo abarinzi b'ekihome baabigambira abaramuzi. Nabo baatiina munonga ahabw'okuhurira ngu abo bashaija n'enzaarwa za Rooma.
Baija baabeehohoora, baabashohoza, baabeeshengyereza kuruga omuri ekyo kirorero.
Batyo baaruga omu kihome, baaza omwa Ludiya ei baashangire abanyaruganda boona, bakabagumya, bwanyima bakagyenda.
Paulo na Silaasi bakaraba Anfipoli na Apoloniya, baarugaho baahika Tesalonika, ei Abayudaaya baabaire bainemu eiteeraniro.
Paulo nk'oku omucwe gwe gwabaire guri, yaabeetondera. Aha Sabato ishatu ezaakurataine, yaahakana nabo naajuriza Ebyahandiikirwe,
naashoboorora kandi naahamya ku Kristo yaabaire ari ow'okubonabonesibwa n'okuzooka omu bafiire. Yaagaruka yaabagira ati: Yesu ou ndikubarangirira niwe Kristo.
Abamwe omuribo bakashoboorokyerwa, baakwatanisa na Paulo na Silaasi, n'Abaguriiki baingi abarikutiina Ruhanga, hamwe n'abakazi abanyamaziina batari bakye.

Kwonka Abayudaaya ku baitsirwe eihari, baayeteerana n'abantu babi b'omu bizengyerezi by'omu katare, baimukiiriza ekimbuuro ky'abantu, baajagaraza ekirorero kyona. Baataahirira ab'omwa Yasooni, ngu bakaashangamu Paulo na Silaasi, babakurura, babatwara ahu abantu boona bateeraniire.

Kwonka tibaashangamu ondi weena, kureka Yasooni n'abanyaruganda bamwe; baabakurubana, baabahitsya omu maisho g'abakuru b'ekirorero, nibayogoora bati: Abantu ababaire nibajuumika ensi yoona, mbwenu baahika n'aha,
kandi Yasooni niwe abaire naabaraaza, haza nibagomera ebiragiro bya Kaisaari byona, nibagira ngu hariho ondi mugabe orikwetwa Yesu.
Abanyakirorero hamwe n'abanyaishengyero baayo ku baahuriire ekyo kirego, baayagaara,
baaragiira Yasooni n'abandi kugira eki baabakwatiriza, batakabarekwire.
Obwire ku bwaizire buti, abanyaruganda baayohereza ahonaaho Paulo na Silaasi ngu baze Beroya. Ku baahikireyo bati, baataaha omu iteeraniro ry'Abayudaaya.
Abaayo ahabw'okugira omutima murungi okukira aba Tesalonika, baajwahukira ekigambo n'ekihika, buri izooba baaguma nibashwijuma Ebyahandiikirwe, kureeba yaaba kiri eky'amazima.
Abayudaaya baingi baikiriza hamwe n'Abaguriikikazi baingi ab'ekitiinwa, n'abashaija batari bakye.
Abayudaaya ba Tesalonika ku baahuriire ngu Paulo naarangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'omuri Beroya, baazayo kurabanisamu abantu n'okubajagaraza.
Abanyaruganda nikwo kwohereza Paulo ahonaaho kuza aha nyanja; Silaasi na Timoteeho bo baatsigarayo.
Abaashendekyereize Paulo bakamuhitsya Ateene, baagaruka n'obutumwa bwe, ku Silaasi na Timoteeho bamushangayo ahonaaho nk'oku kirabaasikye.
Paulo ku yaabaire akitegyerereize Silaasi na Timoteo omuri Ateene, yaashaasha munonga kureeba orwo rurembo rwona rwijwire ebishushani ebirikuramibwa.
Yaaguma naahakanira omu iteeraniro n'Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga abarikutiina Ruhanga, kandi omu kajagiro buri izooba ahakana na weena owaamwizira.

Nangwa n'abanyabwengye bamwe, abarikwetwa Abeepikuro n'Abasitoiki baahakana nawe. Abamwe baagira bati: Beitu egi ngambi ya maingi, ebyo neemanya ebi erikugamba? Reero ahabw'okwegyesa ahari Yesu n'eby'okuzooka, abandi bati: Nooshusha oti n'omuntu orikubuzya orukuru rw'ebya baaruhanga abu kunu tutarikumanya.
Baamweta ku agyenda nabo omu ishengyero erikuru ei baamugiriire bati: Egi nyegyesa nsya ei obaire noogambaho, mbwenu okaagitushoboororera?
Bimwe omu bi ogambire bitutangaarize, tukaayenzire kumanya amakuru gaabyo.
Manya ekishemeza Abaateene n'Abanyamahanga abarutwiremu, n'okugaaniira aha bintu bisya ebihangire, hamwe n'okuhurira eki barikubigambaho.
Paulo nikwo kwemerera ahagati y'eishengyero erikuru, akagamba ati: Imwe bashaija ba Ateene 'mwe, mperize kwetegyereza ku muri ab'ediini munonga.

Manya ku mbaire ningyendagyenda omu rurembo rwanyu, niinyetegyereza ebi murikuramya, naareeba eitambiro erihandiikirweho ngu: N'erya Ruhanga otarikumanywa. Mbwenu Ruhanga ou ndikurangirira, buzimazima niwe ogwo ou muramya mutarikumumanya.
Ruhanga owaahangire ensi yoona n'ebigirimu, niwe Nyakubaho w'eiguru n'ensi, tatuura mu ndaaro ezombekirwe emikono y'abantu.
Tabangirwa bantu nk'oine eki akyenire, ahabw'okuba boona niwe abaha amagara n'omwitsyo na buri kintu.
Akahanga amahanga g'omu nsi yoona, gaakomooka aha muntu omwe. Yaagateeraho ebiro bi garaamare, n'enyatano zaago ahi ziraagarukire.
Akakora ekyo, ngu amahanga goona gabone kusherura Ruhanga nigabandagira, okuhitsya obu garimugwaho. Kwonka shi, tari hare n'omuntu weena omuriitwe;
ahabw'okuba Omuriwe nimwo tutungira amagara tukagyenda kandi tukagumaho, nk'oku abahandiiki baanyu abamwe baagizire bati: Naitwe turi abaana be.
Nk'oku turi abaana ba Ruhanga, titwine ky'okwekwatsa kugira ngu Ruhanga naashusha ezaabu, efeeza nari eibaare, ebisharwirwe bikaringirikwa omuntu.
Ebyo Ruhanga akabirenzya amaisho abantu bakiri abashema; kwonka mbwenu naaragiira abantu boona ahi bari hoona ngu beegarukyemu.
Ahabw'okuba akataho ekiro eki omuntu ou yaataireho aricwereraho ensi yoona orubanja omu mazima, kandi ekyo akakihamiza abantu boona obu yaazoora ogwo muntu omu bafiire.
Ku baahuriire Paulo yaagamba eky'okuzooka omu bafiire, bamwe aharibo ensheko zaabeegyeka; abandi baagira bati: Tukaayenzire kuhurira ekyo nookigambaho obundi.
Paulo atyo abarugaho.
Kwonka habaho bamwe abaamwekomireho, bakaba abaikiriza; omuribo harimu Dionisio ow'eishengyero erikuru n'omukazi orikwetwa Damari, hamwe n'abandi.
Ebyo ku byahwaire, Paulo yaaruga Ateene, yaaza Korinto,

ei yaabugaine Omuyudaaya orikwetwa Akwila, enzaarwa ya Ponto. We n'omukazi we Purisikila nibwo baabaire barugire juba Italiya, ahabw'okuba Rubambansi Kalaudio akaba aragiire Abayudaaya boona kuruga omuri Rooma. Paulo nikwo kuza kubataayaayira;
kandi ku yaashangire bari abakozi b'amahema ab'omwoga nk'ogwe, yaaguma nabo nibakora kumwe.
Buri Sabato akaba ahakanira omu mateeraniro, naateeraho kwikirizisa Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki.
Silaasi na Timoteeho ku baaherize kwija nibaruga Makedoniya, Paulo yaamara omwanya gwe gwona omu kurangirira, naagambira Abayudaaya ku Yesu ari Kristo.
Ku baatandikire kumutariza n'okumujuma, yaakunkumura omunagiro gwe, naagira ati: Eshagama yaanyu ebe niimwe yaatukurira! Nyowe ndi mwere. Okwiha hati naaza omu Banyamahanga.
Atyo arugayo aza omu nju ya Tito Yusito owaabaire aramya Ruhanga. Enju ye ekaba ehereeraine n'eiteeraniro.
Kurisipo omukuru w'eiteeraniro, we n'ab'eka ye boona baikiriza Mukama. Abakorinto baingi munonga abaahuriire Paulo, nabo baikiriza kandi baabatizibwa.
Ku bwabaire buri nyekiro, Mukama yaabonekyera Paulo, yaamugira ati: Otatiina, guma ogambe kandi otahunama.
Nkwine kandi tihariho muntu weena oraakukore kubi, ahabw'okuba omu rurembo oru, nyinemu abantu baingi abari aha rubaju rwangye.
N'ahabw'ekyo Paulo yaagumayo naarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama okumara ameezi ikumi na munaana.
Galio ku yaabaire ari omutegyeki mukuru wa Akaiya, Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okukwata Paulo, baamutwara omu iramuriro.
Baagira bati: Ogu mushaija nitumutabaariza orubanja rw'okwosya abantu kuramya Ruhanga omu buryo butarikwikirizibwa iteeka.
Paulo ku yaabaire atakagambire, Galio yaagira Abayudaaya ati: Imwe Bayudaaya 'mwe, nimuhurire! Ekyo kuri kyaba kiri ekishobyo ky'okushaazya nari ekicumuro, nkaabaire nyine obwiho kw'okubahurira.
Kwonka mbwenu empaka zaanyu ku ziraabe ziri aha bigambo n'aha maziina n'aha iteeka ryanyu mwenka, muzeemarire. Nyowe tinkaayenzire kucwa orubanja rw'ebintu nk'ebyo.
Atyo ababinga omu iramuriro.
Ahonaaho nabo bahindukana Sositene, omukuru w'eiteeraniro, baamuteerera omu maisho g'enju y'eiramuriro; Galio ebyo byona abihugaho.

Bwanyima Paulo ku yaaherize kuteerayo ebiro, yaaraga abanyaruganda, yaatoora ogw'enyanja, yaaza Siriya aine Purisikila na Akwila. Ku yaabaire ari Kenkereya, yaamwerayo eishokye nk'oku yaabaire ahigire.
Ku baahikire Efeso, yaabatsigayo. Yaataaha omu iteeraniro wenka, yaahakana n'Abayudaaya.
Ku baamushabire ku abooshera ebindi biro, yaayanga.
Kwonka ku yaagiire kurugayo, yaabagira ati: Ruhanga yaaba akunzire, ndyagaruka. Atyo atoora ogw'enyanja, aruga Efeso.
Yaayambukira Kaisaariya, yaaza kuramutsya ekigombe ky'Abakristo, bwanyima yaataaha Antiokiya.
Okwo yaamarayo ebiro bikye atakagumiizemu rugyendo rwe, orw'okuraba omu nsi y'Abagalatiya n'omuri Furugiya, naagumya abaikiriza boona.
Ago magingo Omuyudaaya orikwetwa Apolo, enzaarwa ya Alekisanderiya, owaabaire ari omugambi murungi kandi orikumanya munonga Ebyahandiikirwe, akahika Efeso.
Kwonka nobu araabe yaabaire ayegyesiibwe eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama, kandi naarangirira n'omuhimbo ebya Yesu n'okubyegyesa gye, hoona akaba naamanya eby'okubatiza kwa Yohaana byonka.
Purisikila na Akwila ku baamuhuriire naagambisa obumanzi omu iteeraniro, baamutwara, baayongyera kumwegyesa eby'Omuhanda gwa Ruhanga.
Apolo ku yaatungire ekiteekateeko ky'okwambuka kuza Akaiya, abanyaruganda baamugumya, baahandiikira abaikiriza baayo kumwakiira. Ku yaahikireyo, yaakwatsa munonga abaikiriize ahabw'okuhwerwa Ruhanga,
ahabw'okuba akahakanisisa amaani Abayudaaya omu maisho g'abantu, kandi yaabashoboororera naayema omu Byahandiikirwe ku Yesu ari Kristo.
Apolo ku yaabaire akiri Korinto, Paulo yaagyenda naaraba omu kyanga kya ruguru, yaahika Efeso ei yaashangire abatendekwa bamwe.
Ku yaababuurize ati: Mukaheebwa Mutima Orikwera obu mwaikiriza? Baamugarukamu bati: Ngaaha, nangwa titukahuriraga ku hariho Mutima Orikwera.
Agaruka ababuuza ati: Mbwenu shi mukabatizibwa muta? Bati: Tukabatizibwa okwa Yohaana.
Paulo ati: Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaba kuri okw'abeegarukiremu kandi akaba ayehanangiriza abantu ngu baikirize ogwo orikwija amukuratiire, niwe Yesu.
Ku baahuriire ekyo, baabatizibwa omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu.
Kandi Paulo ku yaabataireho ati emikono, Mutima Orikwera yaabaijaho; baatandika kugamba endimi n'okuranga.
Boona bakaba bari nka ikumi na babiri.
Bwanyima Paulo yaaza omu iteeraniro, yaagambiramu n'obumanzi, kandi yaahakaniramu n'obwengye kubaikirizisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Yaamara ameezi ashatu naakora atyo,

okuhitsya obu bamwe omu baabaire nibamuhurira baagangaire, bakanga kwikiriza. Ku baatandikire bati kuhakanisiza eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama omu maisho g'abantu, yaataana nabo, yaatwara abatendekwa be kwehereera, kandi buri izooba baaguma nibahanuurira omu kishengye kya Turaano eky'okwegyesezamu.
Yaagumizamu naakora atyo kumara emyaka ebiri; ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omuri Asiya boona Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki, baahurira ekigambo kya Mukama.
Ruhanga akakoresa Paulo eby'okutangaaza by'omutaano.
Bakaba batwara ebitambaara n'emitanda ebyabaire bimuhikaho, babikoza aha barwaire, bakira endwara, n'ebyago bibarugaho.
Abandi Bayudaaya abaabaire bagyenda nibabinga ebyago, bakateeraho kukoresa eiziina rya Mukama Yesu aha bantu abaabaire batembirwe ebyago, nibagira bati: Ninkuragiira omuri Yesu ou Paulo arangirira.
Omuri abo abaakikozire, hakaba harimu abatsigazi mushanju, batabani b'Omuyudaaya Sikeeva omuhongyerezi omukuru.
Ekyago kyabagarukamu kiti: Yesu nimmumanya na Paulo nimmumanya; kwonka imwe muri baahi?
Ogwo mushaija oriho ekyago nikwo kubagurukira, akaikarira ow'okubanza, akataho n'ondi, akabajuguta; bakahunga omuri egyo nju bajwaire busha kandi bahutaire munonga.
Abantu boona ab'omuri Efeso, Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki, ku baakihuriire, baatiina munonga; haza eiziina rya Mukama Yesu ryaheebwa ekitiinwa kihango.
Baingi aha baikiriize, baija, baayatura ebi baabaire nibakora, baabitondoora byona.
Kandi abaabaire nibakora eby'obufumu, barundaana ebitabo byabo baabyokyeza omu maisho g'abantu. Obuguzi bwabyo bukabariirirwa, bwahitsya ebicweka by'efeeza obukumi butaano.
Kityo ekigambo kya Mukama kyayongyera kubuga n'amaani, kitarikuteerwa ha mutwe.
Ebyo byona ku byahwaire Paulo yaamariirira kugaruka Yerusalemu, naaraba Makedoniya na Akaiya. Yaagira ati: Ku ndaabe naaherize kuhikayo, niinyija kuza na Rooma.
Atyo yaatuma babiri aha bahwezi be, Timoteeho na Eraasito kumwebembera kuza Makedoniya, we akitsigaire omuri Asiya.
Omu bunaku obwo hakabaho akaimukiiriro k'akabi, akakwatiraine n'eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama.
Omuheesi w'eby'efeeza orikwetwa Demetirio, owaabaire naaheesesa abanyamyoga baingi ebishushani by'endaaro za ruhangakazi Aritemi,
akataho oruteerane ruhango rw'abantu be n'abandi abarikukora omurimo nk'ogwe. Yaabagira ati: Bashaija 'mwe, nimumanya omurimo gw'okuheesha ogu ku nigwo gutwemereizeho.

Mbwenu muherize kureeba nainga kuhurira, ti muri Efeso yonka, kureka n'ahandi hoona omuri Asiya, ku omushaija ogu Paulo ayohize kandi ahindwire abantu baingi munonga, naabashoboororera oku baaruhanga abakozirwe engaro batari baaruhanga n'akakye.

Eki tikirikwita bushuubuzi bwonka, kureka n'endaaro y'emandwakazi yaitu rugambwa Aritemi nikiija kugimaramu ensha, kandi tikiribura kwihaho kitiinwa ky'emandwakazi erikuramibwa omuri Asiya yoona n'ahandi hoona omu nsi.
Ebigambo ebyo bikabaitsa ekiniga, baatandika kwamuza bati: Aritemi w'Abeefeso niwe rugambwa!
Orurembo rwona rwaimukiirira, omutwe gw'abantu gwayeshuka omu kizaaniro, gwabindirana Abamakedoniya babiri, Gaayo na Arisitariko, abu Paulo yaabaire agyenda nabo.
Paulo yaayenda kuza omuri abo bantu kubaretsya, kwonka abatendekwa tibaamukundira.
Kandi na bamwe aha bakungu bakuru ba Asiya, abaabaire bari banywani be, baamutumaho nibamweshengyereza kutaza mu kizaaniro akeenaga omu kabi.
Obwo buri omwe akaba naayomba okwe, okuhitsya obu abaabaire bateeraniireho baabuzirwe kumanya ekiriho, n'abaingi batarikumanya ki beeteirwe.
Abayudaaya baayoha Alekisandero omu maisho gaabo. Ab'omu kimbuuro ky'abantu ku baimukize akaari k'okumuhigika, yaabaretsya n'omukono, ngu akaagira eki yaashoboororera abantu.
Kwonka ku baamanyire Alekisandero ku ari Omuyudaaya, baayamuza n'eiraka rimwe, bagumize bati: Aritemi ow'Abeefeso niwe rugambwa! Baagumizamu batyo okuheza eshaaha ibiri.

Omuhandiiki ku yaaherize kucureeza ogwo mutwe gw'abantu, yaabagira ati: Imwe Banyaefeso 'mwe, hariho omuntu otarikumanya ngu orurembo rw'Abeefeso nirwo rurinda eiramizo rya Aritemi omukuru rugambwa, kandi n'ekishushani kye ekyarugire omu iguru?
Ekyo tihariho n'omwe orikukihakanisa, kandi timushemereire kwimukiirira nari okukorera eryo ekintu nimurahukiiriza.
Abashaija aba abu mwareeta tibacumwire, kandi tibarogotsire ha mandwakazi yaitu.
Demetirio n'abanyamyoga bu aine ku baraabe baine ou barikufa nawe, hariho amaramuriro n'abategyeki bakuru, babe niyo baatwara orubanja rwabo.
Kandi ku muraabe mwine ebi murikwenda kubabuuza, mubibabuurize omu ruteerane rw'obutoosha.
Manya naitwe tukaateebwaho orubanja rw'okujagarara ahabw'ebyabaho eri izooba. Tihariho ky'okwekwatsa ekyakitukoresa, kandi titwine ky'oburyo ekyatureetera kuteeranira aha.
Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo, yaaragiira oruteerane kuyaabuuka.
Akajagararo ku kaahwaire, Paulo yaayeeta abaikiriza, yaabagambira eby'okubagumya, yaabaraga, yaimutsya orugyendo kuza Makedoniya.
Ku yaaherize kuraba omuri ebyo byanga, n'okubagambira ebigambo bingi by'okubagumya, yaaza Buguriiki.
Okwo amarayo ameezi ashatu. Ku yaabaire naayenda kutemba obwato kuza Siriya, Abayudaaya bacuma enaama y'okumwita. Nawe nikwo kucwamu kugaruka enyima akatoora ogwa Makedoniya.
Obwo akaba ashendekyereziibwe Sopateeri, mwene Puuro owa Beroya; na Arisitariko na Sekundo Abatesalonika; Gaayo owa Deribe na Timoteeho na Tukiko na Turofimo aba Asiya.
Boona baatwebembera nibaza Turoa ei baatutegyerereize.
Naitwe twaruga Filipi turi omu bwato, ebiro by'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe biherize kuhwaho. Twabugabuganira nabo Turoa, hahingwireho ebiro bitaano; okwo twamarayo ebiro mushanju.
Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki, tukateerana kurya kumwe omugaati, Paulo owaabaire arariire kugyenda bwasheesha, yaagumizamu naagamba nabo, bwarugaho bwaba eitumbi.
Ekishengye ky'ahaiguru eki twabaire tuteeraniiremu, kikaba nikyakwamu amatabaaza maingi.

Paulo ku yaagumiizemu naagamba, omutsigazi orikwetwa Eutuko, owaabaire ashutami aha ndeebareebo y'edirisa, yaahungira, oturo twarugaho twamurembya, yaahanantuka omuri kaanyinaashatu, yaayetuura ahansi. Bamwihaho afiire.
Paulo yaashuuma, yaajuumarira ogwo mwojo, yaamubumbatira, yaagira ati: Murekye kutiina, akihuriire.
Atyo agarukayo omu kishengye ky'ahaiguru, acwamu omugaati, aryaho, agumizamu naagamba okuhitsya obu yaarugireyo nibwaba, akagyenda.
Bwanyima baatwara ogwo mwojo ahuriire, omutima gwabagaruka omunda.
Itwe nu tukatemba obwato, twaza Aso kwakiirirayo Paulo, ahabw'okuba we akaba acwiremu kutoora ogw'ebigyere.
Ku yaatushangire Aso, twamuta omu bwato, twagumizamu twahika Mituleene.
Ku bwaseesire, twarugayo, twahika ahashungaine na Kiyo. Aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Samosi, kandi eizooba eryakuratsireho twayegaranjura Mileeto.
Obwo Paulo akaba amaririire kutaraba Efeso, ngu atakaakyerererwa omuri Asiya. Manya akaba aine obwira, ngu kyaba nikibaasika, abe omuri Yerusalemu aha kiro kya Pentekooti.
Paulo ku yaabaire ari Mileeto, yaatuma aha bakuru b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo ba Efeso kumushangayo.
Ku baahikireyo, yaabagambira ebigambo ebi ati: Nimumanya oku emitwarize yangye yaabaire eri, naaba kubaijamu omuri Asiya,
oku naabaire mpeereza Mukama n'obucureezi bwingi, kandi nimumanya obusaasi n'ebihikiirizi ebyangwireho ahabw'enaama mbi z'Abayudaaya.
Tindarekire kubakorera kintu kyona ekibainiire omugasho omu kubarangirira n'okubahabura, muteeraniire hamwe kandi muri n'omu maka gaanyu,
obwo niinyehanangiriza Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki okweteisiza Ruhanga n'okwikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu.
Hati nimureeba ku ndikugyemwa Mutima kuza Yerusalemu ntarikumanya birambeho naahikayo;
kureka omu buri kirorero ki ndabiremu, Mutima Orikwera ammanyiise gye, ku ndi ow'okuteebwa omu kihome n'okuhiiganisibwa.

Kwonka nyowe tiinyine ki ndikutiina omuri ebyo byona, n'amagara gangye tindikugeeta kantu, kizima niho ndikuhikiiriza orugyendo rwangye n'omurimo ogu Mukama Yesu yampaire, nikwo kuhamya Amakuru Marungi ag'embabazi za Ruhanga.
Mbwenu nimmanyira kimwe ku hatariho n'omwe omuriimwe, abu naahikireho nimbuzya eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, orincwa eryera obundi.
N'ahabw'ekyo hati nimbahamiza ku ndi mwere ahariimwe mwena oku mwingana,
ahabw'okuba nkabamanyisa eby'enaama ya Ruhanga byona ntarikwebarira.
Mwerinde kandi murinde obusyo bwona obu Mutima Orikwera yaabakwatsize kureeberera, okuba abariisa b'ekigombe kya Mukama, eki yaayecunguriire n'eshagama ye wenka.
Nimmanya gye ngu ku ndigyenda, emishega enshaarizi eryabataahirira, kandi obwo busyo teribugirira saasi.
Nangwa n'omuriimwe haryarugamu abantu abarihabisa abaikiriza.
N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde, kandi mwijukye ku naamazire naimwe emyaka eshatu, ntarikwosha nyomushana na nyekiro nimpabura buri omwe n'amarira.
Hati nimbakwatsa Ruhanga n'ekigambo kye eky'embabazi. Abahamye, abahe omwanya ogu mwateekateekyeirwe omu beeziibwe boona.
Nyowe tinkashabaga muntu weena kasente nari eky'okujwara.
Manya mwena nimumanya ku emikono yangye egi niyo yaabaire empaisa eby'okutunga hamwe n'abu naabaire nyine.
Ebyo byona nkabikora kubooreka ku tushemereire kukoresa amaani, ngu tubone kuhwera abatagaine, obwo nitwijuka ebigambo bya Mukama Yesu, owaagizire ati: Okugaba kwine omugisha okukira okuheebwa.
Paulo ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaatsimba amaju nabo boona, baashaba.
Obwo, boona bakaba nibarira, nibarengyeza Paulo emikono omu maraka, nibamunywegyera.
Ekyakizire kubareetera obusaasi n'okubagambira ngu tibarimucwa ryera bundi. Batyo baamushendekyereza, baamuhitsya aha bwato.
Bwanyima ku twaherize kutaana nabo, twatoora ogw'enyanja, twagumizamu tutyo, twahika Koosi. Eizooba ryakuratsireho, twahika Rooda. Okwo niyo twarugire nituza Patara,
ei twashangire obwato burikuza Foinikiya, tukaburagaramu, tukagyenda.
Ku twaherize kuranzya Kupuro, twagitsiga orubaju rwa bumosho, twaza Siriya. Twarugayo twahika Tuuro, ahabw'okuba niyo baabaire nibaza kuteekuururira esika omu bwato.
Ku twaherize kubona abaikiriza, twamaraho ebiro mushanju. Ahabw'okuhaburwa Mutima, baagambira Paulo kutaza Yerusalemu.

Kwonka obunaku ku bwahikire, twaimutsya orugyendo. Boona hamwe n'abakazi n'abaana baatushendekyereza, okuhitsya obu twarugire omuri ekyo kirorero. Ku twahikire aha nkungu y'enyanja, twatsimba amaju twashaba. Bwanyima ku twaherize kuragana,
twaza omu bwato, nabo baagarukayo owaabo.
Orugyendo rwaitu rw'okuruga Tuuro ku rwahwaire, twahika Putolemaida, ei twaramukiize abanyaruganda, tukabaraarira ekiro kimwe.
Ku bwaseesire twarugayo, twahika Kaisaariya. Twaraba ahari Filipo omurangirizi w'Amakuru Marungi, omwe ahari bari omushanju, twamuraarira.
Akaba aine bahara be bana enshugaane, bari abarangikazi.
Ku twabaire tumazireyo ebiro, haija omurangi orikwetwa Agabo, naaruga Buyudaaya.

Yaakwata orukoba rwa Paulo yaarwekomesa ebigyere n'emikono, yaagira ati: Oku nikwo Mutima Orikwera arikugamba ati: Mukama w'orukoba oru naija kukomwa atyo Abayudaaya b'omuri Yerusalemu, bamuheyo omu Banyamahanga.
Ekyo ku twakihuriire, itwe n'abandi boona abaabaire bariho, twayehanangiriza Paulo kutaza Yerusalemu.

Yaatugarukamu ati: Mbwenu ekyo nimukora ki; haza muza aho, murira ngu muncwe entegye? Manya nyowe tiinyeteekateekyeire kukomwa kwonka, kureka n'okufeera omuri Yerusalemu ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama Yesu.
Mpaho ku ayanga kutworobera, tumureka tugira tuti: Mukama eki arikwenda kikorwe.
Ebyo ku byahwaire, twakoma ebyaitu, twainamuka twaza Yerusalemu.
Bamwe omu baikiriza ba Kaisaariya baatushendekyereza, baatuhitsya aha nju y'Omunyakupuro ou twabaire nituza kuraarira, orikwetwa Munasooni, omwe aha baikiriza abaabandize.
Ku twahikire tuti omuri Yerusalemu, abanyaruganda baatutangirira n'okushemererwa kwingi.
Ku bwaseesire, Paulo yaagyenda naitwe kureeba Yakobo, kandi abakuru b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo boona bakaba bariyo.
Ku yaaherize kubaramutsya, yaabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaamukoreise omu Banyamahanga.
Nabo ku baabihuriire, baahimbisa Ruhanga. Kwonka baamugira bati: Munyaruganda, iwe nooreeba oku enkumi n'enkumi z'Abayudaaya bahindukire bakaikiriza; haza boona nibeezirika kukuratira eiteeka.

Kwonka bahuriire ku orikwegyesa Abayudaaya boona abatwire omu Banyamahanga kutsigaho eiteeka rya Musa; kandi ngu noobagambira ku kitarikuragiirwa kushara batabani baabo, nari okukuratira emicwe y'eihanga.
Mbwenu tugire tuta? Manya boona tibarikubura kuteerana, ku baraahurire ngu oizire.
Hati kora eki turikukuhabura. Aha twineho abashaija bana abaahigire;
obatware, oyeyeze hamwe nabo, oihure byona eby'okubamwa eishokye. Ekyo nikiija kumanyisa boona ku ebi baakugambireho bitari by'amazima, kandi naiwe obutoosha ku okuratira eiteeka.

Mbwenu Abanyamahanga abaikiriize tuherize kubahandiikira, twabamanyisa ebi twahingwize, ku bashemereire kwetantara ebitambiirwe ebishushani, orwamba, enyama y'ebihotoirwe, n'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani.
Aha izooba eryakuratsireho, Paulo yaatwara abo bashaija, yaayezibwa nabo. Yaataaha omuri Nyaruju kumanyisa obunaku obu ebiro by'okwezibwa biraahweremu, ku nibwo ekihongwa kya buri omwe kiriheebwayo.
Ebiro ebyo omushanju ku byabaire biri haihi kuhwaho, Abayudaaya bamwe abaarugire Asiya baareeba Paulo omuri Nyaruju. Baimukiiriza abantu, baamukwata,

nibayogoora bati: Imwe Baisiraeli 'mwe, nimutuhe emikono! Ogu niwe mushaija oza buri hantu, akarangirira abantu naahakanisa eihanga ryaitu, eiteeka n'omwanya ogu. Mbwenu ataahize Abaguriiki omuri Nyaruju, atyo yaahagaza omwanya ogu ogurikwera!
Ekyo bakakigamba, ahabw'okuba bakaba baareebire Turofimo Omunyaefeso ari hamwe na Paulo omu rurembo, baateekateeka ngu Paulo amutaahize omuri Nyaruju.
Orurembo rwona rwajagarara, abantu baayooka, baakwata Paulo, baamukurubana, baamushohoza aheeru ya Nyaruju, ahonaaho enyigi zaakingwa.
Bakiba nibenda kumwita, enkuru ehika omukuru w'eihe, ku Yerusalemu yoona yaajagarara.
Ahonaaho ayeta abaserukare n'abakuru baabo, boohokyera abo bantu; nabo ku bareeba omukuru w'eihe n'abaserukare, barekyera aho kuteera Paulo.
Ogwo omukuru w'eihe ku yaahikire Paulo, yaamukwata, yaaragiira ku bamukomesa enjegyere ibiri, yaabuuza ati: Ogu n'oha, kandi akozire ki?

Bamwe omuri ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu bagarukamu nibabuuza, bamwe eki, n'abandi ekindi; orwari rwabo rumuremesa kushoboorokyerwa eki barikugamba, nawe nikwo kuragiira ku batwara Paulo omu kigo ky'abaserukare.
Ku baahikize Paulo aha bitembezo, ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu kyayeyongyera kugira ekishinjo, abaserukare nikwo kumukiriza;
abantu boona bakaguma babakuratiire nibayogoorekana bati: Mumwite!
Kwonka Paulo ku yaabaire arangariire kutaahibwa omu kigo, yaabuuza omukuru w'eihe ati: Noonyikiriza kugira eki naakugambira? Onu ati: Biri noogamba Oruguriiki?
Tiiwe Munyamisiri ori ogomeise abantu ebiro ebi, akatwara omu ihamba abashaija enkumi ina abaitsi b'abantu?
Paulo amugarukamu ati: Nyowe ndi Omuyudaaya enzaarwa y'omu rurembo Taruso orw'omuri Kilikiya. Naakweshengyereza, nyikiriza ngire eki naagambira abantu.
Onu amwikiriza. Paulo nikwo kuretsya abantu n'omukono ayemereire aha bitembezo. Boona ku baacecekire, yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo.
Mpaho Paulo agambira Abayudaaya ati: Beene waitu na baataata, nimuhurire ebi naaza kubagambira niinyetonganira.
Ku baahuriire yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo, baaceceka okukiraho. Paulo yaabagira ati:

Ndi Omuyudaaya enzaarwa ya Taruso omuri Kilikiya. Nkakurira omuri orwo rurembo, naatendekwa Gamalieli kukuratira eiteeka rya baatataitwe nk'oku riri. Buzimazima nkaba nyine omuhimbo gw'ebya Ruhanga nk'oku mugwine hati.
Nkahiiganisa ab'Omuhanda ogu n'amaani gangye goona, naaboha abakazi n'abashaija, naabataisa omu kihome.

Ekyo omuhongyerezi omukuru n'oruteerane rwona orw'abakuru omu ihanga nibakihamya. Manya bakampa n'ebaruha kuzitwarira beene waabo omuri Damasiko. Nkazayo ngu nyiheyo embohe, nzireete Yerusalemu, zifubirwe.
Ku naabaire ninkigyenda, ndi haihi kuhika Damasiko, nk'omu ihangwe, ahonaaho naayakirwa ekimurinkano kihango nikiruga omu iguru, kyanyehinguririza.
Naagwa ahansi, naahurira eiraka niringira riti: Saulo, Saulo, nompiiganisiza ki?
Naanye naagarukamu nti: Ori oha, Mukama wangye? Nawe yangira ati: Niinye Yesu owa Nazareeti, ou orikuhiiganisa.
Abantu bu naabaire nyine, baakareeba ekyo kimurinkano, kwonka tibarahuriire iraka ry'orikugamba naanye.
Naagira nti: Mukama wangye, mbwenu nkore ki? Mukama yangarukamu ati: Imuka, oze Damasiko, okwo niyo oraagambirirwe byona ebi oteekateekyeirwe kukora.
Ekyo kimurinkano kikaaka munonga, kyampumya, bagyenzi bangye nikwo kunkwatira ekihimbo, nkabona kuhika Damasiko.
Omushaija orikwetwa Ananiya, omunyadiini orikukuratira eiteeka kandi orikusiimwa Abayudaaya boona abatwireyo,
akaija kundeeba. Yaanyemerera aha rubaju, yangira ati: Mwene tata Saulo, humuuka. Ahonaaho naahumuuka, naamureeba.
Bwanyima yangira ati: Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe akutooraine kumanya ebi akunda, n'okureeba Ogwo Ohikiriire, kandi n'okuhurira eiraka rye.
Manya noija kuba kareebi we omu bantu boona, noohamya ebi waareebire n'ebi waahuriire.
Kandi mbwenu oteekirwe ki? Imuka, obatizibwe, oyogibweho ebibi byawe noohoogyera eiziina rye.
Ku naaherize kugaruka Yerusalemu, naaza omuri Nyaruju kushaba; ahonaaho naashusha nk'orikuroota,
naareeba Mukama. Yangira ati: Rahuka, orugye Yerusalemu juba, ahabw'okuba abaamwo tibarikwija kwikiriza ebi orikungambaho nonjurira.
Naamugarukamu nti: Mukama wangye, nibamanya ku naabaire ngyendagyenda omu mateeraniro, ninta omu kihome abarikukwikiriza kandi nimbateera ebyasha.
Nobu baita Sitefano omujurizi waawe, nkaba nyemereireho niinyikirizana n'abarikumwita, ndinzire ebijwaro byabo.
Nawe nikwo kungira ati: Irooko, nkutume hare omu Banyamahanga.
Abantu bakaguma bamutegire okutu, okuhitsya obu yaagambire ebyo bigambo, bakatandika kuyogoora bati: Ogwo mushaija nimumwihe aha butaka! Tashemereire kugumaho!
Obwo bakaba nibatokoorekana, nibahungyeetsa eminagiro yaabo, kandi nibatuumuura omucuucu ahaiguru.
Omukuru w'eihe Omurooma nikwo kuragiira kumutaasya omu kigo, n'okumuteera ebyasha kumutakisa, abone kumanya ekirikutokoorekanisa kityo Abayudaaya.
Ku baaherize kumukoma, Paulo yaabuuza omukuru orikurinda, ati: Omu iteeka nimwikirizibwa kuteera omuntu ebyasha, ari Omurooma kandi atakatonganisiibwe?
Ogwo mukuru w'abaserukare ku akihurira, agyenda abiteera omukuru w'eihe, ati: Ebyo noomanya eki orikukora? Manya ogu mushaija n'Omurooma.
Omukuru w'eihe nikwo kwija akamubuuza ati: Ngambira, kwokwo ori Omurooma?
Paulo amugarukamu ati: Eego, nikwo ndi. Omukuru w'eihe agarukamu ati: Nyowe okutunga oburooma bukancwera ebintu. Paulo nawe ati: Manya nyowe nkabuzaarirwamu.
Mbwenu obwo abaabaire nibenda kumutakisa, bamurugaho ahonaaho, kandi omukuru w'eihe, ku amanya ngu abohire Omurooma, atiina munonga.

Eizooba eryakuratsireho, ahabw'okwenda kumanya eky'amazima eki Abayudaaya barikumutabaaririza, ogwo mukuru w'eihe aragiira ku babohoorora Paulo, kandi aragiira abahongyerezi abakuru n'ab'eishengyero boona kuteerana; atyo areeta Paulo, amwemereza omu maisho gaabo.
Paulo ahamya amaisho ab'eishengyero, atandika kugamba ati: Banyaruganda, okuhitsya eri izooba ntuura nintwaza gye omu maisho ga Ruhanga, ntaine kirikunshinja.
Ku yaagambire ekyo, Ananiya omuhongyerezi omukuru yaaragiira abeemereire Paulo haihi, kumuteera aha munwa.
Paulo yaamugira ati: Iwe kisiika kisiigirwe einoni 'we, Ruhanga naiwe aryakuteera! Oshutami aha kitebe kuncwera orubanja nk'oku eiteeka riri, haza oragiira kunteera kunu kitarikwikirizibwa?
Abaabaire bamwemereire aha rubaju bagira bati: Ka noojuma omuhongyerezi mukuru wa Ruhanga!
Paulo agarukamu ati: Beene tata, naaba ntarikumanya ku ari omuhongyerezi omukuru, manya ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti: Otarijuma omutegyeki w'eihanga ryawe.

Paulo ku yaamanyire ngu abateeraniire aho, abamwe n'Abasadukaayo, abandi n'Abafarisaayo, yaagambira Eishengyero n'eiraka rihango, ati: Beene waitu, nyowe ndi Omufarisaayo kandi omwana w'Abafarisaayo. Nintabaarizibwa ahabw'okuba itwe twikiriza ngu abafiire baryazooka.
Ku yaabaire yaaheza ati kugamba ekyo, Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo baimutsya empaka, eishengyero ryayecwamu kabiri.
Manya Abasadukaayo bagira ngu, tihariho kuzooka kandi tihariho baamaraika nobu yaakuba emitima; haza kunu Abafarisaayo babiikiriza byonshatu.

Haabaho orwari rwingi, bamwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka ab'omu kigombe ky'Abafarisaayo baayemerera, baabahakanisa n'amaani bati: Titurikureeba eki ogu mushaija ashobize. Shana Mutima nari maraika akaaba niwe amugambiire!
Empaka ku zaarambire, omukuru w'eihe yaatiina, ngu batakaanyururana Paulo bakamutaanyaguza, yaaragiira engabo ze kushuuma, zimubasikure, zimutware omu kigo.
Nyekiro Mukama yaamubonekyera, yaamugira ati: Hama! Nk'oku wambeera kareebi omuri Yerusalemu, obe nikwo waatwaza n'omuri Rooma.
Ku bwaseesire, Abayudaaya baayeteerana: baacuma enaama nibahiga ku batarikwija kurya nari kunywa okuhitsya obu baraite Paulo.
Abaacumire egyo naama bakaba nibeeshumba ahari makumi ana.
Baaza aha bahongyerezi abakuru n'aha bakuru omu ihanga, baabagira bati: Twahigira kimwe ku tutarikwija kurabya kantu mu kanwa, tutakaitsire Paulo.
Mbwenu imwe hamwe n'eishengyero, ekyanyu n'okushaba omukuru w'eihe kumubareetera, mushushe nk'abarikwenda kwetegyereza gye eby'orubanja rwe; reero ekyaitu n'okweteekateeka tukamwita atakabahikire.
Kwonka mwihwa wa Paulo yaahurira egyo naama y'okumugwera; yaaza omu kigo, yaagigambira Paulo,
N'onu yaayeeta omwe omu bakuru b'abaserukare igana, yaamugira ati: Twara omutsigazi ogu aha mukuru w'eihe, aine eki arikwenda kumugambira.
Yaamutwara, yaamuhitsya omukuru w'eihe, yaagira ati: Paulo embohe yaanyeta, yanshaba kukureetera omutsigazi ogu, ngu aine eki arikwenda kukugabira.
Omukuru w'eihe nikwo kumukwata omukono, akamuta aha rubaju, akamubuuza ati: Nooyenda kungambira ki?
Onu ati: Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okushaba kureeta Paulo omu ishengyero nyencakare, nk'abarikwenda kubuuririza gye eby'orubanja rwe.

Kwonka iwe otabaikiriza kukubeihabeiha, ahabw'okuba hariho abantu barikweshumba ahari makumi ana abamugwereire, kandi baherize kuhiga ngu tibarirya, tibarinywa, kureka baaheza kumwita. Na mbwenu bariyo beeteekateekire, bategyereize eki oraagambe.
Omukuru w'eihe atyo araga ogwo mwojo naamwehanangiriza ati: Otagira ou waagambira ku waabimmanyisa.

Bwanyima omukuru w'eihe akeeta babiri aha bakuru b'abaserukare, yaabagira ati: Muteekateekye abaserukare magana abiri, hamwe n'ab'embaraasi makumi mushanju n'ab'amacumu magana abiri, baze Kaisaariya shaaha ishatu za nyekiro.
Haza mutungire Paulo embaraasi z'okutemba, mumutwarire Felikisi omutegyeki omukuru, atahikirweho kabi.
Yaahandiika n'ebaruha erikugira eti:
Ow'ekitiinwa Omutegyeki Omukuru Felikisi, nyowe Kalaudio-Lusiya, ninkuramutsya.
Omushaija ogu akwatsirwe Abayudaaya, kandi bakaamwitsire kuri ntahikireho n'abaserukare bangye nkamuhunzya, ahabw'okuba maanyire ku ari Omurooma.
Ahabw'okwenda kumanya eki barikumutabaariza, mmutwaire omu maisho g'eishengyero ryabo,
naashanga eki barikumutura kiine akakwate n'ebi barikufa omu by'eiteeka ryabo, kwonka ataine rubanja orushemereire kumwitisa nari kumutaisa omu kihome.
Ku mmanyire ngu bamwiniire enaama y'okumwita, naarahuka kumukwoherereza, kandi naamanyisa abarikumutabaariza ku bagambira omu maisho gaawe eki barikufa nawe. Ogumeho.
Abaserukare baakora nk'oku baaragiirwa, baatwara Paulo nyekiro, baamuhitsya Antipatiri.
Ku bwaseesire, baamutsigira ab'embaraasi kugumizamu nawe bo baagaruka omu kigo.
Ku baahikire Kaisaariya, baaha ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ebaruha, kandi baamukwatsa Paulo.
Ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ku yaashomire egyo baruha, yaamubuuza ekyanga ki arikurugamu. Ku amanya ngu naaruga Kilikiya,
amugira ti: Orubanja rwawe niinyija kuruhurira baakitabaaza baahika aha. Atyo aragiira ku bamurindira omu kikaari kya Herode.

Ku haahingwireho ebiro bitaano, Ananiya omuhongyerezi omukuru, yaija n'abakuru omu ihanga hamwe n'ow'okubatonganira orikwetwa Terutuulo; baatabaariza Paulo omu maisho g'omutegyeki omukuru. Ku baamwetsire, Terutuulo yaatandika kumutabaariza ati:
Ow'ekitiinwa Felikisi, eihanga eri nirikusiima ahabw'okurireetera obusingye bwingi, n'ebindi ebi okora kurishemeza.
Ebyo byona nitubiikiriza, kandi obutoosha ahi turi hoona nitubikusiimira munonga.
Ntakusiibiizeyo, ninkushaba otuhurireho kakye.
Okukugambira amazima, tureebire ngu omushaija ogu atunyangaraize munonga; naarabanisamu Abayudaaya omu nsi yoona, kandi niwe mwebembezi w'ekigombe ky'Abanazareeti.
Ataireho n'okuhagaza Nyaruju, nikwo kumukwata [ngu tumucwere orubanja nk'oku eiteeka ryaitu riri.
Kwonka Lusiya, omukuru w'eihe, yaabitaahamu, yaamutwaka n'amaani.
Yaaragiira abarikumutabaariza kwija aha omu maisho gaawe.] Na' mbwenu ku oraamubuuze, nibwo oraayemanyire amazima ga byona ebi turikumutabaariza.
Abayudaaya nabo baakwatanisa nawe nibahamya ebyo ku nikwo biri.

Omutegyeki omukuru ku yaasimiize Paulo ngu agambe, onu yaagira ati: Nimmanya ku omazire emyaka mingi noocwera abantu b'ensi egi emanja. Mbwenu nikyo ndikwetonganirira omu maisho gaawe nyine obwesigye.
Iwe wenka ku oraabuuze, noija kumanya ku hatakahingwireho biro birikweshumba ikumi na bibiri nyinamukire Yerusalemu kuramya.
Kandi ti kyamazima okugira ngu baranshangire nimpakana n'omuntu weena, nari ningomesa abantu, yaaba muri Nyaruju, yaaba mu mateeraniro, nari ahandi hoona omu rurembo.
N'ebi barikuntabaariza hati, tibaine buhamya bwabyo.

Eki ndikwemera omu maisho gaawe n'eki: Nyowe ndamya Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe, ninkuratira Omuhanda gwe, ogu bo barikweta ogw'ekigombe ekyecwireho, obwo niinyikiriza byona ebiri omu iteeka kandi n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi.
Obwo nyine amatsiko omuri Ruhanga nkabo, ku haribaho okuzooka kw'abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire.
Omuri ebyo nkora kyona eki ndikubaasa kugira omutima gutarikushinjwa obunaku bwona ahari Ruhanga n'aha bantu.
Ku haahingwireho emyaka, naareetera abanaku b'eihanga ryangye eby'okubahwera n'okureeta emitoijo.
Ku naabaire ninkibikora, banshanga omuri Nyaruju, naaherize kwezibwa, ntainemu bantu kandi ntaine bu njagaraize. Kwonka Abayudaaya abaarugire Asiya,
nibo baakwizire aha, bakantabaariza ku baakuba baine eki barikufa naanye.
Nangwa n'aba abari aha, bagambe ekicumuro eki baareebire nikinsinga, obu baanyemereza omu maisho g'eishengyero.
Kureka kimwe kyonka eki naagambire nyemereire omu maisho gaabo, nikyo ekyo eky'okuzooka kw'abafiire, eki murikuntonganisa hati omu maisho gaanyu.
Mpaho Felikisi owaabaire naamanya gye eby'ogwo Muhanda, ku yaahuriire ekyo, orubanja yaarurinza agandi mazooba, naagira ati: Lusiya, omukuru w'eihe, ku araabe yaizire, nibwo ndaahurire orubaja rwawe.
Atyo yaaragiira omukuru w'abaserukare igana kuguma arinzire Paulo ari enkwatwa, kwonka atarikukumwakumwa kandi batarikuzibira bantu be kwija kumushuura.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, Felikisi yaija n'omukazi we Durusila Omuyudaayakazi. Yaatuma, baareeta Paulo; yaamutega okutu, yaahurira ebi arikwegyesa aha by'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.

Kwonka Paulo ku yaatandikire kugamba aha by'okuhikiirira n'eby'okwerinda n'eby'ekiro ky'okucwererwaho orubanja okuribaho, Felikisi yaatiina, yaamugira ati: Mbwenu obwa hati ogyende; ku ndikwenda ndyakweta.
Obwo bwona akaba aine amatsiko, ngu Paulo naija kumuha enguzi, nikyo yaagumiire naamweta atyo kaingi kugaaniira nawe.
Emyaka ebiri ku yaahwaireho, omwanya gwa Felikisi gwagiibwamu Porikio-Fesito; kandi Felikisi ogwo, ahabw'okwenda kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yaatsiga Paulo omu kihome.
Fesito ku yaabaire amazire ebiro bishatu ahikire omu ishaza, yaaruga Kaisaariya, yainamuka Yerusalemu.
Abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamugambira eby'orubanja rwa Paulo,
nibamushaba n'ekihika kubakorera eky'embabazi, akabareetera Paulo Yerusalemu, babone kumugwera bamwitire omu muhanda.
Kwonka Fesito yaabagarukamu ku Paulo arikwija kuguma Kaisaariya ari omu kihome, kandi ku we arikwija kugarukayo juba.
Yaayongyera yaabagira ati: K'abaine obushoboorozi omuriimwe bashuume hamwe naanye, kandi ku haraabe hariho ekintu kyona eki ogwo mushaija yaashobize, bamutabaarize.
Ku yaamazire nabo ebiro bitarikweshumba ahari munaana nari ikumi, yaashuuma Kaisaariya. Aha izooba eryakuratsireho, yaashutama aha kitebe kye ky'oburamuzi, yaaragiira ku bareeta Paulo.
Ku baamureetsire bati, Abayudaaya, abaabaire barugire Yerusalemu baamwehinguririza nibamutabaariza bingi, kandi eby'amaani ebi bo batarabaasize kuhamya.
Paulo we yaayetonganira ati: Nyowe tinkakoraga kintu kyona ekirikuhenda eiteeka ry'Abayudaaya, nari okushobya ahari Nyaruju, nainga okucumura ahari Kaisaari.
Fesito ahabw'okwenda kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yaagira Paulo ati: Noikiriza kwinamuka Yerusalemu, kuba niyo waatonganisizibwa emanja ezi omu maisho gangye?

Kwonka Paulo yaamugarukamu ati: Nyowe nyemereire omu maisho g'ekitabe ky'eiramuriro erya Kaisaari, niho nshemereire kutonganisizibwa. Naiwe nookimanya gye ku ntaine kintu kyona eki ndashobeize Abayudaaya.

Ku ndaabe niinyomeserezibwa orubanja rwona orw'okuunyitisa, ntaruga aha, muunyite. Kwonka ebi aba bantu barikuntabaariza ku biraabe bitarimu nsha, tihariho oine obushoboorozi bw'okubandekurira. Nyowe naajurira ahari Kaisaari.
Fesito ku yaaherize kwehanuuza aha bahabuzi be, yaamugarukamu ati: Waajuriire ahari Kaisaari; owa Kaisaari obe niyo waaza.
Ku haahingwireho ebiro, omugabe Aguripa na Berinike baahika Kaisaariya kutangirira Fesito.
Baateerayo ebiro. Fesito nikwo kuteekyerereza ogwo mugabe eby'orubanja rwa Paulo, naagira ati: Aha hariho omushaija ou Felikisi yaatsigire omu kihome.
Naanye ku naabaire ndi Yerusalemu, abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamutabaariza, nibenda ngu acwerwe orubanja rumusingye.
Kwonka naabagira nti: Ti mucwe gw'Abarooma kucwera omuntu orubanja, baakimutabaariza batariho, kandi atakaikiriziibwe kwetonganira orubanja rubarikumutura.
N'ahabw'ekyo ku baizire aha, naanye tinaasiibyayo. Aha izooba eryakuratsireho, naashutama aha kitebe omu iramuriro, naaragiira ku bareeta ogwo mushaija.
Abarikumutabaariza ku baayemereire, tibaamutabaariza rubanja rwona orubi nk'oku naabaire ninteekateeka.
Kureka baamutonganisa ebitari bimwe ebikwatiraine n'ediini yaabo, n'eby'omushaija owaafiire orikwetwa Yesu, ou Paulo yaabaire naagira ngu ahuriire.
Nyowe ku naashobangiriirwe kutaaha omu bintu nk'ebyo, naamubuuza ku araabe naikiriza kuza Yerusalemu, akaba niyo yaabitonganisizibwa.
Kwonka Paulo yaajurira ahari Rubambansi, ngu abe niwe yaamucwera orubanja; naanye nikwo kuragiira ku arindwa, okuhitsya obu ndimwoherereza Kaisaari.
Aguripa yaagira Fesito ati: Naanye nkaayenzire kuhurira ogwo muntu. Onu ati: Orabumuhurire nyencakare.
Ku bwaseesire, Aguripa na Berinike baizira omu kitiinwa kingi, baataaha omu iramuriro bashagatiirwe abakuru b'amahe n'abanyamaziina b'omuri orwo rurembo; mpaho Fesito yaaragiira ku bareeta Paulo.

Bwanyima Fesito ogwo yaagira ati: Nyakusinga Aguripa, naimwe mwena abateeraniire aha, nimureeba omu maisho gaanyu omushaija ou Abayudaaya boona ab'omuri Yerusalemu n'ab'aha banshabire nibandigitirira kandi nibatokoorekana, ngu tashemereire kurekwa akagumaho.
Nyowe ahabwangye nkareeba ku ataine kicumuro ki arakozire eky'okumwitisa; kwonka we ku yaajuriire ahari Rubambansi, naacwamu eky'okumwoherezayo.

Kandi nk'oku ntaine kishoboorokire eky'okuhandiikira Rubambansi omugabe aha by'ogu mushaija, nikyo naamureetera omu maisho gaanyu mwena, munomuno omu maisho gaawe, Nyakusinga Aguripa, ngu mbone kutunga eki ndaahandiikye.
Manya nindeeba ku kitahikire kwohereza embohe, ntoorekire manja zirikugitabaarizibwa.
Mpaho Aguripa agira Paulo, ati: Hati noikirizibwa kwetonganira. Paulo nawe nikwo kwimutsya omukono, akatandika kwetonganira, ati:
Nyakusinga Aguripa, ningira ngu naahiirwa okureeba eri izooba naaza kwetonganira omu maisho gaawe emanja zoona ezi naatabaariziibwe Abayudaaya,
kandi okukira munonga ahabw'okuba noomanyira kimwe eby'emicwe n'empaka z'Abayudaaya. N'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza, ogumisirize, ompurire.
Abayudaaya boona nibamanya eby'emitwarize yangye okwiha omu buto, kandi naaba kutandika, nibamanya eby'amagara gangye ndi omu bantu b'eihanga ryangye n'omuri Yerusalemu.
Okwiha ira nibammanya kandi nibabaasa kukihamya, baaba nibenda, ku naabaire nkuratira ekigombe ekirikukiza ebindi kuhitsya emigyenzo y'ediini yaitu, kandi ku nyowe mba Omufarisaayo.
Mbwenu hati nintonganisibwa ahabw'okugira amatsiko aha ki Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatataitwe, ekyaraganisiibwe
ab'enganda zaitu ikumi na ibiri kukitunga, baaba nibeezirika kuramya Ruhanga nyomushana na nyekiro. Ahabw'ago matsiko, Nyakusinga, nikyo Abayudaaya barikuntonganisiza.
Mbwenu imwe Bayudaaya 'mwe, ahabw'enki nimugira ngu Ruhanga okuzoora abafiire n'ekintu eki mutarikubaasa kwikiriza?
Nyowe nkaba nteekateeka ngu gukaba guri omurimo gwangye kukora kyona eki ndikubaasa kurwanisa eiziina rya Yesu owa Nazareeti.
Ekyo nkakikorera omuri Yerusalemu; naata abahikiriire baingi omu kihome, obwo abahongyerezi abakuru bampaire obushoboorozi; kandi ku baabaire bacwerwa orw'okwitwa, naanye nkisiima.

Emirundi mingi nkaba ngyenda nindaba omu mateeraniro, mbaha ebiheneso, obwo ninteeraho kubagyema, ngu beehakane enyikiriza yaabo. Okumanya ku naabaire mbagirira ekiniga kihango, nkaba ntaho n'okubakurata omu ndembo z'agandi mahanga.
Omu hururu emwe nk'ezo, ku naabaire ninza Damasiko, mpairwe obushoboorozi kandi ntumirwe abahongyerezi abakuru,

Nyakusinga, ku bwabaire bwaba eihangwe nkwaitse ningyenda, naareeba okwaka okurikumurinkana kukira okw'eizooba kwaruga omu iguru. Kwayaka munonga kuunyehinguriirize nyowe n'abu naabaire ningyenda nabo.
Twena twagwa ahansi, reero naahurira eiraka niringambira omu Ruheburaayo, riti: Saulo, Saulo, nompiiganisiza ki? Nooyeruhiza busha kuteera omuhunda omugyere.
Ntyo ngira nti: Ori oha, Mukama wangye? Mukama angarukamu ati: Niinye Yesu ou orikuhiiganisa.
Kwonka imuka, oyemerere, ahabw'okuba eki naakubonekyerera n'eki: Naakutoorana kuba omuheereza wangye, kandi kareebi w'okuhamya oku wandeeba, n'ebindi ebi ndikweyorekyeramu.
Ndyakujuna ab'eihanga ryawe Abaisiraeli, nkwihe n'omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga abu naaza kukutumamu.
Obahumuure, barugye omu mwirima, baze omu mushana, baimuure Sitaane, beehongyere Ruhanga, kandi ahabw'okuunyikiriza basaasirwe ebibi byabo, batungye omugabo hamwe n'abeeziibwe.
N'ahabw'ekyo, Nyakusinga Aguripa, nyowe tinkubaasize kugomera okwo kubonekyerwa kwarugire omu iguru.

Mpaho naakora eki ntakukozire, naatandikira aho kurangirira ab'omuri Damasiko, naataho aba Yerusalemu n'ab'omuri Buyudaaya yoona kandi n'Abanyamahanga, nimbeehanangiriza kweteisa n'okukubuukira Ruhanga, nibakora ebishemereire abeegarukiremu.
Ekyo nikyo Abayudaaya bankwatiire ndi omuri Nyaruju, bakenda kuunyita.
Kwonka ahabw'okurindwa Ruhanga, nkyemereireho n'okuhitsya eri izooba, nimpamiza abakuru n'abato, kandi ebi ndikugamba bitari bindi, kureka ebi abarangi na Musa baagambire ngu biryabaho:
ku Kristo aribonabonesibwa kandi ahabw'okuba ow'okubanza kuzooka omu bafiire ku Abayudaaya hamwe n'Abanyamahanga aribahwezesa.
Ku yaabaire yaahika ahari ekyo naakyetonganira, Fesito yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati: Paulo, ka waayanjuka! Manya okwega munonga kwawe nikwo kukwanjwire omutima.
Paulo amugarukamu ati: Ow'ekitiinwa Fesito, tiinyanjukire, kureka ebi ndikugamba n'amazima gonka.
Omugabe ebi naabimanya, na hati nimmugambira ntaine keekyengo, ahabw'okuba nimpamya ku ebi byona arikubimanya; kandi tindabikoreire mu keehogo.
Nyakusinga Aguripa, noikiriza eby'abarangi? Hoona nimmanya ku orikubiikiriza.
Aguripa nikwo kugira Paulo ati: Ebishi, waaburaho kakye kumpindura Omukristo!
Paulo amugarukamu ati: Yaaba bikye nari bingi, kwonka nyowe eki ndikushaba Ruhanga, tiiwe wenka, kureka n'abandi mwena abampuriire eri izooba, mube nkaanye okwihaho eby'ezi njegyere.
Mpaho omugabe aimuka hamwe n'omutegyeki omukuru na Berinike n'abandi boona abaabaire bashutami nabo.
Ku baaherize kuyaabuuka, baagambirana bonka, bati: Ogu mushaija taine ki akozire ekishemereire kumwitisa nari kumukomesa.
Aguripa nawe yaagira Fesito ati: Ogu muntu akaarekwirwe, kuri atarajuriire hari Kaisaari.
Ku kyaherize kuhamibwa ngu tutoore ogw'enyanja kuza Italiya, Paulo n'embohe ezindi baabakwatsa omukuru w'abaserukare orikwetwa Yulio, ow'omu ihe rya Rubambansi.
Twatemba emeeri eya Aduramuito, eyaabaire neeza kuraba aha nyambukiro z'omwegyeego gwa Asiya, twatoora ogw'enyanja, obwo twine Arisitariko, Omunyamakedoniya owa Tesalonika.
Eizooba eryakuratsireho, twahika Sidoni; okwo Yulio yaagirira Paulo embabazi, yaamwikiriza kwegaba omuri banywani be kuruhuukirayo.
Ku twarugire okwo, twagaruka twaza omu nyanja, kandi ahabw'omuyaga kutureetwa omu maisho, twagyenda nitwekiikuura ekirwa kya Kupuro,
twacwekanisiza enyanja ahari Kilikiya na Panfuliya, twahika Muura ey'omuri Lukiya.
Okwo niyo omukuru w'abaserukare igana yaashangire emeeri erikuruga Alekisanderiya neeza Italiya, akagitutamu.

Tukamara ebiro nitugumizamu mpora, okuhitsya obu twahikire haihi na Kuniido twakabire. Ahabw'omuyaga kutatwikiriza kuhikayo, twatoora ogurikwekiikuura ekirwa kya Kureete, haihi n'enkokora ya Salumoone.
Twaitanisa nitwekiikuura, okuhitsya obu twahikire omwanya gurikwetwa Nyambukiro-nungi, haihi n'ekirorero Lasaya.
Ebiro bingi ku byahingwireho, orugyendo rw'omu nyanja rwaba orw'akabi. Ebiro by'okwesiibyakwo byashangwa byahingwire. Paulo nikwo kubahabura,
ati: Bakama bangye, oku ndikureeba orugyendo oru nirwija kuba orw'akabi, ti kusiisikarirwa bintu na meeri byonka, kureka n'okufeerwa amagara gaitu.
Kwonka omukuru w'abaserukare igana yaata omutima aha by'omukuru w'abavugi b'emeeri na mukama waayo, okukira okuguta aha bi Paulo yaagambire.

Kandi ahabw'enyambukiro egyo kutaba nungi kumariramu ebiro by'embeho, abaingi baasiima kugumizamu, ngu ebyo biro babimarire Foinikiya, enyambukiro ya Kureete erikureeba orubaju rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho eza burengyerwa-izooba.

Akayaga karikuheheeza ku kaahuuhire nikaiha omu bukiizi-bwa-buryo, baateekateeka ngu eki baaba nibenda kyaba kwo, baatsibura emeeri, yaatandika kugyenda neeraba aha rubaju rwa Kureete haihi n'enkungu.
Kwonka ku haabaire hatakahingwireho mwanya muhango, baateerwa omuyaga gw'amaani maingi, ogwetwa ogwa bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa burugwa-izooba, ogwaizire nigucwekanisa ekirwa.
Emeeri yaaremwa kugyema ei gwabaire nigureetwa. Naitwe nikwo kugureka gukaba nigwo gwatutwara.
Twayekiika omu mwegyeego gw'akarwa kakye akarikwetwa Kauda, bwanyima twabona kuhamiza akaato aha meeri twaherize kufa kubi munonga;
baakatembya aha meeri, baakagikomeraho n'emirunga y'ebyoma nibagigyehinguririza. Kandi ku baatiinire kushaayira omu musheenyi gw'enkungu za Suriti, batsibura emeeri ngu batwarwe omuyaga.
Ku twacurangiibwe munonga omuyaga, aha izooba eryakuratsireho baatandika kunaga esika omu nyanja.
Kandi aha izooba rya kashatu, baatambika n'emikono yaabo ebirikugyendesa emeeri.
Ku twamazire ebiro bingi tutarikureeba izooba, nobu zaakuba enyonyoozi, kandi n'eihunga ritatuurize, twahwera kimwe amatsiko g'okukira.

Ku haahingwireho ebiro bingi bataine ki barikurya, Paulo yaabeemerera ahagati, yaabagira ati: Bagyenzi bangye, kuri mwampuriire, mukareka kuruga Kureete mukaakizire okusiisikarirwa oku kwona hamwe n'okufeerwa ebintu.
Kwonka mbwenu nimbeehanangiriza, murekye kwehwa amatsiko. Tihariho orikwija kufa omuriimwe, kureka emeeri yonka.
Manya eki kiro maraika wa Ruhanga, ou ndi owe kandi ou ndamya, anyemereire aha rubaju,
yangira ati: Paulo, otatiina; ori ow'okwemerera omu maisho ga Kaisaari, kandi ahabwawe Ruhanga naija kurinda boona abari naiwe omu bwato, bakire.
Reero nu, bagyenzi bangye, mugume. Niinyesiga Ruhanga, buzimazima ebintu nibiija kuba nk'oku mmanyisiibwe;
kwonka nitwija kugira ekirwa ki twanagwaho.
Aha kiro kya ikumi na bina, ku twabaire turi omu nyanja Aduriya nitucurangibwa omuyaga, nk'omu itumbi, abarimbi baakyenga ku hariho ensi ei bari haihi kuhikaho.
Baagyera oburaingwa bw'amaizi obw'okuzimu, bwaba ebigyere igana na makumi abiri kandi ku baagyenzireho akaanya, baagaruka baagyera, baashanga buri makumi mwenda.
Kwonka ahabw'okutiina ngu tutakaayehonda aha rukiri, baatambika ahansi ebitsibo bina, nibeema aha isinga ry'enyima, baahumbya ngu busheeshe.
Abarimbi bamwe ku baateireho kucwa omu meeri, bashuumya obwato omu nyanja nk'abarikutambika ebitsibo aha isinga ryayo ery'omu maisho.
Paulo yaagira omukuru w'abaserukare igana n'abaserukare be, ati: Aba bantu ku baraabe batagumire mu meeri, timuri b'okukira.
Abaserukare nikwo kushara emirunga y'obwato, bakabureka bukagyenda.

Ku bwabaire buri haihi kutaagurukana, Paulo yaabeehanangiriza boona kugira eki baarya, yaabagira ati: Hati mwahitsya ebiro ikumi na bina mushobeirwe, mwemereize omutima, mwitsirwe enjara, mutaine ki murikurya.
Mbwenu nimbeehanangiriza mugire eki mwarya; nikyo kiraabahe amaani, kandi tiharikwija kugira kashokye na kamwe akaraabure aha mitwe yaanyu mwena.
Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo, yaakwata omugaati, yaasiimira Ruhanga omu maisho gaabo boona, yaagucwamu, yaatandika kurya.
Boona baagarukwa omutima omunda, baarya.
Twena abaabaire bari omuri egyo meeri tukaba turi abantu magana abiri na makumi mushanju na mukaaga.
Ku baaherize kurya baiguta, baanaga engano omu nyanja ngu emeeri eyanguhirwe.
Ku bwaseesire, abarimbi tibaamanya nsi ei bahikireho, kwonka baayetegyereza ku guri omukono gw'enyanja oguriho enyambukiro y'omusheenyi; baayenda kuba niho baahikiza emeeri, kyaba nikibaasika.

Mpaho baakomoorora ebitsibo, baabitsiga omu nyanja, kandi omuri ako kaanya baayuzya emirunga y'ebirikubogora emeeri. Bwanyima baahanika eitanga ry'omu maisho, boorekyeire ei omuyaga gurikutoora, baagyema enyambukiro.

Kwonka ku baahikire ahu emishumba erikubugabuganira, egyo mishumba yaabatwara, yaabahitsya ahu amaizi gari magufu, emeeri yaashaaya. Eisinga ery'omu maisho ryayecumitamu ryahamiramu, obwo ery'enyima ryatandika kushatashaturwa ebingonzi birikwehuura.
Abaserukare baaza omu naama y'okwita embohe, ngu hatakaagira owaaziha, akatoroka.
Kwonka mukama waabo ahabw'okwenda kukiza Paulo, yaabazibira kukora eki baabaire nibenda. Yaaragiira abarikubaasa kuziha, ku baba nibo baabanza kwetuura omu nyanja, bakambuka;
reero abandi babakurate bari aha mbaaho nari aha bishatuka by'emeeri. Batyo boona baahika aha nkungu buhooro.
Ku twaherize kuhika aha nkungu buhooro, twamanya ku ekyo kirwa kirikwetwa Malita.
Abatuuzi baayo baatukunira okutakareebwaga. Baatwakiira n'okushemererwa kwingi, kandi ahabw'enjura eyaabaire yaatandikire kugwa, n'obunaku buri obw'embeho, baatuhembera omuriro.
Paulo ku yaarundaine omuganda gw'enku, yaazita, aha muriro, haatimbiramu empiri neehunga ekibiga ky'omuriro, yaamuramata aha ngaro.
Enzaarwa z'egyo nsi ku baareebire ekyo kikooko nikimureereetera aha ngaro, baagambirana bati: Ogu muntu buzima n'omwitsi w'abantu. Akizire enyanja; buhitsya ya Ruhanga terikumureka akagumaho.
Kwonka we ekyo kikooko yaakikunkumurira omu muriro atabaireho kabi,

nobu abantu baateekateekire ngu naija kuzimba juba, nari shi agwe aho afeereho. Ku baaherize kutegyereza omwanya muhango, baareeba ataabaho kabi, baatandika kuteekateeka okundi, nibagira bati: Ogu ni ruhanga?
Haihi n'aho hakaba hariho mahiro y'omukungu w'ekyo kirwa orikwetwa Pubulio. Yaatwakiira, yaatukunira munonga okumara ebiro bishatu.
Omu bunaku obwo ishe wa Pubulio akaba arambiire arwaire omushwija n'esheshe. Paulo yaazayo kumureeba, yaashaba Ruhanga, yaamutaho engaro, yaamukiza.
Ekyo ku kyabaireho, abandi barwaire b'ahari ekyo kirwa nabo baija, baatambirwa.
Abaayo bakatuha ekitiinwa kingi; kandi ku twagiire kuza omu bwato, baatamu eby'entanda byona ebi twabaire nitwetenga.
Ku haahwaireho ameezi ashatu, twatoora ogw'enyanja turi omu meeri eriho akashushani k'Empasha, eyaabaire erugire Alekisanderiya, ehungiire ebiro by'embeho aha kirwa.
Twahika Surakuusa, twamarayo kashatu.
Twarugayo, twagyenda nitwekiikuura, twahika Reegio. Ku twabaire twateerayo ekiro kimwe, haija omuyaga gw'Obukiizi-bwa-buryo; aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Puteoli,
ei twashangire abanyaruganda, bakatushaba kumara nabo ebiro mushanju, bwanyima tukeegaranjura Rooma.
Abanyaruganda ku baahuriire ngu twahikayo, baija baatubuganira aha Kajagiro ka Api n'aha Maju Ashatu g'Okucumbikamu. Paulo ku yaabareebire, yaasiima Ruhanga, omutima gwamugaruka omunda.
Ku twahikire omuri Rooma, Paulo yaikirizibwa kweraaza, aine omuserukare orikumurinda.

Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu, Paulo yaayeta Abayudaaya ba Rooma abakuru kuteerana. Ku baateeraine, yaabagira ati: Beene waitu, nobu ndaabe ntaine ki naashobeize abantu, nari okushiisha emicwe ya baatatenkuriitwe, kwonka nkakwatirwa omuri Yerusalemu, naateebwa omu mikono y'Abarooma.
Ku bantonganiise, baashanga ntaine rubanja rw'okuunyitisa, baayenda kundekura.
Kwonka Abayudaaya baayanga, naanye nikwo kujurira ahari Kaisaari, ntaine ki ndikwenda kutabaariza ab'eihanga ryangye.
Mbwenu nikyo naashabira kubareeba n'okugamba naimwe; ahabw'okuba eki Isiraeli etuura etegyereize, nikyo kinteisize omuri ezi njegyere.
Nabo baamugarukamu bati: Itwe titukatungaga baruha zirikuruga Buyudaaya ezirikukugambaho, nobu yaakuba omuntu w'owaanyu orahikire aha kutugambira enkuru mbi ahariiwe, nari kukutebyaho kubi.
Mbwenu tukaayenzire ku oba niiwe waatugambira ebyawe oku byemi. Itwe eki turikumanya aha kigombe eki, n'eki abantu barikugambaho kubi hoonahoona.

Mpaho Abayudaaya baaragaana na Paulo erindi izooba; kandi baija baingi ahari eryo izooba omu nju ei yaabaire acumbikiremu. Yaabashoboororera ebye, naabahamiza eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga kandi naateeraho okubaikirizisa Yesu, obwo naajuriza eby'eiteeka rya Musa n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi. Ebyo akabibagambira okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu mwabazyo.
Abamwe baabiikiriza, kwonka abandi baabyanga.

Batyo tibaikirizana. Reero ku baabaire nibaimuka kugyenda, Paulo yaabagambira eky'aha muheru ati: Mutima Orikwera ka yaagambire gye, obu yaagambira baashwenkuriimwe naakirabya omu murangi Isaaya, ati:
Irooko, oze omuri eryo ihanga, origambire oti: Okuhurira kwo muryahurira, kwonka timurishoboorokyerwa. Okureeba kwo muryareeba, kwonka timuryetegyereza.

Ahabw'okuba emitima y'ab'eihanga eri ebaire ebitsire, amatu gaabo nigahurira kubi, n'amaisho gaabo bagahumiize, ngu batakaareebesa ago maisho gaabo, bakahuriza amatu gaabo, bakeetegyerezesa emitima yaabo, bakampindukira, nkabakiza.
Paulo ayongyera abagira ati: Mbwenu mukimanye ku obutumwa bw'okujuna kwa Ruhanga bwoherereziibwe Abanyamahanga kandi nibaija kubuhurira.
